name: Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley
address: 22 Lò Sũ, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
description:
Với phòng chờ chung, sân hiên và nhà hàng, Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley tọa lạc ở trung tâm Hà Nội, cách Nhà hát múa rối Thăng Long 3 phút đi bộ. Khách sạn 4 sao này có bàn bán tour và phòng giữ hành lý. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Tất cả các căn tại khách sạn được trang bị điều hòa, khu vực ghế ngồi, TV màn hình phẳng có truyền hình vệ tinh, két an toàn, phòng tắm riêng, vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và máy sấy tóc. Tại Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley, tất cả các phòng đều được thiết kế có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet, thực đơn à la carte hoặc kiểu lục địa mỗi sáng.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Hồ Hoàn Kiếm, Ô Quan Chưởng và Nhà thờ Thánh Joseph. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Nội Bài, cách Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley 24 km.

review.comment_positive: Posizione eccellente per visitare la città. Staff accogliente e ha subito dato un contributo importante per sentirsi a proprio agio. Dopo svariati hotel vietnamiti finalmente questo si è rivelato silenzioso

very bad breakfast for Europeans - mostly salads, rice and pho. I’d suggest to change this into more bread, fruits, spreads, joghurt(without sugar), coffee (Italian) and western offerings 
no free spa, no gym, no leisure rooms

review.rating: perfect for a stay in hanoi

review.rating: Great and quiet stay in the heart of Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Room is modern & clean as shown in the listing. Location is great - very close to the lake, restaurants, and shops. Even though it's a busy area, the room was very quiet which contributes to good night's sleep. We enjoyed the breakfast and the staff was also great.
review.comment_negative: As others noted, you need to go through a short alley to get to the lobby. This did not bother us as it meant the rooms did not face the street and contributed to the quietness of the room. Also, the shower and toilet are in the same room without a door/curtain between them. We were careful to let the fan dry out the bathroom after showers.

review.comment_positive: clean new amenities , much better then ancient hotel near dong xuan market . thanks so much! i enjoy my stay alot.
review.comment_negative: only downside is no parking. parking cost additional 150,000

review.comment_positive: Everything about hotel specially the staff was very courteous and breakfast had many options

review.rating: Amazing hospitality in bustling Hanoi, the perfect hotel location
review.comment_positive: The staff were amazing, particularly Grace, Kim and Dave who made sure to go above and beyond to give us help and advice and assist us in anyway to give us an amazing time! The hotel was also so lovely and in the perfect location.
The staff was very nice and solicitous.
review.comment_negative: Lack of natural light in the room

review.comment_positive: La profesionalidad y amabilidad de Jerry
review.comment_negative:
Las habitaciones eran interiores y deprimentes. El lavabo estaba en la habitación, y la ducha y el inodoro juntos sin mampara ni cortina.
El desayuno, que se tomaba en un hotel distinto, fue bastante malo.

review.comment_positive: Nice and clean rooms! The staff and workes are very friendly and helpfull and breakfast was good too. Good location. Would like to send regards to Ellie, she stays in reception and is always ready to help, has a very good english (probably the best I've heard in Vietnam), and is ready for any wish you ask. Would come back again. Thank you!
The staff was pretty much kindness, the most valuable thing it's the way the treat their customers

The stay here was absolutely lovely especially because of the staff. they went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable easy and warm. we really felt like coming back home whenever we would arrive there in the evening. 
I can’t stress enough how lovely the staff was!! 
rooms are good!

review.rating: Perfect stay in old quarter in Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Location and incredible friendly staff. Very tasty breakfast and quiet room

The Staff of an Emerald Water Valley is the Best Staff that Any Hotel Can Have!! Jerry ,Grace, Kim and Tracy are just  Wonderful..
Breakfast was Excellent.. Room was Comfortable
review.comment_negative:
The Shower and Wet Bathroom were an inconvenience..
This was the Only Negative.. but an important one..

review.comment_positive:
Great place, Grace and all staff are amazing.
Location perfect, I would stay here again.
Thank you for everything.

review.rating: Can be good for simple stay, but don’t recommend for those who enjoy quality and comfort
review.comment_positive: The location is great, right next to Hoan Kiem lake. The hotel also seem to have just done renovation, so everything is quite new and the style and interior look good.
review.comment_negative: The biggest problem of this hotel is that it’s placed inside of a very very small alley. As a result, all windows are facing the walls of a neighborhood building. You can take your hand out of the window and touch the wall of the other building. Therefore there’s no natural light in the rooms whatsoever. Very dark and dull. The other issue I had was that pictures of the rooms on booking com were not matching the reality. When I confronted receptionist about it, he told me to cancel the booking and leave. That was very rude and made me feel very uncomfortable. And the kettle in the room was very old and very very dirty. Also I’ve stayed for 5 nights, my room has been cleaned only once during these days. There is no “please don’t disturb” and “please clean my room” sign to use. The AC was not working half of the time, as the hotel management explained to me, because the master room for AC is on the 4th floor, so whichever settings people there choose, will be reflected in my room. As a result I’ve been frozen for half of the nights and of course at night there’s no one in reception to help you deal with this.

review.comment_positive: khách sạn rất sạch sẽ , các dịch vụ đều tốt . Các bạn nhân viên siêu dễ thương , nhiệt tình . Lần sau quay lại Hà nội nhất định vẫn sẽ chọn  Hanoi Emerald Waters hotel Valley ❤️
The staff is super helpful and don't mind going an extra bit to help. They make you really feel at home
Nhân viên nhiệt tình, phòng sạch sẽ và ks ngay trung tâm.
Wonderful staff thanks for your warm welcome and helpful tips, memorable visit to Hanoi!

Very well located, very clean, the room was very nice and the bed was comfortable. The staff was super nice, available, answered all our questions and helped us to organize visits. We 100% recommend this hotel !

review.rating: tuyệt vời trên sự mong đợi
review.comment_positive: kiến trúc đẹp, sang trọng
review.comment_negative: Cách âm hơi kém và k có lược

review.comment_positive: La ubicación y el recibimiento después de un vuelo largo
review.comment_negative: Habitación interior sin ventanas con poca iluminación y teníamos que cambiar de edificio para desayunar

review.rating: Incredible staff made my trip much better
review.comment_positive:
The staff were absolutely incredible, especially the two ladies and the manager at the reception. From the moment you arrive they will treat you like a close friend in a natural and not forced way. The breakfast is in their other hotel building across the street and they’ll guide you the first morning you’re there. 

The room itself is just like in the pictures. There’s a window but not to the outside so you’ll have no natural light in the room but there’s good illumination everywhere. Everything you need is there with complimentary coffee and water. Bed is large and comfortable, as well as the pillows. The shower size is not too big but manageable, but you have to be a bit careful with not spilling water everywhere as there are no curtains.

The hotel was centrally located - a few minutes walk from all the main attractions, money change, food, everything that you need!

We stayed at the hotel before and after our cruise in Ha Long Bay and the hotel kept our large luggages (thank you to the team for this). The staff (Grace in particular) was very warm, bubbly and accomodating. Grace knew the spots nearby the hotel that we needed to visit and had great recommendations for shopping for things we were after - souvenirs, snacks and a very specific coffee request. Thank you Grace!!

If you are looking for a hotel, please do book with Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley. The other Emerald Waters hotel is across the road where you have breakfast, but we loved everything about Hanoi Emerald Water Hotel Valley - you won't regret staying here

review.rating: Aanrader en bedankt voor de goede zorgen
review.comment_positive: De vriendelijkheid en behulpzaamheid van het ganse team. Dit was onovertroffen. Hett ontbijt was uitgebreider dan verwacht en je werd met alles geholpen. Locatie ook perfect.
review.comment_negative: Helaas lawaaihinder tot stuk in de nacht van naburige kamer.

review.rating: Helt igennem fantastisk ophold! Personalet var top profesionelle og hjælpsomme, langt ud over hvad jeg kunne hve drømt o
review.comment_positive: Fantastisk beliggenhed i et dejligt område. Hotellet lå imellem andre bygninger hvilket gjorde at man kunne få en god nattesøvn uden noget som helst støj.
review.comment_negative: Intet negativt at sige om stedet!

review.comment_positive:
Hôtel très bien placé dans le vieux quartier de Hanoï.
Personnel souriant et serviable. Chambre calme
Bon petit déjeuner

review.rating: They make you feel at home
review.comment_positive: Mr. Jerry was very hospitable, he was helpful in every step of the way. He catered to all our needs and made us feel at home. He even gave us valuable inputs on sightseeing and shopping. we also appreciate the service of ms. grace and other desk staff at night time. All of them were equally helpful and fun to be around!! The property was located perfectly amidst old quarters which made sightseeing and exploring the real side of Hanoi very efficient. absolutely loved the hotel and the experience.
review.comment_negative: Nothing to be honest.

review.comment_positive: Perfekte Lage, megafreundliches Personal und angemessene Auswahl beim Frühstück - völlig ausreichend und lecker
Best experience in Hanoi

review.rating: 1 day booked, we stayed 2 more because we didn’t wanted to left them!
review.comment_positive: We met so many kind people through our trip in Vietnam, but here, inside a little street in the old town of Hanoi, hides a treasure. Maybe the best, kind, and professional team we’ve ever met, even some of the most popular hotel we have in France. You can only book one night here and they will give you all the best directions, prebook for you or anything you can get from Vietnam. the room and commodities are just what you’ll need, and their breakfast is complete and very good. If we’ll come back, we surely stay at the same place with this Best team ever! thanks Jerry, Linh, Kim, Tom and the others !
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Outstanding service. I will definitely recommend my friends and family about this hotel.
review.comment_positive: I have been to 59 countries and the service I received by Grace and Kim was outstanding. So courteous and helpful that I can’t speak enough about them. Last day of our stay we had a chance to meet Jerry who also was excellent. Manager at the restaurant ( sorry I didn’t get her name) was courteous too.
review.comment_negative: Everything about this hotel stays was excellent.

review.rating: Brilliant location and great breakfasts - but best of all were the staff, who were exceptional
review.comment_positive: We had stayed at this hotel at the start of our holiday but decided to come back for the last 2 days because we had enjoyed our time so much the first time. The location was excellent and the hotel was clean and comfortable. The breakfast was the best out of all the hotels we stayed at, but what made our stay perfect was the care and assistance given to us by the staff, particularly Grace and Kim on reception. I had made a mistake in only booking the room for one, instead of 2 nights. As the hotel was fully booked they went out of their way to find us a nearby hotel with similar rates, arrange for our luggage to be taken across, a transfer to the airport and they even provided us with a take away breakfast as our flights were extra early. They also helped to book excursions and their care was 5* and exceptional, as was all the staff. I would highly recommend the hotel to anyone.
review.comment_negative: All good.

review.comment_positive: The hotel staff were so nice! All of them. It was a nice cozy hotel with amazing buffet breakfast
location
review.comment_negative: room without window

review.comment_positive: スタッフのホスピタリティが最高でした。

Después de realizar el check out si necesitas de dejan duchar que está muy bien si estás todo el día en la ciudad y después sigues a otro sitio. 
Personal muy muy amable. Desde el chico de la puerta a la recepción. 
Te dan aguas en habitación. 
Dejan cepillo de dientes pasta dentrifica peine shampoo gel ducha. 
Bien localizado. Céntrico y tranquilo a la vez. 

Recomiendo 100%
Cũng được, phòng giống như mô tả.

review.rating: Great stay as staff are very polite n super helpful esp jerry
review.comment_positive: The location was convenient, near to many food places .  Walking distance to the lake n shopping lane. Hotel rooms are very clean , spacious and rooms quiet as tucked inside the road .
review.comment_negative: Did not like the bathroom . Find the shower area without a shower screen or curtain very inconvenient . When we shower , the whole bathroom including the sink area and toilet will be wet .

review.comment_positive: Jerry and the team were absolutely fantastic. They helped us plan our trip to Ha Long Bay (they even let us leave our large bags with them whilst we were away)  and were generally very helpful and welcoming. The room was spotless, and the location was ideal. Would definitely recommend.
review.comment_negative: The only downside was that we didn't get a lot of natural light in the room, due to the shape of the building. Didn't take away from our experience though.

review.rating: היה פשוט נהדר, חדר נקי ונעים וצוות שנתן מעטפת להכל
review.comment_positive: צוות מושלם, חייכן ואדיב
Staff was extremely friendly, we had a great stay.

Everything was so wonderful! I see some reviews raising concerns about no windows, but honestly it is perfect as you sleep so peacefully during the night… and besides there is a tiny one although don’t expect bright sunshine.

The hotel is walking distance to everything, it is the best hub to explore everything from. 

Kudos to Dave at reception who was such a welcoming presence on arrival and Grace who had such an elegance in helping me out when my flight was delayed.
review.comment_negative: Not spending more time with Grace, she is awesome!

review.comment_positive: Phòng ở mức tạm ổn, không có phàn nàn gì nhiều.
Tutto perfetto dalla stanza alla gentilezza e disponibilità dello staff. La location è perfetta per girare Hanoi. Colazione super ed abbondante.
Super aardig personeel erg behulpzaam, leuk hotel in een leuke buurt

review.rating: Un havre de paix pour se reposer au cœur d’Hanoï
review.comment_positive: Très bon emplacement au calme pour visiter Hanoï. Très bon accueil pour un équipe vraiment dédiée, toujours prête à vous aider. L’hôtel est situé en retrait de la rue, ce qui vous offre des chambres très calmes.
Location was fantastic, lots of food options. Staff were extremely friendly and very helpful.
địa điển thuật lợi, bữa sáng rất nhiều lựa chọn

review.rating: The staff made our short stay very comfortable. Very helpful with anything that was needed. The manager Jerry helped us
review.comment_positive:
Facilities are fairly new and rooms are clean. 
Easy walk to many shops, restaurants and cafes. 
If you are taking the express bus from airport, the bus stops only a block away so is very convenient.
friendly staff & good location, soft bed

Sink in the room - and shower in the same area as toilet. 
Breakfast served in different hotel across the street.

review.comment_positive: The staff were amazing.   Very helpful and excellent advice.    Great location.  Would definitely stay again.

review.comment_positive:
위치는 최고이고, 주변에 같은 계열사 호텔이 있어서 조식은 거기서 괜찮게 먹었습니다.
직원들의 친절이 베트남 방문 호텔 중 최고입니다.
review.comment_negative:
샤워실에 샤워커튼이나 부스가 없어서 물이 타 튀어 다닙니다.
호텔이 골목안쪽에 있는데, 도로가에서 입구 찾기가 살짝 어렵습니다.

review.rating: First choice for our stay in Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Good location, nice and helpful staff, good breakfast with a lot of options and clean rooms.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: The hotel was located in the heart of the old quarters. Practically walkable to the lake, weekend markets and other attractions. Hotel was well maintained with breakfast included. At the price point was good value for money. And the great service attitude of the hotel staf there, Tracy,  Grace and Kim and a gentleman (sorry I didn't catch his name), all of them were always smiling and super helpful and attentive to your needs. If you have any questions they will always do their best to help. I would return just because of them!
review.comment_negative: Good value at that price point. No complaints.

review.comment_positive:
1. 工作人員服務態度非常好，用心解決我的任何問題。
2. 早餐好吃，有現點現做的蛋料理及Pho。
3. 推薦飯店附設的SPA，住客有special discount。我跟朋友做aroma massage and foot massage都很滿意，只是比較沒有個人隱私的觀念(兩人一起做的話，簾子最後會打開)。
4. 床非常好睡(軟硬適中)，是我在越南住的3種不同住宿地點中最舒適的。
review.comment_negative: 如果浴室可以有乾濕分離會更好。

review.rating: Phantastischer Service, gute Lage, top Stadthotel
review.comment_positive:
Außergewöhnlich sehr guter Service! Es wird einem jeder Wunsch von den Augen abgelesen. Alle sind auch sehr herzlich und kümmern sich liebevoll um jedes Anliegen. Kim von der Rezeption hat auch unsere Ausflüge und Transfer organisiert. Der Spa ist auch gut. 

Frühstück und Lage waren top! Die Betten und Kissen sind sehr bequem und es ist ruhig. Dass es quasi kein Fenster gab, hat uns nicht gestört.
The staff. Jerry and Kim did everything to make our stay as pleasant as possible - Our thanks to them and their colleagues.
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.rating: Good time in Hanoi thanks to the hotel location. Everything in walking distance
review.comment_positive: Very friendly and flexible staff

Absolutely amazing staff. They were super helpful during our stay and even moved us to a bigger room.
Hotel is also within walking quarters to Old Town and French Quarter but just outside both so it’s super quiet
review.comment_negative:
Hotel itself could’ve been a bit better quality
for 4 stars. We could hear loud pipes each time someone flushed their toilet. Could also hear
people from their room and the lift.

review.rating: Great little hotel in a wonderful location
review.comment_positive: Great hotel in a very convenient location, just a short stroll away from the lake. Very good breakfast served across the street in their sister hotel. Fantastic service from the team and a very big thank you to Justin and Grace for their special hospitality.

review.rating: Short stay, wish it could have been longer…. highly recommend.
review.comment_positive: It was clean, rooms were beautiful, all staff were lovely and attentive, breakfast was amazing, good location! I would highly recommend this hotel.
review.comment_negative: The room didn’t have a view, meaning it looked out onto the side of another building.  No one mentioned that in their reviews prior to our booking which I thought was interesting. However, there is enough natural light coming through, and so it was fine. However, I would not let that deter you from booking a hotel room at this facility. There were so many perks to the hotel that this is more of a comment than a criticism.

review.rating: Central location. Hotel was good and the staff so nice
review.comment_positive: Clean, super staff, central location
review.comment_negative: Breakfast

review.comment_positive: Wat een service en vriendelijkheid van hele team.Het hotel heeft onze excursies naar Sapa en Halong Bay geregeld, rondleiding door Hanoi, laundry en taxiritten. Hotel ligt heel centraal. Ontbijt is in tegenoverliggend hotel (zelfde keten). We hebben hier meerdere nachten gelogeerd tussen de excursies in.
review.comment_negative: Niets

review.comment_positive: accueil soigné et très agréable par la jeune équipe. Nous sommes venus au début du séjour puis à notre retour en fin de séjour. La chambre est très bien, au calme. le petit déjeuner est parfait, avec du choix et un personnel très attentif et compétent. Un grand merci à Justin et Henry pour leur accueil. La chambre à notre retour  a été préparée pour 9H du matin (arrivée en bus de HOI AN à 6H). Le petit déjeuner nous a été offert pour 6H30. Formidable.

The staffs were exceptional (especially Jerry) and hotel is good. 
Hotel is in good location , center of Old Quarter, Family room is big enough, Neat as well.
Very good breakfast.
Pleasent stay.
We stayed for 4 days (initially planned for 1 day).
Jerrry helped us alot throught out our stay. We booked the hotel only for one day.Second day planned to go for Halong bay cruise and thereafter to Sapa and return back to Hanoi and planned to checkin to a new hotel which is in same area. They allowed us to keep our baggages in hotel safe room until we return from halong bay and allowed us to refresh in hotel before heading to Sapa eventhough they knew we booked another hotel after return from Sapa. So we extented our stay in same hotel and cancelled other booking. Jerry helped us for booking tickets to sapa , arranging private car , booked Ninh Binh tour for us and finally arranged Limousine from sapa to hanoi.
All the staffs are very helpful and polite espesially Jerry and Dave, they  made our stay in Hanoi amazing.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Oasis en el paraíso llamado Hà Nội
review.comment_positive: Personal maravilloso. Tracy, Kim y ahora no recuerdo el nombre de la tercera compañera de recepción pero igual de maravillosa que sus compañeras y compañeros. He estado alojado en 2 fases en el hotel y cada cual mejor. Muchas gracias desde Ha Long Bay, nos vemos en un futuro próximo. Un abrazo.
Really helpful staff, helped organise transfer to Ha Giang and got our laundry cleaned within short notice. The room was comfy and quiet
review.comment_negative: No natural lighting but this is very standard for Vietnam and Hanoi

review.comment_positive: Everything was amazing. The staff was so kind and helpful. I have no words to describe how comfortable we felt in every second that we spent in this hotel. If i visit Hanoi again, i will not look elsewhere for a hotel. 10/10 !!!!!!

review.rating: Brilliant hotel with excellent customer service - thank you Grace and Justin
review.comment_positive:
This hotel has a brilliant location and the rooms are very spacious and nicely decorated. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Hanoi as you will be very impressed.

I don’t often do reviews, but I felt I need to with this hotel to show my appreciation. Grace was incredibly helpful throughout our stay and always went above and beyond! She helped me book trips and also recommended some fantastic restaurants. The customer service she provided was to such a high standard that I even booked to return to the hotel after the Ha Giang Loop. She is truly fantastic and brilliant at her job! 

At checkout we then had the pleasure of meeting Justin. He likewise was very helpful and really made us feel incredibly welcome. Justin is very personable and attentive. 

If you are looking for a well located hotel with excellent customer service, this is the place to stay.
Centrally situated. Staff are extremely nice
review.comment_negative:
No sound proofing to the room, I could not sleep the whole night. I could hear people slamming their doors and the elevator bells. 
Room doesnt have a window, extremely stuffy.
The AC didn’t work well

review.rating: it exceeded my expectation.. felt like i stayed in 5star hotel when it comes to service.. kuddos to all the staff who ar
review.comment_positive: Location.. everything is walking distance
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.comment_positive: i can’t begin to explain how friendly and helpful the staff are. i hope that the hotel management is somehow recognizing them for that. tracey and grace, thank you so much for everything. i wish you the best!
review.comment_negative: the bathroom is extremely small and once you take a shower, everything will be wet. they could put some more options for breakfast too.

review.comment_positive: Everything
review.comment_negative: No

review.comment_positive: The staff were extremely helpful before arrival and during the entire stay.

10 điểm cho thái độ của các bạn nhân viên khách sạn. Bất kể có vấn đề gì đều được các bạn giúp đỡ rất nhiệt tình, vui vẻ. Khách sạn sạch sẽ, không quá rộng rãi nhưng vừa đủ tiện nghi cho 1 chuyến công tác ngắn ngày.

review.rating: Highly-recommended for their 5-star service and accommodation
review.comment_positive:
Great buffet breakfast - They serve a good variety of breakfast options including but not limited to fruits, breads, cereals, vegetable salad, fried rice, noodles, different viands, and beverages, all of which are equally satisfying, and they change the menu everyday so you'll have other options to look forward to in the next day.

Peace and quiet - Yes, it's possible to have a restful evening even in the busiest area in Hanoi. Of course, you'll still hear if there are people chattering just outside the hallway, or when people inconsiderately slam their doors, but apart from those, it's total silence.

Beautiful room - Everything in the room and the bathroom just feels and smells clean, even when we never had it room-serviced during the duration of our stay it just always smell fresh.

Accommodating staff - Kudos to everyone manning the front desk, Jerry, Tracy and Dave who never missed to greet everyone with a smile and are very approachable. They're never hesitant to assist with anything, and they're just lovely to chat with. Didn't get the names of the doorman and travel agent but they too are equally charming.

review.rating: a serene oasis amidst the bustle, a delightful stay at Emerald Waters Hotel Valley
review.comment_positive:
Perfect location a short walk from the lake and the Old Quarters.
The staff went truly above and beyond to ensure a wonderful stay, always with a smile on their faces.
The room a big and confortable, impeccably clean and tastefully decorated. 
Breakfast was superb, served in the sister hotel across the street.
Overall, our stay was truly unforgettable, and I would wholeheartedly recommend Emerald Waters Hotel Valley!

Das Frühstücksbuffet war gut, es gab sogar Wurst!
Die Lage in der Nähe des Hoan Kiem Sees war optimal, da alles fußläufig erreichbar war.
Das Personal an der Rezeption war eine Klasse für sich. Sowohl Grace als auch Justin waren uns immer behilflich. Man konnte sich hervorragend mit Ihnen austauschen. Beide waren unglaublich freundlich zu uns.
Vor unserer Anreise hatte Grace die Touren in die Ha Long Bucht und nach Sa Pa mit all unseren Sonderwünschen hervorragend vorbereitet!
Auch Tracy und weitere Herren waren immer sehr hilfsbereit!
Dieses Hotel können wir weiterempfehlen!
review.comment_negative: Es war alles optimal!

review.comment_positive: העיצוב נעים, החדרים נוחים וחביבים, הצוות מאוד עוזר ונחמד.
Staff were so friendly, couldn't do enough to help!

review.rating: Really lovely hotel that exceeded our expectations.
review.comment_positive:
Clean, comfortable, excellent location, boutique and lovely friendly and helpful staff.

The hotel is the ‘little sister’ to the bigger Emerald Waters Spa across the road. It’s where you get your breakfast and spa treatments. Crossing the road really isn’t an issue I’ve walked much further for breakfast in larger hotels.

Hidden away up a small alley way, with mural painted walls, the hotel is quieter away from the street.

Our room was a good size, nice bathroom and well cleaned with good WiFi.

We really can’t recommend this hotel highly enough based on our experience and the service provided by Jerry, Grace, Ellie, Tom and the rest of the team who made our stay so special.
review.comment_negative: Nothing, it was all good.

review.comment_positive: Excellent place, very nice, clean and the furniture is beautiful.
L’accueil, l’emplacement, le calme de la chambre
review.comment_negative: Rien

review.comment_positive:
The staff was impeccable and definitely the highlight of our whole experience staying there. Kudos to the whole team and a special shoutout to the amazing ever-present, Grace and Justin! They were always happy to help with recommending places to eat / visit and truly made us feel completely at home with their warm hospitality and friendly chats. Five star service with a personal touch! 
The location of the hotel is great as well, situated in a strategic spot at the Old Quarters, with the beautiful lake just nearby and plenty of food options around. The room was clean and adequate, breakfast was great as well! We definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who wish to enhance their experience in Hanoi!

review.rating: The most helpful and friendly staff in any hotel ever!
review.comment_positive: I went in to this hotel based on the superb reviews on the service rendered at this hotel. I was not disappointed in any way. Ms Kim and Ms Grace at the reception were the best hosts I have had in a long time. Both of them along with the manager Mr Jerry recognized me and address me by name nearly all the time I go pass the reception area. They were helpful in many other ways, surpassing my expectations each time. The hotel itself is very functional, accessed though a narrow alley, but beyond the narrow alley is the best service that will keep you coming back. The sister hotel across the road, Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley and Spa, where the breakfast is served offers equally superb service, everyone I encountered there too was very courteous, friendly and professional. I will definitely return to this hotel anytime I am back in Hanoi.
review.comment_negative: I do not particularly like the fact that the access to the hotel is through a narrow alley, but honestly I am not perturbed by it, because one will soon forget about that the moment one gets into the hotel. It won't keep me from coming back to this hotel.

review.comment_positive: The property is excellently located in the old quarter. The staff Tracey, Jerry and Grace were brilliant - Tracey gave us so many good recommendations.

review.rating: A tranquil place of peace in an extremely busy city.

We were offered water and a shower, and the hotel driver took us to the airport for less than 300K. 
The room was small but well appointed, with a comfortable bed and the lovely addition of fresh flowers.

review.rating: Great Value hotel for Hanoi Old Quarter hotel!
review.comment_positive: The hotel is centrally located in Old Quarter of Hanoi. The front desk staff including Grace and Kim are very friendly knowledgeable about the area and will help with any issues or tourist advice regarding your stay. Very professional staff. Their English is excellent and even those that don't speak Vietnamese will have no issues communicating. My kids (12 yr old and 7 yr old) raved about the buffet breakfast every morning (located across the street). Western breakfast options available.. made to order pho and fried egg were delish.  The breakfast staff was also excellent. Hotel price was excellent value. I did alot of research about which hotel to book in Hanoi and this hotel did not disappoint. Vietnam tourism is recovering after the pandemic but don't hesitate to come. Great experience for my kids to see how people in other places live outside of a U.S. suburban bubble.
review.comment_negative: None regarding the hotel. Vietnam tourism is a work in progress and summer is super busy with kids being off and all. It's a bit of controlled chaos but that's ok. If you can handle a little chaos, the hotel provides a calm respite from the street noise and a great nights sleep.

review.comment_positive: Great stay at this hotel. Jerry was helpful from beginning to end with arranging transfers and checking everything was ok. Location is perfect for exploring everything in Hanoi.

It also has almost no sound insulation and can be very noisy.

review.rating: Overall, my stay at Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley was made truly special by the exceptional staff. I would highly re

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the beautiful Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley, and I must say that the experience was truly exceptional. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warm smiles and genuine hospitality from the staff. 

The level of service provided by the hotel staff was nothing short of outstanding. They went above and beyond to ensure that my stay was comfortable and memorable. Whether it was providing quick and efficient room service or simply greeting me by name whenever they saw me, the staff truly set the standard for exceptional service.

In addition to their professionalism, what stood out to me the most was their genuine care and attentiveness towards the guests. It was evident that the staff took pride in their work and genuinely cared about ensuring that every guest had a positive experience.

We had an Amazing Stay at Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel. The Rooms are Nice and quiet making it easy to relax in this busy City. The Best was the staff who helped us with our Trips, Transfers, Restaurant recommendations etc. Definitely a Great Place for Your vacation.

review.comment_positive: Lovely staff, so friendly and helpful. Great location. Nothing we didn’t like about this place.

review.rating: Gute Lage, super Team, macht Spaß!
review.comment_positive:
Die Unterkunft ist super! Das Hotel wurde vor Kurzem neu eröffnet und das Team ist wirklich sehr bemüht, dass die Gäste zufrieden sind. Direkt am ersten Tag wurden wir sehr herzlich empfangen und erhielten sehr hilfreiche Tips, um uns in der Stadt zu orientieren. Das Hotel selbst liegt ideal, um die Stadt auch zu Fuß zu erkunden (z.B. den Huan Kiem Lake, das Hoa Lo Prison, einige weitere Museen, das Old und das French Quarter oder einfach nur den Trubel in Hanoi).

Das Team tut wirklich alles, um einem zu helfen. So hat das Team für uns einige Trips für die nächsten Tage zur Ha Long Bay und nach Ninh Binh organisiert, die wir komfortabel direkt dort zahlen konnten und die super organisiert waren. Insbesondere beeindruckend war die Verzahnung mit dem Transfer: An jeder Station kam jemand auf uns zu, der schon wusste, wer wir sind und wohin wir müssen. Bei Rückfragen stand das Hotel Team immer zur Verfügung. Wirklich toller Service, über den eigentlichen Aufenthalt hinaus.

Dabei war das Team zu jeder Zeit unfassbar freundlich und herzlich. Das hat Spaß gemacht!

The hotel location is perfect. Right in the middle of old Hanoi and close to everything you could need. The room was lovely and very clean. Breakfast was great with lots of choice too. However, the absolute highlight of this hotel is the staff. From the moment we arrived they made us feel very welcome. Nothing was too much trouble . They gave us great restaurant ideas and were very knowledgeable of all Hanoi has to offer. We will definitely use this hotel when we return to Hanoi.

review.comment_negative: The room did not have a window but this was a minor issue and meant there was no street noise. We only had breakfast on one of the three mornings as there were other local places to try.

review.comment_positive: the staff went above and beyond, they were very attentive and friendly. I left my coat at the hotel and they helped me send it back all the way to London.
review.comment_negative: no window in the room, if I had know this I would have booked elsewhere.

review.comment_positive: 这家酒店的地理位置非常好！距离鸡蛋咖啡的创始店和最有名的Bun Cha餐厅只有200多米！而且酒店赠送的早餐很丰盛，强烈推荐鸡肉河粉和欧姆蛋！最后我要表扬一下他们家所有的员工！员工都特别热情，服务周到，特别是我办理入住时接待我的那位戴着眼镜的小姐姐，热心的考虑到我所有的行程，非常好！
review.comment_negative: 因为在老城区中心，所以是老房子，老房子难免有老旧和噪音问题，但是这一栋在胡同里面已经大大降低了外面摩托车的噪音了。优秀的员工已经能够弥补了他们硬件上的短板了。

review.rating: Brilliant thanks to grace and the team.
review.comment_positive:
Grace was fantastic she made our trip to Vietnam. She is a asset! 
We would love to have her working with us in the UK! 
She planned our trip to halong bay and looked after our every need and many questions. 
I am a frequent international traveller with work and I have not come across a better host than grace 10/10. 
Thankyou from Jack&Emily
review.comment_negative: Nothing it was fantastic - especially the shower!

review.comment_positive:
Als erstes muss ich hervorheben, dass der Service großartig war und die Mitarbeiter:innen einen herausragenden Job machen. Schon vor der Reise hat uns Grace sämtliche Fragen beantwortet und bei der Planung unserer Reise geholfen. Aber auch Tracy, Justin und alle anderen waren stets freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir haben uns immer gefreut, zurück in die Unterkunft zu kommen. 
Wir haben in Vietnam schon sehr guten Service erlebt, aber dieses Team hat es noch einmal ganz besonders gut gemacht. 
Außerdem war alles sehr sauber und die Betten sowie die Kissen bequem. Sollten wir wieder nach Hanoi kommen, buchen wir diese Unterkunft auf jeden Fall wieder. 
Vielen Dank an das gesamte Team
review.comment_negative: Es ist für vietnamesische Großstädte nicht ungewöhnlich, aber viele Zimmer haben zwar ein Fenster, dieses ist jedoch eher zum Innenhof oder in einen Schacht gerichtet. Dadurch kommt wenig Tageslicht ins Zimmer.

review.comment_positive: great location, great service. I accidentally left my laptop at the airport, and the staff (Huy Cuong) went about and beyond to locate it for me. I can’t thanks him enough :)

review.rating: 整個飯店的員工都很親切，也有會說中文的員工！遇到生日提前告知還會幫忙慶生～比起周圍的其他飯店非常值得去住！
review.comment_positive: 早餐的牛肉河粉超級好吃！
Personeel enorm gastvrij . Heerlijk ontbijt, Fantastische ligging.
review.comment_negative: De raam in de slaapkamer bleek op een muurtje uit te komen.  Geluidshinder op de lagere verdieping (ik denk kindje van personeel)...

review.rating: Great price in a great location with the most helpful staff
review.comment_positive: The property was very clean and the staff were what made the property. I cannot recommend this place enough.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive: services n staff
review.comment_negative: none

review.comment_positive:
Great stay overall! lovely, genuinely kind and helpful staff. They helped us booking an overnight  tour to Sapa and stored the luggage for us while we were away.
Good selection for breakfast, hotel situated in the old quarter easy to reach

Samen met mijn zusje verbleven in dit hotel voor de eerste twee nachten in Vietnam. Airport shuttle geregeld via het hotel, welke al op ons stond te wachten bij aankomst. In het hotel ontzettend warm ontvangen door Kim en haar collega’s. Ze namen uitgebreid de tijd om ons informatie te geven over de stad en te regelen wat we ook maar vroegen (simkaart, geld wisselen, vervoer naar Sa Pa). De kamer was comfortabel en had alles wat we nodig hadden. Bij het hotel zat ook een spa (aan de overkant in het andere hotel van dezelfde keten), waar we een heerlijke massage en gezichtsbehandeling hebben genomen. De locatie van het hotel is ook top, middenin the Old Quarter van Hanoi. Zeker een aanrader dit hotel!
review.comment_negative: Ik kan niet iets bedenken wat ons niet beviel, het enige wat wellicht iets uitgebreider kon, was het ontbijt.

review.comment_positive: Fantastic location. Great service. really nice room.

review.rating: Look no further - this is the hotel you should be booking for your vacation/stay.
review.comment_positive:
The staff is extremely hospitable, kind and very helpful. They made my family and I feel welcomed from the first day we entered into this hotel up until the warm goodbyes we exchanged when we checked out. They can assist you with any activities or tours you would like to book and also made some wonderful restaurant suggestions! Every single staff member is wonderful - you will be in good hands.

This hotel is also within the perfect location. It's in the center of the old quarter and is in a very walkable area with lots of restaurants, cafes and more. The room was lovely, clean and quiet. The breakfast buffet was yummy and had plenty of fresh food, with an egg station and a noodle station. I highly recommend the beef pho.

I'm sad that my stay in Hanoi was short, but I highly recommend this hotel for first time travelers or repeat visitors to Hanoi. I will gladly stay here again for my next trip.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive: the staffs are extremely nice and welcoming, mostly Mister Jerry, he made me feel like home. I would definitely recommande this hotel for its price and its comforts

review.rating: The accommodation at the Hanoi Emerald Waters Valley Hotel was, in a word, perfect.
review.comment_positive: The accommodation at the Hanoi Emerald Waters Valley Hotel was, in a word, perfect. The location of the hotel is brilliant, you are close to everywhere. There are many restaurants, cafes and ATMs in the area. The hotel staff is excellent, attentive enough, but not intrusive. They speak English without problems. The whole hotel team is willing to help in any situation, whether to recommend interesting places or to arrange a trip. From Hanoi we regularly went on excursions to the surrounding area and during our absence, they willingly took care of our large luggage. When we were leaving for Sapa and the train left at 10 pm, we could even take a shower in the hotel, even though we had long since checked out. The breakfast was unique, a mix of Vietnamese and western food, even during several days you could taste new and new tastes. Thank you to the whole hotel team for making our stay in Hanoi perfect thanks to them.

review.rating: Very good Hotel located in the Ciry Center of Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Extremely friendly staff and Very professional. The hotel is located directly in the city center, which makes it very handy to explore the french quarter Hanoi! The Staff will help you with a lot of things such as giving inside Information where to visit or finding the perfect day trips!

Het erg vriendelijke ontvangst door het personeel. De enorme hulpvaardigheid bij het beantwoorden van al onze vragen. De kamer was mooi ingericht, ontbijt is zeer uitgebreid.
Is rustig gelegen want ligt niet direct aan de weg, maar je bent toch in het hart van Hanoi.
review.comment_negative:
De hoofdkussens zijn wat aan de harde kant, maar dat is natuurlijk persoonlijke smaak.
Anders geen negatieve opmerkingen te geven. Zeer tevreden.

review.comment_positive: I have stayed at Emerald waters hotel valley three times now and will always stay when I return to Hanoi. The breakfast has so many choices, the hotel interior is beautiful but the best part is the staff, especially Jerry. We couldn’t leave the hotel one evening due to a storm and Jerry walked to find us dinner and bought us Pho out of the pouring rain, he really went above and beyond and we are extremely grateful.

review.rating: Perfect location with the nicest staff.
review.comment_positive: Very central. Staff was so kind and super helpful
review.comment_negative: The breakfast was not amazing but it was ok.

review.comment_positive: ホアンキエイム湖まで歩いていける距離であり、スタッフのサービスが非常に良かったです。
review.comment_negative: シャワーの温度の調整が難しかったです。

review.comment_positive:
The personal was absolutely the best. It was our first stay in Vietnam and we had to arrange money exchange, SIM card... they were always very eager to help and friendly. 
It is very close to bars and turistic atractions but in a more quite area, which was good. 
Room was clean and spacious enough (we didn't have windows but it was not a problem). 
They offered taxi transfer from the airport and since we hired the Ha Long cruise with them, the taxi was free of charge.

review.rating: amazing location in the old quarter with the best staff
review.comment_positive: the location was great. the staff were are professional, always happy to help and absolutely superb. breakfast selection was really good (note: you have to cross the road to get to the sister hotel directly opposite for breakfast).
review.comment_negative: would be great if the room is more sound proof but I always travel around with earbuds so I still have a very comfortable stay. it was a little confusing to switch the water supply from the overhead rain shower to the shower head but we got help from the staff who taught us how. (turn the tap inwards and the knob down).

review.comment_positive: Excellent hospitality from the staff here, one of the best in my travelling journey so far.

조식 맛집 인정
위치도 굿
특히 직원들 친절도는 최상임
review.comment_negative:
개선할 점 없음
이 가겨이면 다음에 다시 올 일 있으면 다시 갈거임

review.comment_positive:
The 3 female receptionist were fabulous. They were super friendly, polite, helpful and made us felt so welcomed. They were doing their job with passion and it is delightful to see. My companion got sick and one of them accompanied me all the way to nearby pharmacy to help translate the conditions so i could get the right medicine. How kind is that?

The breakfast buffet is quite good. The buffet cafe staff are friendly and helpful too.
review.comment_negative: My pre paid mobile sim card couldnt get any connection in the room. But since hotel wifi is provided and working well, it didnt bother me a lot. Might bother travelled who needed mobile line for sms and otp functions.

review.comment_positive: 위치와 직원 친절 만족도가 매우 높았습니다.
review.comment_negative: 방이 작았지만, 괜찮았습니다.

review.comment_positive: The location was very good, but the best part was the staff and welcomed they made us feel.
The staff was polite and nice. The location is also very good.
review.comment_negative: Nothing serious.

review.comment_positive: The hosts, Grace & James make sure that you trip goes beyond amazing, they will take time to explain the entire area of Hanoi from local perspective, will greet you outside and will help you with anything and everything. Perfect location, walking distance to the main market.

review.rating: Hats off to the staff for making our stay memorable
review.comment_positive:
The location was perfect. All major attractions were at walking distances. 

The best thing about the property was their staff - so so helpful and always available. The staff, especially Tracy and Grace (don’t remember others names but they too were good) helped us with so many things - ordering good food, booking local tours, buying show tickets, managing all our requests, basically everything that we needed. And not to forget, all their recommendations and suggestions were very helpful and not like other places where they try selling off their collaborators to earn commissions.
review.comment_negative: Since we were staying with our infant, we preferred a room with a balcony, i.e. an open, well lit space for him to feel at ease. The hotel did not have any room with balconies.

review.rating: Most wonderful staff and great hotel
review.comment_positive: The hotel was in a great location and the facilities were great! We stayed at this hotel on 3 separate occasions in between our tours. We were extremely impressed with the staff at this hotel. They were the most helpful, attentive, friendly and simply wonderful! We would highly recommend the hotel just for the staff.

Skews was perfect, de ligging, de kamers maar vooral het personeel. De receptie crew sas gewoon fantastisch. Grace, Jenny en de rest waar ik de naam niet meer van weet. Het was de perfecte afsluiting van een geweldige reis ❤️.
review.comment_negative: niets

review.comment_positive:
We were warmly welcomed at the hotel by Jerry and Kim. They were very helpfull and helped pack our bags to our rooms. The hotel was spotless, nice and cool and all the staff ware very friendly. The hotel breakfast was very nice and the beds comfy.
The hotel staff helped with booking daytours, our Ha Long bay cruise and got a free taxi to the airport. We loved everything about our stay and could't have had a better start in Vietnam. 
This was genuine the best treatment we had from any hotel staff.
review.comment_negative: everything was very good!

review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel liegt im Herzen von Hanoi, von hier aus kann man alle Sehenswürdigkeiten zu Fuß erreichen.
Wir waren sehr positiv überrascht wie ruhig die Unterkunft liegt. Das Bett ist komfortabel und wir konnten sehr gut schlafen. 
Der Service und die freundlichen Mitarbeiter sind ausgezeichnet, wir wurden sehr herzlich empfangen und man hat uns alle wichtigen Anlaufstellen von Hanoi genannt.
Wir sind wirklich durchweg begeistert und würden jedem dieses Hotel empfehlen.
Vielen Dank!
review.comment_negative: Nichts

review.comment_positive: Very friendly staff that made our stay so memorable - Grace has been very patient in answering all my queries regarding the tour bookings. We enjoyed our tours to Ninh Binh and Halong Bay. The rooms and breakfast were excellent too. Highly recommended.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: יחס מצויין מהצוות מלון חביב ונעים
review.comment_positive: הצוות מאוד נחמד. עוזר בכל נושא ומציע שירות אישי ואדיב.
review.comment_negative: לא היה חלון בחדר. היה מעט חשוך.

review.comment_positive: I really like the staffs ‘ institute. Everybody are very nice and helpful
review.comment_negative: Room don’t have a window

review.comment_positive: Hotel is very good located, in the city centre, very close to street food and Ho Thanh Nhan. Very friendly staff.

La struttura è situata in posizione molto strategica e con un rapporto qualità prezzo veramente buono! lo staff è veramente molto cordiale e disponibile, ci hanno aiutato moltissimo prenotando trasporti e attività. Abbiamo potuto lasciare i bagagli mentre eravamo in crociera di due giorni ad Ha Long Bay, e al nostro ritorno abbiamo potuto fare la doccia. 
Ci hanno dato anche la loro disponibilità ad aiutarci in qualsiasi momento del nostro viaggio se ne avessimo avuto bisogno. 
Un’accoglienza vernare speciale
review.comment_negative: La camera aveva un sola finestra molto piccola che si affacciava su un muro, quindi nessuna luce naturale.

review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel war sauber, Frühstück ausreichend, Personal sehr sehr sehr freundlich und wir haben unsere großen Gepäckstücke dort lassen können als wir für Ausflüge weg waren.

Auch nach dem auschecken haben wir uns in der öffentlichen Dusche abbrausen können.

review.rating: Good central location, staff were very friendly and helpful
review.comment_positive: clean and comfortable, good quality breakfast, staff were very friendly and helpful
review.comment_negative: no view from rooms

review.rating: Excellent value for those staying in the old quarter
review.comment_positive:
Loved the front desk staff, super helpful and just excellent all around. They know all the best restaurants that are authentic and not touristy, so ask them for advice.

Room was nicely appointed although I cheaped out and got one without an exterior window, I probably wouldn't do that again. On the plus side it was quiet.

Breakfast is served at their sister location across the street which was good.
review.comment_negative: It was actually hard to find, it's hidden in an alleyway and when you walk there you have to recognize the stores around it in order to figure out which alley you have to look in.

review.rating: Perfecto en el centro de Hanoi
review.comment_positive: El trato del personal fabuloso, nos aconsejaron sitios para visitar en la ciudad y nos ayudaron con la reserva de el transporte hacía otro destino de vietnam. La ubicación en el centro de la ciudad antigua genial para visitar hanoi. El desayuno muy completo.
review.comment_negative: No había ventana en la habitación pero ya lo sabíamos. Para una noche no nos importó.

review.comment_positive: Great and very helpful staff. Jerry, Tracey and David helped us with all our requests and booked the halongbay tour for us. The location was great and the beds very comfortable.
review.comment_negative: Our room did not have a real window.

review.rating: Il miglior hotel in cui siamo stati ad Ha Noi. La gentilezza di justin (Thain) impareggiabile e da sola vale tutti i sol
review.comment_positive: Tutto , è stato il terzo di tre hotel in cui ho soggiornatoad Hanoi ed è stato il migliore. Si sono preoccupati di tutto, anche di prendermi le valigie nell’hotel precedente.Justin, Thain, una persona meravigliosa. Solo lui vale il viaggio.
review.comment_negative: Tutto perfetto

review.comment_positive:
Pleasant experience from the time we landed at Hanoi airport.  I requested for transportation to be arranged a day before and everything was arranged perfectly.  
Check in was quick with welcome drink. 
The room was so clean, love the beds. 

Breakfast was not to bad. Two of us are vegetarian and delicous vegetarian noodle soup was prepared for us. 

The staff are simply helpful and made us felt so welcomed.  

Thank you for the wonderful experience.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
Vriendelijk personeel
Super locatie
review.comment_negative: Lawaai in de gang

review.rating: Stay in Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley for pleasant memories!
review.comment_positive: The hotel's location is at the city center and very accessible. Attractions and restaurants, cafes, are all walking distance from the hotel. The nearest bus stop is just a few meters away from the hotel. We also appreciate the dedication and service provided by the hotel staff. They're so accommodating they tend to spoil their guests. Thank you for making our stay a memorable one!
review.comment_negative: The only thing that we didn't like is the weather - it's so freakin' hot! I know it has nothing to do with the hotel but that's the only thing that I didn't like.

review.comment_positive: great location, amazing staff, super clean rooms

Lovely room and we were upgraded into a larger room unexpectedly which was a lovely surprise! the staff was very good, they allowed us to leave luggage while we went away to Halong Bay for 3 days! They also offered for us to have a shower after Halong Bay and booked a taxi in train station. These are the sort of details which make the trip so much more enjoyable and I honestly would recommend them!

The staff went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed. When my partner for sick they took me over to the pharmacy to ensure we got everything he needed. The hotel overall was basic but had everything you needed and a great location.
review.comment_negative: There was no window in the room we booked so next time we would book a room with a window

review.rating: In diesem Hotel bleibe ich gerne beim nächsten Besuch
review.comment_positive:
Sehr hilfsbereite Mitarbeiter! Preis/Leistung wesentlich besser, als im Hotel um den Eck mit ähnlich guten Bewertungen, wo wir 3 Nachte verbracht haben.

Reichhaltige Frühstück- da fehlt nichts.

review.rating: The staff was super friendly and welcoming!  Also great location !
review.comment_positive: Very clean and comfortable bed!
review.comment_negative: no windows (small narrow window that faces a wall about a foot away so no natural light) but it’s okay since I was out and about during the day

review.comment_positive: Great location. Very nice rooms. Very pleasant breakfast, but foremost - extremely helpful staff (Jerry & Kim) both during and after our stay. They made us come back to Hanoi several times during our vacation.
review.comment_negative: We managed by mistake from our top floor room to cut off the aircondition to all other rooms 😬

review.comment_positive: Os funcionários foram de uma simpatia execional!! O pequeno almoço era variado, e o espaço muito central e limpo. O nosso quarto não tinha vista, mas como íamos utilizar apenas para dormir não fez diferença. Não ouvimos o barulho da estrada o que foi bom! Adoramos a estadia.
review.comment_negative: Nada a apontar.

review.comment_positive: hotel was awesome and value for money, Dave & Kim were too supportive and make our stay super easy
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.comment_positive: Staff are friendly and  breakfast buffet spread are up to the bar. Love it and will definitely coming back for more... thank you.

Amazing staff. They go the extra mile. So friendly and helpful. Stored our luggage whilst we went to Cat Ba for 2 nights. Upgraded our room. Helped with recommendations on what to see. Very responsive on messages too! Booked our return taxi to the airport with them for similar to Grab prices (not inflated like usual hotels). Overall I would 100% recommend.
review.comment_negative: Could put a full length mirror in rooms, and maybe improved lighting to get ready.

review.comment_positive: Staff is very friendly. Room is very clean and spacious.
Le service et la communication sont super, la localisation est également très bien et on entend pas le bruit de l'extérieur. Les chambres sont propres et confortables. Un bon rapport qualité / prix
review.comment_negative: La salle de bain se bouchait très vite

review.comment_positive: Staff service was exceptional. Super friendly, accommodating, and organised. 10/10 would stay again because of the amazing staff!

The staff couldn’t have been more friendly and helpful. Our room was spacious, really clean and, as the hotel is slightly set back from the road down a quaint painted alley, it was quiet. Really lovely breakfast
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Good stay and value for money
review.comment_positive:
It’s cool and in the center of the city center - value for many - average breakfasts - nice staff - not noisy at all 

Lot of shops are closed to the hotels. Just couple of minutes walk
review.comment_negative: Breakfast could have more options, but it’s ok.

review.comment_positive: The staff were very accommodating. They engaged with us from the moment we walked in. The room was clean and had everything we required.
review.comment_negative: You did have to walk across the road for breakfast to the other building. Not too much of a bother but a slight inconvenience.

review.comment_positive:
La ubicación, en el casco antiguo de hanoi podías ir a todas las atracciones turísticas caminando, cerca habían restaurantes, cafés, un parque con una laguna y muchas tiendas

El personal super amable en especial la recepcionista, nos recomendo los platos típicos, los lugares que visitar y nos ayudo para contratar un traslado a halong bay. 
Aparte nos dejaron guardar las maletas todo el día después de hacer el check out incluso nos ofrecieron la posibilidad de ducharnos antes de irnos, para que nos fuéramos más cómodos. Increíble la calidad del servicio.

Grace us really nice and give us wonderful support with warm smile.
Room is new, clean and the bed is comfortable, I will definitely book this hotel again 😀

The hotel is very central. Jerry at the front office is just great. He helped us book an excursion to Halong Bay and helped us with some other excursions. We had a very nice stay in this hotel. Everyone is really kind and helpful. I recommend 100%.
extremely clean and very courteous staff. I fell sick during my stay and they helped me a lot. definitely recommend. great play to stay.

Le personnel était absolument fantastique, très gentil, très ouvert et serviable. 
La chambre était propre, conforme aux images, rien ne manquait.
L’emplacement est idéal.

review.rating: World class service- a must it you are in Hanoi!
review.comment_positive:
What's not to like? The hotel is modern, clean and stylish. But what makes it really special is the staff. From the moment I made the booking, Grace contacted me, offering help and advice for our stay. 
When we arrived we were met with a warm welcome and again Grace and Kim helped to book a massage in the sister spa hotel (across the street) and gave an excellent recommendation for dinner and places to visit. 
At the end of the stay, our flight was very late in the evening, but no problem! Kate and Jerry took care of our cases while we continued exploring and we were invited to use the shower in the rest room to freshen up before we left for the airport. 
I travel a lot for business and I can honestly say, this is probably the best hotel I've ever stayed in, for quality, price and hospitality that was second to none. 
I hope to be able to visit again one day
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast is across the street in the other hotel. Really not a problem, its literally yards away, don't let it put you off, the selection and quality is great

My main negative is that I could only stay one night!!

review.comment_positive: Great hotel. Exceptional service. Perfect location. Breakfast was also good.
review.comment_negative: The room could have been a little more clean. There were some black hairs here and there. But nothing that was really bothering us.

review.comment_positive: Khá ổn cho một kỳ nghỉ gia đình không yêu cầu quá cao.
la décoration de la chambre

review.comment_positive: De service van het hotel was uitstekend. Mensen waren vriendelijk en hielpen heel graag
Good location. The place was clean and the staffs were very very nice

review.rating: The most exceptional stay of our 6 week trip to SE Asia.
review.comment_positive: We both loved this hotel. It was fantastic and the staff were exceptional. They could not do enough for us. Breakfast was really good.

review.rating: I will stay again for my next trip in Hanoi. Very good location!!

員工真的非常親切，且樂於協助我們任何事情，給予我們很多幫助，房間乾淨整潔，而且真的很漂亮

review.comment_positive: Reception staff Super friendly , helpful. Best of the best

review.rating: Staff is excellent and value for money
review.comment_positive: Clean
review.comment_negative: Not every room got windows

review.comment_negative: Rengøringen i bruseren

review.comment_positive: When I first arrived at the hotel, I thought I was at the wrong place, because the lobby looked nothing like the photos on Booking.com. I was tired from a long journey, but sure, I'd want to cancel the booking and move to another hotel the next day, because it did not meet my expectations.  HOWEVER, after interacting with the staff on a couple of occasions, I was hooked by how kind, smart and engaged every staff person was! It was like visiting family.  They really go out of their way to help you, in every way you can imagine, with a warmth that is genuine. One night I got an allergic reaction to something, and one of the staff walked me to the drugstore and bought me medicine. They were so thoughtful and so kind I can highly recommend this hotel. It is not as beautiful as the photos and that should be corrected, but really a great "home" to stay. The location is outstanding. There are two excellent restaurants right on the block, and it's the perfect location for everything Old Town. Thanks all of you!
review.comment_negative: Pictures were inaccurate

review.comment_positive:
A Wonderful Stay in Hanoi Thanks to Grace and the Staff

We recently had the pleasure of staying in Hanoi, and our experience was truly exceptional thanks to the exceptional hospitality of Grace and the entire staff.

Grace, in particular, went above and beyond to ensure our stay was comfortable and enjoyable.Her helpfulness and assistance with everything we needed were invaluable. She truly embodied the spirit of Vietnamese hospitality, making us feel welcome and cared for throughout our stay.

The entire staff was equally professional and friendly, always willing to help with a smile. They made sure our every need was met and exceeded, contributing significantly to our positive experience.

We highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Hanoi. If you have the opportunity to be assisted by Grace, consider yourself lucky! Her dedication to guest satisfaction is truly commendable.

Overall, our stay was fantastic, and we owe a great deal of thanks to Grace and the staff for making it so. We will definitely return on our next trip to Hanoi!

Excellent location for exploring Hanoi. On the edge of the Old Quarter and the lake but set back from the road so very quiet.The staff were exceptional, very friendly and couldn't do enough to make our stay comfortable. Excellent breakfast. Good price.

review.rating: Geweldig hotel met uitstekende service en gastvrijheid
review.comment_positive:
Ons verblijf in dit hotel was absoluut geweldig. Nog voor we aankwamen in Hanoi werden we zo goed geholpen: ze hielpen ons met het regelen van een uitstap naar Sapa en Halong Bay, zorgden dat we opgehaald werden aan de luchthaven en beantwoordden héél veel van onze vragen. Ze waren echt een grote hulp. 

We werden warm ontvangen, mochten gratis ontbijten omdat we vroeg aankwamen, we konden een douche nemen, konden uiteindelijk vroeger inchecken én kregen een kamer upgrade. We kregen heel wat goede tips over de stad. De massage was heerlijk. 

Het personeel was altijd vriendelijk en bereid om te helpen, ongeacht ons verzoek. We verbleven hier drie keer tijdens onze reis, en elke keer voelde het als thuiskomen. Het personeel bleef met ons in contact wanneer we verder door Vietnam reisden. Dit hotel heeft een speciale plek in ons hart veroverd dankzij de persoonlijke aandacht en service. Onze toekomstige reizen naar deze stad zullen ongetwijfeld weer dit geweldige hotel omvatten. Bedankt!
review.comment_negative: Niks!

review.comment_positive:
The staff made it feel like it was home. The rooms were comfortable, and breakfast was also good.

Our bus to ninh binh got cancelled last minute and Kim helped us to arrange travel and extended support.

The rooms were really nice and the staff were lovely! Ecspecially the reception staff. We have stayed here twice during our visit to Vietman, we were sick on the first visit and they made sure they were there if we needed anything which was nice and even let us check in earlier when we arrived. Very clean and modern. Good location distance from attractions.
Very quiet and comfortable stay.  Incredibly friendly and helpful staff.  Great breakfast at the sister hotel across the street.

They helped us book excellent tours, stored our luggage during overnight tours and gave helpful suggestions for food and sightseeing.
review.comment_negative: The only drawback was that our "window room" looked out on another building only 3 to 4 feet (1 meter) away.  Also, some of the showers did not have doors, making it hard to keep things dry in the bathroom (although this is quite common in Vietnam).

review.rating: Excellent option for Hanoi, especially for first class service and breakfast!
review.comment_positive:
Staff were fantastic at this hotel, service was great from start to finish. Jerry organised our Halong Bay tour for us, as well as transportation to Ninh Bihn afterwards. Hi attentiveness in ensuring we got to not only our next destination (Halong Bay) but even the destination afterwards (Ninh Bihn) was amazing and hugely appreciated.

Breakfast was delicious! Best we had in Vietnam. Fantastic to get a fresh bowl of pho every morning, as well as eggs cooked to order. They also have a large selection of buffet items, both western and local options. Doo not miss the pho! 

Location was great, walking distance to most sites as well as restaurants and beer street. Room was large and clean, and we we were given a choice based on what was available when we arrived which was a nice touch. Have to mark the room down slightly as the AC was very loud. 

Would definitely stay here if we were to return to Hanoi, huge thank you to the whole team for your hospitality!
review.comment_negative: AC was very loud and I don't think we ever quite got it to work comfortably. The restaurant (in sister restaurant across the road) was closed for dinner while we were there which was a shame as the breakfast was fantastic so were keen to try more!

Fantastic location. Close to everything however what made it special was the service from Grace, the newly appointed general manager. She provided a 5* service along with her team.
The hotel rooms were clean, the service was great and breakfast had a vast selection. Grace personally got me soya milk so I could have a coffee as I'm vegan.
review.comment_negative: Nothing at all!

review.comment_positive:
Zelden zo’n vriendelijke en behulpzame mensen ontmoet als Jerry en zijn team. Ze stonden altijd voor ons klaar, dachten mee in mogelijkheden en hebben ontzettend goed geholpen met meerdere trips vanuit Hanoi. Wij hebben Sapa, Ha Long Bay en Ha Giang Loop via hen geboekt. Ook helpt hij met vervoer verder naar Ninh Binh en zelfs naar Hué als je wilt. 
Ontbijt is goed, genoeg keuze. Locatie is echt top in old town en alles is schoon en netjes. Misschien iets duurder dan andere opties in Hanoi, maar voor ons fijn om bij te komen na de lange vlucht.
Super value.

review.comment_positive: Smooth check in and given a welcome drink upon arrival. All of the staff were incredibly friendly and helpful with tips on what to do etc. Ellie, Kim and Jerry were all great and the rest of the team 🙂 It was lovely speaking to them each day. Jerry gave us great advice /info on the halong bay tours and we booked with the hotel. The room was very clean and had everything we needed as well as bed being comfy. Breakfast was across the road but wasn't an issue. Great choices and you can pick eggs, pho etc to also have made for you. We used hotel airport transfer which was organised smoothly. Also helpful with checking out process, storing bags etc. Laundry service was great too! Overall great stay and would highly recommend!
review.comment_negative: Nothing, we were happy with the stay.

review.rating: Sehr sauber, freundlich, gute Lage, super Frühstück!
review.comment_positive: Angefangen von einem außergewöhnlich freundlichen Empfang, bis hin zum reichhaltigen, guten Frühstück und den sauberen, komfortablen Zimmern war alles bestens. Alle Anliegen, sowie Touren oder Transfers sind über das Hotel buchbar. Sie haben sich per WhatsApp rührend um mein Wohlergehen gekümmert, sich immer wieder erkundigt, ob ich meinen Bus erreicht habe und ob alles gut ist. Das habe ich noch nicht erlebt! 20 Punkte! Die Lage ist perfekt um alles fussläufig zu erkunden.
review.comment_negative: Zimmer haben nur Fenster in einen kleinen Lichtschacht und lassen sich nicht öffnen. Ist aber absolut kein Problem, da man den ganzen Tag unterwegs ist. Die Raumluft ist trotzdem gut.

review.comment_positive:
Had a really great stay there! :) The rooms were clean, spacious and well decorated, so great to come back to after a long day out! The pictures match the reality. Plenty of toiletries, mini bar and room service to order food. 

I was served by Tracy who was amazing from the start! Super willing to help out with anything I needed and more and even contacted me after I had checked out to make sure I had arrived safely at my next destination in Hanoi. Super super grateful for that!

Perfect location, right in the hustle and bustle of Hanoi's Old Quarter. They also offer a taxi (or motorbike) service, which was super helpful if you don't have the local taxi app. 

I had a long day of trekking so wanted to relax in my room for the evening, the food was YUM! Solid selection of local cuisine and desserts. (The hotel's restaurant is actually located in their partner hotel opposite and they will bring the food to your room). 

On a side note, I was given an upgrade to the family suit! So as a solo traveller that was an awesome bonus! All in all a solid choice and good value for money in the heart of Hanoi! :D
