review.comment_positive: The location, decoration and the service of the staff
review.comment_negative: The entrance is a little hidden

review.comment_positive: Good location and services
review.comment_negative: Nil

review.comment_positive: Good location, in old quarter, but still you can get a good nights sleep. The staff goes out of their way to help you, very kind, warm and friendly. The room though a little small, is clean and well equipped with what one needs for a stay. Breakfast is at the sister hotel, on the opposite side of the street.  Plenty of options, delicious food. They provide luggage storage too. We would stay here again for sure, especially for their exceptional service!

The hotel is very central in the old town (100 meter from hoan kiem lake) and despite this is very quite and room are very comfortable, spacious and clean. What will not let you down are the amazing people working there. Highly recommended!
review.comment_negative: The breakfast can be improved for variety

review.comment_positive:
服務人員超棒，尤其是女性服務人員，到的第一天主動提供附近推薦的美食（實際嘗試過也真的很推薦），得知我們有搭夜車前往SAPA的來回行程，也提供我們免費寄放行李跟免費盥洗的服務，連浴巾都免費提供給我們，服務超棒
早餐是前往對向吃，也是第一間有提供西瓜汁的早餐飯店
review.comment_negative: 沒特別有不喜歡的地方

review.comment_positive: O hotel é 5 estrelas em hospitalidade, conforto, limpeza. Além disso, a decoração é cuidadosa e de muito bom gosto. A equipe nos recebe com muito carinho e atenção. Todos estão de parabéns!
Excellent again. Thank you team, for making our stay comfortable.
sạch sẽ, vị trí đi lại tiện lợi, nhân viên vui vẻ lịch sự
review.comment_negative: món tráng miệng bữa ăn sáng không được phong phú lắm

review.comment_positive: Good location, friendly staff.
review.comment_negative: Located  down a narrow alley...so a little hard to find.

review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel in a great area! Really comfortable stay for a great price. The staff go above and beyond to be helpful, extra special thanks to Mr Jerry and Kim. We loved it so much we are returning before we fly home.
very nice spacious room. very central location close to the lake in old quarter.
Very centrally located.
review.comment_negative: The toilets were a little small but manageable!

review.rating: The staff are really helpful and always care what you might need.
review.comment_positive: The location is very good
Friendly and helpful staff. Convenient location. Room was clean and quiet.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive:
Le gros plus de cet hôtel est la gentillesse et disponibilité de l’ensemble du personnel. Ils sont très bienveillants et attentifs à ce que tout se passe bien. 
La chambre avait tout les équipements et confort nécessaires et le petit déjeuner est très complet.
Vị trí tạm ổn, phòng ở mức chấp nhận được.

review.rating: Amazing stuff, good hotel, very cozy in a superb location.
review.comment_positive:
There was very nice breakfast, room is small but comfy. Location of the hotel - is very convenient in the historical center. 

The best part of hotel was staff - they are simply amazing! Helped a lot with tours , with knowledge about city and areas around, and just been nice and knowledgable.
review.comment_negative: Well, my room had window that opened in the place between two houses, like 40 cm till next wall. So I could not see natural light :-) not a big deal for me, but simply take into account that Hanoi Old Quarters - can have such specifics, and discuss this when booking.

review.comment_positive: El personal del hotel maravilloso, las habitaciones súper amplias y cómodas y el desayuno muy completo. Ubicación magnífica y habitaciones aisladas del exterior, sin ruido
review.comment_negative: El desayuno es en el edificio de enfrente, no es muy grave pero tampoco lo más cómodo. La entrada al hotel está oculta en un callejón y el hotel en general apenas tiene luz natural (al menos mi habitación y la recepción no la tenían). Sensación un poco claustrofóbica. Ruido de la nevera en la habitación

review.comment_positive: Ngay trung tâm phố cổ, từ khách sạn ra hồ Gươm rất gần. Phòng sạch sẽ, sang trọng, giá cả lại hợp lý nữa.

review.rating: perfect all round hotel in the old town of Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Such a great location right in the old town, walking distance from most attractions in Hanoi. Best part of the hotel is by far the staff- always accommodating and eager to help. A special mention for Jerry who has helped us massively in organising our trip and being a friendly face in the city! The rooms are clean and have great facilities and the breakfast is also very good.

Impeccable service👍
The staff go out of their way to accommodate your needs.

Wonderful experience here.
They arranged airport pickup and drop off service for us, recommended Minh Bing 1 day tour.
The convenience is worth the few bucks you'd save if you book online or directly with local tour agency.

I would come back again.
Super Lage, extrem freundlicher “stuff” thank you Grace, and all of you❣️

Breakfast was good 
it had mopst that you wanted

review.rating: Heerlijk hotel met lief en zeer behulpzaam personeel
review.comment_positive: Het hotel bevindt zich zeer centraal op een perfecte locatie. De bedden zijn heerlijk zacht en de douche is eveneens top. De kamer straalde een fijne sfeer uit, met oog voor detail. Het ontbijt wordt geserveerd in het hotel aan de overkant van de straat en had alles waar we behoefte aan hadden. Bovenal waren we erg dankbaar voor alle goede hulp van Jerry & Kim, die beiden zeer goed Engels spraken en ons met alles hielpen. Alle lof voor hen! Tip bij het boeken: boek een kamer met een raam. Daglicht is toch wel fijn ;)
review.comment_negative: Er was niets met de accommodatie. Enkel zouden wij de Ha Long Bay cruise niet adviseren, maar dat is persoonlijk. We verblijven liever in het hotel dan op de boot :)

review.comment_positive:
ארוחת בוקר
מיקום

A perfect location as it’s in the city centre! The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. We had a 4 day stay planned in Hanoi and Kim and Ella helped us with the tours and structuring our itinerary! we even took up their in house massage service which was excellent!
review.comment_negative: I expected the room to be a bit more spacious. But it didn’t bother us much as we were out for most parts of the day

review.comment_positive: Amazing Staff, very helpful, very insightful. I came at 3 am to check in and they helped me smoothly with that. Very clean rooms and amazing location!!.
地理位置好，人員十分親切，飯店早餐美味
review.comment_negative: 浴室排水孔偶有異味

review.rating: Close to everything and value for money. New Room and Helpful Staff
review.comment_positive:
Close to everything. 
Excellent and helpful staff (especially Miss Kim she is one of the best !!!). 
The Room is New and have a nice decoration.
Quiet room even in the busy area.
review.comment_negative: No small towel.

review.rating: The staff at Emerald Walters made our stay so much better thanks Grace and Kim
review.comment_positive: The Property was in an excellent location
Staffs are friendly and having service mild .
review.comment_negative: Location in convenience area ….

review.rating: Ottimo hotel in centro ad Hanoi con un ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo e uno staff eccezionale
review.comment_positive:
La location dell'albergo è ottimale, molto vicina al lago Hoan Kiem e alla famosa Beer Street, ma in una via non troppo rumurosa per cui si riesce a dormire e riposare benissimo. La colazione viene servita in un hotel della stessa catena, proprio di fronte alla struttura; la colazione è ottima sia per scelta del cibo che per qualità dello stesso. 
Ma la vera eccellenza di questo hotel è lo staff, sono stati professionali e sempre gentili già dalle prime fasi della prenotazione, in particolar modo Grace mi ha aiutata ad organizzare un tour a Sapa (che è stato perfetto). Tutti i ragazzi dello staff, dall'accoglienza alla colazione sono stati eccezionali, sempre sorridenti, gentili e pronti ad aiutare e consigliare.
Hospitality was very good, location is in old quarters, and staff is really very good....
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
We had a perfect stay. Everything was just perfect.

We had some trouble at the airport with our luggage. The hotelier Jerry helped immediately and arranged everything in 5 mins explaining every step. Was such a great help. After that he booked our activities and everything went perfect.

If you need anything ask for Jerry and he helps you so fast and competent. 10/10
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive: We only stayed for one night but the staff made us feel comfortable and we’re really helpful. They organised a taxi to the airport that was cheaper than booking on the Grab app which is super service!

review.rating: Highly recommended with exceptional staff friendliness!
review.comment_positive: Our 2 night stay was really comfortable. Loved the art-deco-type style. Breakfast was plentiful, varied and yum. Good location; walking distance to the lake and all the shopping and food entertainment. The staff was exceptionally friendly and went above and beyond to makes us feel welcome and comfortable. Upon request, they arranged a late free of charge checkout for us. Highly recommend the hotel for the price we paid.
review.comment_negative: As many hotels in Hanoi, our room had no window. I wasn’t an issue for us.

review.comment_positive: If you are coming to hanoi, it's best hotel you shouldn't miss. Staff here is very good and they treat you as family. Specially Jerry and his wife.
review.comment_negative: Everything was very good

review.comment_positive: The location of the hotel was perfect for exploring the heart of Hanoi. Walking distance to the weekend night markets and endless food options all around. The black and white theme of the room was also tastefully done, as it lent a warm yet regal feeling to the room.
review.comment_negative: Not a deal-breaker, but worth noting is that the breakfast provided was located in their sister hotel (only across the road). (I came during December where the mornings were 19 degree celcius)

review.comment_positive: The staff - Jerry, Kim, Grace and Dave - were exceptional in their hospitality and helpfulness. Nothing was too much trouble. Lovely, clean rooms and a very comprehensive breakfast buffet. Really useful to be able to leave our large cases in the hotel during our trip to Ha Long Bay. Central location in the old quarter, which put most attractions within easy reach. A great choice at a value price. We would definitely go back.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really to dislike.

review.comment_positive: Lovely welcome by staff and great to have their support on arrival to Vietnam
l’implication du personnel et l’emplacement

review.rating: Small, cramped room but excellent front of house staff
review.comment_positive:
The location of the hotel is within walking distance to most of the sights in Hanoi Old Quarter. 

The level of service of the frontline staff in Emerald Waters were of five-star standards.  Many times, they went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable, even helping to call local establishments to reschedule appointments for us.
review.comment_negative:
The room (deluxe double) was too small for a couple. The booking.COM website indicated that it is 25m square but I have stayed in 23m square rooms (also from Booking.COM website) that seemed bigger than Emerald’s Deluxe Double.

The housekeeping was also not thorough in cleaning our place every day. I still find clumps of hair in the room and water ponding in the toilet, after the room was made up.

review.rating: Pure Verwöhnung durch super herzliches Personal
review.comment_positive: Die Unterkunft war super lokal und die Zimmer waren schön und gemütlich eingerichtet. Besonders überzeugt hat aber das Personal. Wir wurden richtig verwöhnt von den Mitarbeitern (besonderen Dank an Ellie und Grace) und bei jeglichen Anliegen unterstützt. Wir bekamen tolle Tipps, Empfehlungen, Frühstück auf den Weg an den Flughafen, Transfer - einfach einen genialen Service!
review.comment_negative: Nichts waren wunschlos zufrieden.

review.comment_positive: excellents accueil et services.

review.rating: a perfect place to stay to experience Hanoi
review.comment_positive: perfect location! right in the action of Hoan Kiem but on a relatively quiet street. the room was clean quiet and very comfortable. and the restaurant food was far better than expected, especially the coffee!! the real star of our stay though was the staff, especially Jerry!!! he organized so many memorable experiences for us, particularly the street food tour, and overnight boat trip in Ha Long Bay. Whatever we needed, Jerry was happy to help, I can’t say enough about him.
review.comment_negative: nothing, we had a magical time, we’ll be recommending this place to everyone we know

review.comment_positive: Location was perfect for exploring. The staff could not do enough for us and were absolutely wonderful. They helped organise day trips, bikes, gave recommendations and were all round lovely people. We would definitely come back and stay here, even just to talk to the wonderful staff. The laundry service was very efficient as well as the airport transfer. Beds were incredible comfy and we slept very well (too well!!).
review.comment_negative: The only thing we didn't like was that there was no balcony, but it can't be helped in the centre of Hanoi! We still really liked the room despite this.

review.comment_positive:
Quiet rooms, comfortable beds, friendly staffs, good airport transfer service with reasonable price, various choices of delicious breakfast and of course  location closed to everything you need.

Thanks to all the staffs that are very informative. you guys did a very great job during our stay. We will surely go back again next time.
review.comment_negative: Nothing much, just a small area for improvement in the bath room of our deluxe twin. It'd be perfect if there were barrier between the shower area.

review.rating: Hidden Gem I’d come back to for sure
review.comment_positive: Strong WiFi, Great breakfast buffet, new and clean rooms
Siamo tornati dopo tre giorni e ci hanno fatto anche l upgrade della camera!sempre super  gentili!
Location and friendly staff.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Phải nói là thật sự rất thích Hotel này cho 10 điểm thì hơi ít ạ . Hotel phòng cực sạch sẽ và đẹp . Vừa đến trước cửa các bạn nhân viên đã kéo vali cho tụi mình và lễ tân phục vụ nhanh . Vừa tới đã cho mình nước chanh dây để uống và kéo vali lên tận phòng . Vô phòng thì phòng trang trí rất okie sang trọng , sạch sẽ , yên tĩnh cách âm tốt ngủ ko nghe tiếng ồn ào từ bên ngoài . ở đây cũng có thuê xe 180k/1chiếc xe khá okie . các bạn nhân viên rất support tốt và giá cả okie có cả đồ ăn sáng khá ngon . nói chung sẽ quay lại hotel này 💕😘
personell very kind and helpful. rooms clean and spacious
The staff was very kind and helpful. Grace is a nice person. One of our rooms has been upgraded for free. Breakfast was good.
review.comment_negative: Some rooms do not have windows.

review.rating: ideal para disfrutar del centro con un presupuesto ajustado
review.comment_positive: La ubicación y el precio, y por supuesto, la amabilidad y la profesionalidad del personal.
review.comment_negative: Aunque la relación calidad-precio es muy buena, no era lo que esperaba. Las fotos que vi en booking no reflejan para nada la realidad del hotel; es una cuestión de expectativas. La entrada al hotel es un callejón estrecho y la habitación no tenia ni ventana (bueno, sí tenia pero daba a un muro). La recepción del hotel, nada que ver con las fotos. Me gusta saber lo que compro, y aunque el hotel no está mal, no es lo que las fotos y la descripción prometían; mala estrategia de marketing.

review.comment_positive:
the staff is also a son of the owner, he is so kind and nice.
I need to check in at 9:30 for shooting a movie, and he supported to me to get a room earlier than usual. 
I like the decoration, facility and the staffs.
it’s in central of Ha Noi and convenience to go around, get some tranditional food, take eggs coffee and enjoy truly Ha Noi in autumn. 
just stay here in Ha Noi 2 days, after a busy day, I had a great time in the morning the day after.

Vom Moment der Buchung bis nach dem Auschecken bietet dieses Hotel um Jerry und Grace einen außergewöhnlichen Aufenthalt. Alles war top organisiert, von der Abholung am Flughafen bis zu einem Willkommensgetränk beim Einchecken. Jerry und Grace sind bei jeder Frage und bei jedem Problem (selbst wenn sie nicht den Aufenthalt betreffen wie bei mir zum Beispiel ein Inlandsflug) extrem hilfsbereit. Das ganze Team ist stets freundlich, höflich und hilfsbereit. Die Zimmer werden täglich gemacht und auch der Wäscheservice ist toll! Und der Kaffee beim Frühstück ist der beste, den ich je getrunken habe! Die Lage ist auch super, sehr nah am See und in der Altstadt. Klare Empfehlung!
review.comment_negative: Kein Fenster im Zimmer, aber das war vorher bekannt.

review.comment_positive: Khách sạn đúng chuẩn 4 sao. Ai cũng nhiệt tình vui vẻ, lễ tân luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ. Phòng thì sạch sẽ mọi thứ rất ok. Đáng tiền

review.comment_negative: trên booking nói có chỗ đậu xe nhưng tới nơi thì ko có.

review.comment_positive:
After finding our way there (there is a hotel across the road with very similar name) we followed a small beautifully painted and well lit hallway from the street down to the lobby. Here we were met by extremely kind and competent hosts. They immediately got us sorted and had our room ready even though we were a couple hours early. 
The helped us confirm our tour for the next day directly with the operator as well as had our washing beautifully laundered and could sort a airport shuttle for us without hassle. 
The breakfast was delicious (across the road at the other hotel with a similar name) and each one of the staff that I interacted with was professional and gracious.
The room was more similar to the photos than most of the other hotels we stayed at, although a little bit aged, but not much. The bathroom was really comfortable and well set out - lovely shower and gorgeous interior. 
The bedroom was spacious and comfortable with good aircon, comfortable bed and chairs, fridge, desk and little tables. There was also a cupboard and a very helpful safe to secure valuables. 
This hotel was in a really good location, close to so many great spots, restaurants, tourist locations, cafes and also a lovely lake to walk around in the evening. 
Would definitely recommend and if I visit Hanoi again, would hope to stay here again.
review.comment_negative: Not something negative, just to mention to other travellers so they are not as confused as we were - the hotel is at the end of a small hallway from the main road, there is not an obvious entrance and sign. but the hallways is very well lit and beautiful paintings to lead you to the lobby.

review.comment_positive: A great spot, very central and lovely staff.

The staff is really very friendly and helpful.
They will help you book all the attractions at the best possible price. 
Jerry and his team were always keen to help us for anything
review.comment_negative: Rooms have no Windows

review.rating: Best hotel and service in Hanoi!
review.comment_positive: The staff! Kim, Grace and Jerry made our stay unforgettable! They were so helpful, so knowledgeable and kind! We would be back and recommended 200% Also the breakfast was incredible, the spa, the rooms, everything!

We had the most amazing stay! Excellent value for money, superb location, clean facilities but most importantly the staff were amazing. We will definitely be back. I would also recommend booking their aiport driver. Thanks so much!!

Such a lovely hotel, very comfortable and great value for money. The buffet breakfast ( included) across the street was delicious and I really enjoyed my stay. The staff were exceptional, especially Jerry, Grace and Kim doing everything they could to help and recommend things to do. The hotel is also located in a great spot in the old quarter, only a minutes walk from the best coffee strip and two minutes from the lake.
review.comment_negative: A little hard to find initially as it is down a little alley off the Street

review.comment_positive: Kim, Grace et Peter sont absolument fantastiques, merci à eux pour leur accueil et leur suivi à la fois pour notre arrivée le premier jour et pour notre dernier jour. C’est de loin le meilleur service que nous avons eu dans nos hôtels au Vietnam je recommande à 100% et je leur donne 11/10. En plus l’hôtel est parfaitement bien placé, près du lac qui est piéton le week end, près de l arrêt de bus pour l aéroport. Les chambres sont très confortable, le petit déjeuné est très varié et bon. Encore un grand merci à tout le personnel.
Khách sạn mới, sạch đẹp, vị trí siêu trung tâm, đặc biệt hơn hết là đội ngũ nhân viên cực kỳ thân thiện, nhiệt tình hỗ trợ các vấn đề phát sinh như đỗ xe oto và tạo cảm giác rất thoải mái

review.rating: Great location and friendly staff. Recommended
review.comment_positive:
The location is pretty central. The front office staff was helpful on recommending things to do around the Old Quarter and city centre. They also helped me to booked airport transfer and it was reasonably priced. The hotel very accommodative by allowing me to checked in early without additional charges even though I arrived few hours before the check in time.

The breakfast was great and great variety of food. The room was clean and quite spacious. The air conditioner can be adjusted. Hot water pressure was good.
review.comment_negative: It was hidden from main street and I had to ask the front office of its sister hotel across the street on the location of the hotel. The room windows was facing a wall and no natural sunlight but it is not a big deal as the room size was quite large and I did not feel claustrophobic.

review.comment_positive:
The hotel is modern, clean and stylish. We were lucky enough to be upgraded on our second night but both rooms we stayed in were lovely. The location is great too and very central. 


Jerry and the team were so friendly and helpful. They provided us with advice on attractions and also arranged a airport transfer with competitive rates. 

I’d definitely recommend!

review.rating: Great location to visit Hanoi with everything in walking distance. The staff is very friendly , compliments to there hos
review.comment_positive: The staff is very friendly and helpful.

review.rating: One of the best hotel staff I have ever experienced
review.comment_positive: the staff was amazing!!! grace, Ellie, Tom and jerry, thank you so much for everything!
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.comment_positive: The perfect place to stay in Hanoi. Quiet, comfortable rooms, great central location, and exceptional service from Justin, Grace and the team.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Khá gần hồ gươm
review.comment_negative: Giường đôi nhưng 2 đệm riêng ghép lại nằm khó chịu: phòng số 803, xem lại giúp ạ

review.comment_positive:
We absolutely loved the exceptional kindness and helpfulness of all the staff members at the hotel.
From providing local tips to arranging taxis, the staff went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and satisfaction throughout our stay.
It was refreshing to be greeted with genuine smiles and warmth every time we entered the hotel.
review.comment_negative: There were no windows in our room 😞

review.rating: Little gem right in the Old Quarter
review.comment_positive: The reception team are utterly amazing - so helpful and efficient. The hotel is set back down an alley, so there's no noise from the street. Location is perfect for everything, with loads of cafés, bars and restaurants around. Breakfast was a good choice buffet served over the road at their sister hotel. The rooms are compact, but comfortable. The team looked after our luggage while we went off on a 4 day trek, then organised our transfer to Sa Pa which was super helpful. We'd definitely stay here again!
review.comment_negative: Our first room had no window, but apparently that's quite common for hotels in the Old Quarter. The team were amazing though and moved us to another room higher up which had a little window in it 😀

review.rating: Jerry and staff make you feel special, stay here without a thought
review.comment_positive:
- room was very clean
- bed super comfortable
- staff honest, mannered and extremely generous in help
- special mention for the manager Jerry who helped with our transfer to Halong Bay, Kim who made our day plan, Dave who helped with the currency exchange. Won our hearts with their professionalism and warmth.
review.comment_negative: - nothing I could complain about. They go out of their way.

review.comment_positive: the property is very close to all the atractions you need to see, the staff is very helpfull and it was a real pleasure to talk to them.

We had a wonderful stay, clean and comfy room, great breakfast. A big shout out to Grace and Jerry who were so helpful and the kindest reception staff we have ever met. They helped with local information and tour bookings and made our anniversary so special. We will come again!

The staff was very courteous and helpful.  Special thanks to Ms Grace who was in touch with me throughout my trip and ensured that we all were comfortable.  Hotel was centrally located so very convenient. We all had a wonderful stay !

review.rating: Heerlijk hotel met heel gastvrij personeel!
review.comment_positive: De gastvrijheid van het personeel was fantastisch! Jerry en Ellie hebben ons fantastisch geholpen met alle vragen die we hadden. Verder was de kamer ook fantastisch. Je zit gelijk in de oude stad en hebt alle toeristische attracties op loopafstand.
review.comment_negative: Niets viel tegen het was gewoon fantastisch!

review.comment_positive: Very Very kind
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
khách sạn mới nên phòng rất đẹp, nội thất sang trọng. Giường ngủ thoải mái, rộng rãi.
Nhân viên từ bạn lễ tân đến bạn bellman đều rất nhiệt tình và chăm sóc chu đáo
La propreté, et la gentillesse du personnel

review.rating: Wonderful hotel with very nice & friendly staff. Will stay there again next time!
review.comment_positive: Staffs are very friendly!
review.comment_negative: Location.

review.comment_positive: 人員服務態度非常好及貼心
スタッフが全員優しかった。困っていたら助けてくれました。
review.comment_negative: なし。強いて言うなら朝ごはんが向かいのホテルだったこと。

review.comment_positive: Hotel molt ben situat per visitar la zona del llac de Hoan Kiem i tot l'ambient que es desplega els caps de setmana pels voltants. L'esmorzar se serveix a l'hotel que hi ha just creuant el carrer i és molt complet i deliciós. Tot el personal es mostra extremadament amable. La nostra habitació era força espaiosa i disposava d'un parell de butaquetes per poder llegir i descansar després de recórrer la ciutat, qüestió que valorem molt en les nostres estades.
review.comment_negative: Cal tenir en compte que l'hotel està encaixonat en un passatge i això té una part positiva que és el silenci i la tranquil.litat però també una de negativa que és la manca de llum i de vistes des de les finestres.

review.rating: Friendly hotel that offers great value for money.
review.comment_positive: We stayed in both the Emerald Waters Valley and their sister hotel the Emerald Waters Hotel and Spa just across the road. The hotel is centrally located for exploring the Old Town and is excellent value for money. The most impressive thing about the hotel though is undoubtedly the staff were are so helpful and attentive. The manageress Miss Grey was particularly outstanding and we will definitely return to this hotel if we visit Hanoi again. Definitely recommended.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
Je vais probablement répéter un peu ce que d'autres ont dit, mais cela confirmera une fois de plus la qualité de cet établissement..
Quel accueil, quel service, quel dévouement, quel respect, quel petit déjeuner.. J'ai rarement connu une telle qualité hôtelière à ce prix! 
Merci à toute l'équipe qui a été super avec nous, ce qui est rassurant quand on arrive pour la première fois au Vietnam avec une petite fille de 4 ans! Bravo à vous tous!
review.comment_negative: Franchement, je ne vois pas, pas à ce prix-là !

review.comment_positive: Grace the hotel manager was awesome. She helped us out a lot with everything we wanted to do in Hanoi - booking water puppet shows, food recommendations, airport transfers.

ngon, đa dạng món

review.comment_positive: Really great staff who looked after me well. Clean rooms, good location and best breakfast option I have had during my holiday. Even organized cheap transport to airport. Well done team !!

review.rating: Beautiful Hotel and Room, close to the central city
review.comment_positive: i would like to say thanks to all Hotel's staff,
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: the staff and kindness
review.comment_negative: having a window showing only the wall of the house in front, the description was "city view" !

review.comment_positive: Everything! Great location, great staff, great room, great breakfast. I even left my book in our room and the staff had it ready for me to pick up the following day.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive: Địa điểm ở gần nhiều khu có thể đi bộ tham quan du lịch. Phòng sạch sẽ, nhân viên nhiệt tình chu đáo.
review.comment_negative: Mong khách sạn có thể sửa phòng mới hơn.

review.rating: I really loved the hospitality. Kim, the receptionist really went an extra mile to make us feel comfortable. not just Ki
review.comment_positive: everything was available and nearby to markets etc
Great location. Very helpful staff

review.rating: Adequate for a short stay at old quarter hanoi.
review.comment_positive: Quite basic breakfast. Ala carte items available.
review.comment_negative: Rooms were quite rudimentary.

review.comment_positive: 위치가 너무좋아 근처를 걸어서 또는 그랩으로 짧게 이동가능하며 직원들이 너무 친절하셔서 있는동안 아무런 불편함없이 잘 쉬었네요..듣던대로 조식도 훌륭하고 필요한건 뭐든 해결되었던 호텔이었네요

Das Hotel hat meine Erwartungen übertroffen. Zum einen ist das Personal aufmerksam, hilfsbereit und spricht fließend Englisch. Besonders gut gefallen hat mir die Sauberkeit des Zimmers. Die Lage ist ebenfalls sehr zentral direkt am Hoan-Kiem-See. So kann man fußläufig bereits einige Attraktionen besuchen. Für alles andere gibt es Grab. Das Frühstück im gegenüberliegenden Gebäude war in Ordnung. Der Fokus liegt Vietnam-typisch eher auf warmen Speisen. Ebenfalls Vietnam-typisch schmeckt der Kaffee auf Grund der verwendeten Robusta-Bohnen sehr kräftig.
review.comment_negative: Zimmer sind hellhörig

review.comment_positive: 하노이 호안끼엠 호수 근처에 있어서 여러가지로 편리했습니다.

This is a lovely hotel very good location in Hanoi staff are fantastic and will help you with anything you need.We stayed here on three separate occasions as we went to ha Giang and Ha Long we was able to leave our luggage with them and have our washing cleaned our Hotel arranged all our travel  to Ha Giang and Nihn  Bihn it made our stay so much better not having to arrange ourselves 10/10
review.comment_negative: All good no complaints

review.comment_positive: The breakfast was good, the hotel nice
review.comment_negative:
There were no windows in the room, like a basement. 
It's ok for one night but not longer.

review.comment_positive: friendly stuff, very comfortable to live here

review.rating: A wee gem in the heart of Hanoi
review.comment_positive:
From arrival to departure Kim, Ellie, Grace, Jerry & the rest of the team at the Emerald Water Valley Hotel made us feel relaxed, safe, the hospitality second to none & always met with a smile. Laundry & room service was impeccable. Our trips were booked promptly & professionally with recommendations from Jerry, this made our trip the most memorable. The hotel itself if situated near the lake and is walking distance to most sights, which again are recommended highly by the staff, all very knowledgeable and passionate about the culture & country. We highly recommend a stay here & it deserves 5 stars. To all the team at Emerald Water Valley Hotel, its not goodbye, its see you soon. 
Nikki & David
El personal fue muy atento
review.comment_negative: No tenía ventanas

review.rating: Wonderful, friendly hotel in the heart of the old quarter. Happy to return when we are back in Hanoi in a week before he
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is well located and the staff are super helpful. Kim was particularly helpful in showing us some places we might like to visit, telling us about the spa and organising our bus to Sapa. Everything is thought of. 

We were struggling to get in contact with another hotel we are staying with in a few days and Jerry phoned ahead for us to make sure they’d received our deposit and we’re actually expecting us.
review.comment_negative: We enjoyed everything about our stay.

review.comment_positive: Staffs are excellent, honesty and helpful. Try their best to assist when you need. Highly recommend.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast in opposite hotel. Inconvenience if rain.

review.rating: We had an amazing time here at Hanoi emerald waters. What made our stay so incredible was the staff at the hotel. They p
review.comment_positive: The facilities were great and clean, the staff were incredible and the location of the hotel was amazing.
Friendly and helpful staff, amazing breakfast.
Nice staff. Great location. The hotel kindly held our suircase for us when we went on a trip for 2 nights so that really helped us out.
review.comment_negative:
no point in the window that was actually there as it was right in front of a wall so it did make the room feel quite closed in.
Shower is to close to the toilet.
We got back from a trip in the early hours and we were told we would get a room as soon as possible, we waited in the reception for hours while 2 guys were sleeping in the back room. another couple turned up an hour and half later than us and got a room sooner, we didn't understand what they were saying to eachother but he offered us breakfast to get rid of us while he gave the other couple a room. thought it was quite rude considering he new how long we had been waiting.

review.comment_positive:
Great location,  very clean,  nice and comfortable furnishings. 
Breakfast in the sister hotel opposite was excellent. Staff were truly attentive and caring.
review.comment_negative: Room did not have proper windows.

review.rating: Great gem of a boutique hotel.
review.comment_positive:
The room is clean and very artistically furnished. Sufficiently spacious for the many bags I have.
Location is central and yet quiet. Within walking distance to the touristy spots and the lake.
Plenty of delectable local food in the neighborhood available at any time throughout the day.
review.comment_negative:
Entrance to the hotel is inconspicuous among a row of shops. 
But once you know it, this is not a problem.

review.comment_positive:
Very helpful staff, once they saw that I am 6’5 they moved us into a bigger room for comfort.

Cannot fault them they are very helpful.
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast is served over the road, this is not a problem but be aware that you will need to cross and come back.

No window to the outside, but not an issue as using the AC and exploring Hanoi you won’t be looking out of the window anyway.

review.comment_positive: Friendly and helpful staff, good location

The staff is very friendly and helpful - they helped us with reservations for transport and trips and they were always available to answer all our questions. They also helped us to get a local SIM card with a very good data plan.
The breakfast is served in the "mother" hotel, which is vis-a-vis. The breakfast is very good and diverse, including many buffet choices + custom orders. The restaurant where the breakfast is served is classy, super-clean and the staff is very friendly.
The room and the bathroom had an elegant design and they were properly cleaned each day.
As we booked a 2 days - 1 night trip with them, they offered us free transportation to the airport when we left the hotel.
The SPA package was really relaxing.
All in all, we had a great experience!
review.comment_negative: The room had only one small window without outside view and the artificial light was not enough.

review.comment_positive: 部屋は清潔で、朝食も美味しかったです。何よりもスタッフの対応が素晴らしかったです。洗濯サービスや荷物の預かりサービスもあって大変便利でした。また旅行をする機会があったら、利用したいと思います。ありがとうございました。

Magnifico, en recepción nos atendieron maravillosamente. Además nos permitieron aún habiendo dejado la habitación ducharnos Eda tarde y descansar en una sala antes de coger el avión. El desayuno fantástico y el hotel súper céntrico. Volvería a repetir!
review.comment_negative: Nada, todo fue perfecto.

review.rating: Great stay and value for money
review.comment_positive: The staff were extremely friendly and helpful
review.comment_negative: The entrance to the hotel is not very obvious

review.comment_positive: Az ár-érték arány, az elhelyezkedés, a személyzet kedvessége, figyelmessége, előzékenysége, a reggeli mennyisége és minősége. A hotel manager Grace áldozatos segítőkészsége és kiváló szervező készsége.
Great location. Very good value for price. Amazingly accommodating staff. Good breakfast. The hotel arranged for us good tours for a good price.
review.comment_negative: To reach the breakfast restaurant is a little uncomfortable for a family with kids since you have to cross the street to get to breakfast (not an easy thing in Hanoi).

review.rating: Comfortable and central stay with excellent staff and service!
review.comment_positive: Excellent friendly staff. Great hotel breakfast (although was at the sister hotel across the street). Allowed late check out at 1pm which was much appreciated. Organised transport for me to the airport which was at a competitive price compared to Grab! Staff waived the debit card fee when paying for my stay which was super generous!
review.comment_negative: Bed not very soft, and the bathroom setup is just a shower and toilet with no divider or curtain which means the whole room can get very wet - but overall these are minor complaints.

review.comment_positive: good hotel with good memories...

スタッフさんがとても親切でした。
３:45 am チェックアウトにもかかわらず、朝御飯の用意をしてくれました。

毎日朝御飯が、美味しかったです😌

アクセスも、よかったです。

Preis-Leistung war in diesem Hotel sehr gut. Das Personal war sehr, sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. 
Frühstück war super. Es wird im Hotel gegenüber serviert, aber das war gar kein Problem für uns. 
ein großes Danke geht auch Justin & Stacy. Vielen Dank!
review.comment_negative:
Es gibt keinen Duschvorhang, sodass das Bad schnell nass ist. 
Ansonsten hat uns alles gefallen. Wir waren zweimal da und hatten einmal ein Zimmer „ohne“ Aussicht / Fenster zur Wand und einmal mit Aussicht. Wer sich schnell eingeschlossen fühlt, sollte das Zimmer mit Aussicht wählen. Für uns war beides gut.

review.comment_positive:
The service is the hotel was amazing. They really helped us a lot, with arranging sim cards and travel plans. They were really kind and welcoming. 
Breakfast was also good! Only had to walk across the street to the sister hotel for this
review.comment_negative: Only thing I can say that was less good was that the rooms are quite noisy. You hear quite well when people are in the hallway passing by. For us this was not an issue but might be for light sleepers.

review.rating: Phenomenal staff, great room and perfect location!
review.comment_positive: Absolutely spectacular staff, who were really helpful and kind. The room was always clean and comfortable, no issues with the bed or pillows either. The room is of a good size and the location of the hotel ideal.
review.comment_negative:
The sink was in the same room as the bed, which isn't ideal if someone gets up or sleeps at a different time. 
Elsewhere, maybe due to poor insulation at the door, others could easily be heard, especially when they were making noises in the corridor. Not the hotel's fault, though!

review.rating: Schönes zentrales Hotel mit gutem Preis-Leistungsverhältnis
review.comment_positive:
Ein gut gelegenes und sauberes Hotel in Hanoi. Das Hotel ist zwar klein und simpel, aber trotzdem modern eingerichtet. Besonders hervorzuheben ist das freundliche und zuvorkommende Hotelpersonal. Die Restaurantempfehlungen waren grandios. Außerdem sind die Damen im Spa super lieb und um jeden Gast bemüht.
Natürlich war das Frühstücksbuffet auch sehr umfangreich und gut.
review.comment_negative:
Kein Außenfenster (wie bei den meisten Hotels in Hanoi).

Hinweis (keine Kritik): getrennte Schalter für das Badezimmer für Abluft und Licht wären toll.

review.comment_positive: All the staff is very kind and helpful. They can speak english fluently and help me so much. Thank you for all the front desk staff. I love the hotel and will plan to be back again to Hanoi.

review.rating: nice hotel in the old city center
review.comment_positive: very friendly staff, located directly in the city center.

review.rating: Beautiful stay in Hanoi with lovely staff
review.comment_positive: Could not have nicer staff. They are the friendliest most caring, helpful people Ive ever encountered in hotel staff!! The whole team is superb!  The free breakfast is very good and so many options! THe rooms are clean, comfortable and the showers are so nice!

review.rating: Good for short stay. Amazing location.
review.comment_positive: The breakfast was delicious! Made to order chicken pho was the start to my day everyday.
review.comment_negative: no windows should be advertised & roach in room last day.

review.comment_positive: Nhân viên thật sự nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ khách hàng

- Freundliches Personal
- Gute Lage
- Gute Tipps zur Erkundung der Stadt + Essen!
- Zimmer war ohne Fenster und somit trotz zentraler Lage leise zum Schlafen. Haben das Fenster nicht vermisst
- Gutes SPA Angebot 
- Gutes Frühstück (Pho, Obst..)
櫃台員工服務友善親切，早餐豐盛美味，飯店地點離中心景點步行即可到達。
very friendly staff, tasty breakfast, excellent location. thank you :))

Địa điểm rất thuận tiện , phòng sạch sẽ và đẹp 
Nhân viên dể thương và vui vẻ, 
Gia đình mình rất hài lòng 🌷
Das Personal ist sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich.

He viajado por todo el mundo y en este caso quiero resaltar algo q antes no me habia sucedido y es valorar la amabilidad de todo el personal y agradecerles por la calida estancia que hemos pasado en hanoi.
Hasta en el detalle de nuestro check out con el deayuno preparado para llevarnos ya q nuestro avion salia muy temprano y acompañarnos hasta el taxi y saludarnos hasta q el mismo se alejo.
Espero q no pierdan esos valores que hacen la diferencia 
El hotel esta bien en relacion calidad precio,bien ubicado y buen desayuno.
Para todo el personal nuestro agradecimiento y esperamos volver a verlos pronto.
The lady on reception grace,was a wonderful person could not have been more helpful 👍

Very good location. Just beside the lake.
The highlight of the trip is the enthusiastic service we received from Manager Jerry and other staff, which deserves the highest rate. They are so considerate and warm, always try to help, which let us feel relaxed and just like at home!

review.rating: comfortable bed nice clean toilet room has a good space
review.comment_positive: noce snd cozu
review.comment_negative: the room design is beautiful

review.comment_positive:
Überaus freundliches Personal!!!
Das Frühstück war vielfältig und frisch!
Super Lage!

L'établissement est très bien situé, les chambres sont au calme. Le personnel est particulièrement serviable et chaleureux. Le petit déjeuner est copieux et excellent. Le service de lessive est rapide et efficace.

The hotel is in the old quarter very well located away from the noise. The beds are comfortable. The rooms are quiet and cosy. The best part is the staff. They went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. We are coming back to stay with them again next week :)
Also recommend the Vietnamese massage!

review.rating: Very good and comfortable stay with good hospitality
review.comment_positive:
The property is located at the prime location in Hanoi.
The hospitality is top notch and one of the best I’ve come across in my years of travelling.
The room is cozy but beautifully done and looks very sophisticated.

We had a 3 nights stay and were attended by Justin and Grace, who are so so good with their professional behaviour and excellent hospitality, doing their best to make guest comfortable and support with the best tours, local information, food options etc. Always welcomed us with their warm smiles.
Breakfast spread was good with both vegetarian and non vegetarian options.
Insbesondere die Mitarbeiter und Lage des Hotels sind super! Auch das Frühstück und die Zimmer sind sehr gut.

Sehr gastfreundliches und hilfsbereites Personal, leckeres Frühstück und eine absolut großartige Lage - Fußläufig zu allen möglichen Dingen im Old Quarter und trotzdem nachts sehr ruhig! Habe außerdem diverse Ausflüge und Airporttransport durch das Hotel gebucht, alle hat wunderbar geklappt, passte preislich und war gut organisiert.
review.comment_negative: nichts

review.comment_positive:
Was the second stay during a 2 week trip to Vietnam 
.

Tout était parfait. Personnel aux petits soins, toujours disponible pour des conseils. Notre chambre a été upgradé à notre arrivée, elle était spacieuse, belle et propre. Déjeuner bon et varié. Emplacement parfait également, proche de tout.
Hospitality

review.rating: Flott hotell med det beste personalet
review.comment_positive: Rent og fint hotell med super beliggenhet, komfortable senger og god frokost. Utrolig hyggelig personale og utmerket service. Kommer gjerne tilbake hit en annen gang!
review.comment_negative: Ingenting

review.rating: emplacement parfait pour visiter Ha Noi
review.comment_positive: emplacement idéal, personnel adorable et aux petits soins !
review.comment_negative: nous avions choisit une chambre avec fenêtre, nous avions bien une fenêtre mais qui donner sur un mur en béton a 1 m de la fenêtre

review.rating: A comfortable, clean, welcoming hotel in the middle of old Hanoi
review.comment_positive: The staff was so warm, welcoming, and helpful. The location was perfect, within walking distance of hundreds of restaurants, bars, and markets. The lake was about a 4-minute walk away and was a hub of activity in the evenings and on the weekends. Breakfast was delicious. AC in rooms was very effective.
great staff, great breakfast, location is perfect!

review.rating: Stayed twice in this hotel while in Vietnam. Great value for your money.
review.comment_positive: Perfect stay in Hanoi. Great location, helpful staff and clean/ comfortable rooms. Great breakfast as well.
review.comment_negative: All was great.

review.rating: Staf yang sangat ramah, sarapan yang enak.
review.comment_positive: Lokasi yang strategis karena berada di kawasan Old Quarter. Restoran di sekitar hotel sangat banyak. Semuanya di kawasan Old Quarter dapat dicapai dengan berjalan kaki. Kamar hotel sangat tenang, air panas nya bekerja dengan baik. Staf sangat ramah dan sangat membantu. Ms. Grace & Mr. Justin serta Ms. Jassy selalu memastikan kenyamanan saya sebagai tamu hotel. Five star services.
review.comment_negative: Nothing - I loves the hotel and the staff so much.

review.comment_positive: The place is really nice and very central, everything is in walking distance. But what really stood out was the hospitality. Staff was super nice and friendly, I did stay there twice and when ai checked in the second time it felt like coming home.

- The staff was exceptional! Did literaly everything for us: carried luggage (don't even try to do it yourself), arranged transfers and helped us with a simcard. They really do what they say: make it easy for you. Thank you all, we hope your bosses value you as much as we do.
- Location is great in the old quarter. You can do everything by walking.
- It's very quiet at night, eventhough you're in a busy center. My husband is a light sleeper, but didn't hear a thing. Maybe the no windows helps.
review.comment_negative:
- The breakfast is ok. But the coffee doesn't taste like coffee. But there are 4 different kind of  nice fresh fruits.
- Not very uncommon in Asia, but the bed is a bit short for the average European: 1.80m in lenght.
- Just to prevent false advertisment: we don't think the room is 25m2. From what we measured is was more 4x4 (16m2). The room was still big enough for us because of it's efficient interior.
Those are all little things and for the price you do get good value.

review.rating: Toller Start in die Vietnam Rundreise
review.comment_positive: Tolle Unterkunft mit außergewöhnlichen Personal! Das Hotel hat die perfekte Lage in Hanoi, um vieles zu Fuß zu erledigen. Es ist wirklich sehr gut ausgestattet, uns hat es an nichts gefehlt. Das Personal ist sehr herzlich und zuvorkommend. Vielen Dank an Tracy, Grace und (wir glauben er hieß) Jerry für die vielen Informationen und eure Unterstützung. Wir konnten während eines 2-tägigen Trips durch die Halong Bay auch unkompliziert unser Gepäck im Hotel lassen.
review.comment_negative: Wir hatten ein kleines Fenster im Zimmer, was jedoch nicht wirklich zum lüften geeignet war. Die Klimaanlage funktionierte jedoch einwandfrei. Unser Zimmer lag sehr nah am Aufzug, weshalb man die Töne/ Signale, wenn der Aufzug eine Ebene erreichte, besonders auch am späten Abend sehr häufig hörte. Das war etwas nervig.

review.comment_positive: Cleanliness, staff hospitality, breakfast, price, everything was beyond expectation!
review.comment_negative: none

review.rating: Excellent stay , central to everything in Hanoi ,Highly recommend!!
review.comment_positive:
My stay in this property was extremely good. The staff, in particular, are exceptionally good, special mention Jerry and Kim. They are so pleasant and made me feel like they are my friends. I had to return to Hanoi multiple times and every time I just contacted Jerry and he took care of everything including my airport pickup and drop.

Now about the Hotel, this is a five-star property in terms of breakfast, comfortable and clean rooms, and all facilities like laundry, room service, and valet available at all times. Breakfast has lots of options for veg/non-veg alike. On top of it, it is CENTRAL to everything in old quarters, the market is hardly 500m walking distance and riverside part is 5 mins walk. I was in Hanoi for 3 days and I was able to cover everything important just by walking, if you want to go further Gojek/Grab is available as well. You can also check with hotel staff and they will guide you on all the landmarks/things to do. The SPA facility is spectacular and I highly recommend it, they give good discounts which is much better than anywhere else in the city. I took spa every day in multiple places so telling by experience. The hotel is quiet and no sound on the road besides being on the road. The moment you step out you will get everything you will need. Highly recommend it for budget travelers that want good accommodation, an excellent location, and good food all around.
review.comment_negative: No complaints.

review.comment_positive: The staff from the hotel was very attentive and kind, we travelled with our family and stayed for 5 nights. They helped us with a tour booking to Ninh Binh - which was beautiful! and also with the transfer to the airport. The breakfast buffet has a good offer, the room is comfortable and has everything we needed. Thanks for the nice experience!
review.comment_negative: The pricing of some articles in US dollars generate certain confusion, but because the old centre of Hanoi is a very touristic place this is also understandable...

review.comment_positive:
the property is not as shown in the picture .its in someinside lane
the rooms are dingy

Miss Grace and Mr Justin made the place so polite and honest. Organised all of my trips while staying there and gave their honest opinions about what to see and where to go. Mr Justin I could not speak more highly  of his English was fantastic and understood everything I was talking about. A great and friendly place to stay and I will definitely stay again.
We hebben een heerlijk verblijf gehad in dit hotel. Fijne kamer, fijn ontbijt en hele fijne ontvangst in de lobby. Transfer werd goed geregeld
review.comment_negative: niks

review.comment_positive:
직원분들이 너무 친절했습니다.
모든 분들이 친절했지만 특히 남자분(안경쓰고 머리 올리신분) 너무너무너무 최고였습니다!!
정말 일주일동안 잘쉬다갑니다!! 깜언!!
gọn gàng, sạch sẽ, phục vụ tốt nhiệt tình
Emthusiatic and friendly staff, great location, and breakfast
review.comment_negative: None

review.rating: First time in Hanoi. Don’t have anything to compare. Wasn’t the best and wasn’t the worst.
review.comment_positive:
Very nice and quiet even though it’s on an incredibly busy street/area of the city. It’s also pretty close to most things so it’s pretty convenient. 

The staff was super friendly though. They helped book a few tours and was very helpful throughout my entire stay. 

The tours they booked were all with super awkward tour guides though. Would recommend booking tours yourself.
review.comment_negative:
First and foremost the shower doesn’t have a curtain/door so every time someone showers it’s a big puddle in the bathroom and the toilet is all wet being right next to the shower. 

Also I don’t think the AC works properly. It never turns off even when on auto. The air blowing directly on my head gave me a headache after the first night so afterwards I slept on the opposite side of the bed. 

Breakfast is also in another building which mean the pictures of the lobby on various booking websites isn’t the lobby of the actual hotel. The actual hotel is tucked in an alleyway. So I felt a little deceived when I arrived. Also if you hate crossing the street in Hanoi you’re gonna hate going to breakfast.

review.comment_positive: Ks sạch sẽ tiện nghi. Lễ tân tốt .  Vik trí thuận tiện đi lại
review.comment_negative: 1 điểm trừ là book 2 phòng chỉ đc 1 phòng thoải mái phòng còn lại nhà vs quá bé k phù hợp với anh rễ mình hơi bất tiện tí .

review.rating: Thank you to Grace and her team for an amazing experience! I will come back next time :)
review.comment_positive: The location is perfect and is walking distance to many top sightseeing spots and good food. The staff is very friendly and helpful, and had recommended me many great spots for food. I really feel their sincere welcome and had the most wonderful stay.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit hard to find the entrance because it's hidden in the back.

review.comment_positive: Lo staff ha fatto la differenza. L'albergo ha un'ottima rapporto qualità-prezzo, ma i ragazzi alla reception hanno reso il nostro soggiorno perfetto. Ottimi consigli su ristoranti e tour, ottimo il servizio di supporto per raggiungere l'aeroporto e ci hanno tenuto i bagaglio per 2 giorni! In più ci hanno permesso di fare una doccia prima della partenza. Colazione varia 3 di qualità, la migliore fatta in Vietnam. Ottimo, lo consiglio vivamente.
review.comment_negative: Se proprio devo trovare una pecca, la doccia è  In una stanzina con il water senza nulla che divida, quindi quando fai la doccia hai l'impressione di bagnare ovunque. Ovviamente è diviso dalla stanza.

review.comment_positive: location was perfect for my need and also in the very center of Hanoi, few steps from the lake. The room was clean and the staff very helpful
Phòng cũng được, không quá tệ. Nhân viên bình thường.

review.rating: Amazing staff! Grace and Justin are the best as are the rest of the front of house team.
review.comment_positive: The staff are amazing! We’ve been lucky enough to travel all over the world and have stayed in many 5 star hotels but the personal touch received from both Grace and Justin were incredible. We stayed here on day one and decided to return for our last night purely because the service was so great. Communications from before arrival and during our trip through Vietnam was second to none :)
review.comment_negative: As mentioned before the room is slightly small for 4 people but with this service it’s really no big deal.

review.comment_positive:
What impressed me the most was the staff! In this hotel i found the best customer service ever! A super combination of friendliness, supportiveness, proactivity and humanity! The helped me with printing the papers i needed for the Thai visa on arrival, they recommended me what places to see, including a delicious restaurant nearby.
Also, the location is excellent, right in the heart of the Old Quarter.
Thank you Jerry, Grace and Tracy for the excellent customer service you provide to your guests!
review.comment_negative: The only minus is that the windows are facing an inner courtyard and one cannot see the sun.

review.comment_positive: This was probably our best stat in our vietnam trip. For the price amenities are great and nice breakfast buffet. The hotel is located in the heart of old quarter. Super clean and fresh. Justin and Grace were amazing throughout our Stay. They were always in touch even when we traveled to other cities and always helping with a smile. Both are asset to this amazing hotel. Thank you so much for the wonderful hospitality.

review.rating: A good start point to discover Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Very friendly and helpful staff. Clean, excellent breakfast, Old city area .

The staff were exceptional. Very pleasant and helpful. Took an interest in what we wanted to do. Courteous at all times. Thanks to all of them but a special thanks to Grace and Justin who were such a lovely couple
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Rất sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện.
review.comment_negative: Nhà vệ sinh nhỏ; không nhận thẻ tín dụng.

review.comment_positive: Super goede locatie met vriendelijk personeel. Ontbijt was uitgebreid en lekker.

Lovely staff who kindly upgraded our room for the night which meant we had a window with some natural light. Breakfast provided had a good amount of options. Reception came to let us know when our tour arrived, so we could quickly have some breakfast before leaving
review.comment_negative: Just be aware that breakfast is held at their main hotel across the road and although the room had a window, ours didn't have a view on to anything, it just faced the wall of a building. But since we weren't spending much time in the room it didn't bother us

review.rating: Excelente atención del personal y gran ubicación
review.comment_positive: La atención del personal, la ubicación
review.comment_negative: Podría estar mejor el desayuno

reviewer.name: Johnson
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.comment_positive: The staff is fantastic, very helpful and friendly. Also excellent guides.
review.comment_negative: There is a building blocking the view out of the window. Also the water in the showers are not consistent temperatures.

review.rating: Staff showed genuine interest in helping us to have a comfortable stay.
review.comment_positive: The breakfast was superlative. A large selection of dishes freshly prepared, thoughtfully presented and continually replenished as necessary. Staff on hand to attend to further needs. Well appointed dining area.

review.rating: Brilliant Stay in Hanoi Old Quarter
review.comment_positive: The hotel is fantastic. Our room had a small window and this is a luxury in Hanoi old quarter. The location is perfect, the room was super clean and QUIET, the bed really comfy and the staff was welcoming. Special mention to Justin who made us feel super special. The lady at the reception gave us the best recommendation for Bun Cha. Unfortunaly we couldn't have breakfast because we left too early, and the staff made sure that we had some food to take away. Just brilliant.
review.comment_negative: nothing at all

review.comment_positive: Very warm welcome. The room was very quiet, nicely decorated and pleasant. The staff are very kind, helpful and attentive.

review.rating: Nice hotel in a very convenient location
review.comment_positive:
- location was superbe. In the middle of the old town but still quite. it was just a  2 minute walk from the Hoan Kiem Lake
- nice interior design
- staff was super polite, friendly and helpful
- breakfast was fantastic
review.comment_negative:
- the rooms did have windows but there was barely daylight coming in because the neighboring buildings were too close
- to reach the hotel we had to walk through some
kind of very narrow alley… but that kept away the noise from the street 
- the restaurant was not in the same building. we had to walk across the street to a sister hotel

review.rating: Excellent staff and great value for money
review.comment_positive: Excellent staff, value for money, quite comfortable for a short stay
review.comment_negative: Location might be a bit difficult to find.

review.rating: Lovely staff are such an asset to this comfortable hotel.
review.comment_positive: The staff really made our stay. Very attentive, kind and helpful. In particular Jerry, Ellie and Tom always greeted us with a smile. The rooms were lovely and beds so comfortable!
Great communication from staff helping us book travel to and from our next destination at the best price
Nhân viên phục vụ rất nhiệt tình, chu đáo
review.comment_negative: Không có ý kiến

review.rating: Fühlte sich wie Familie an, sehr gute, zentrale Lage.
review.comment_positive: Wir hatten ein schönes Zimmer mit Fenster, das auf das Nachbargebäude ging. Ausstattung war sehr gut. Hervorzuheben ist die Freundlichkeit und Hilfsbereitschaft der Angestellten. Am Morgen der Weiterreise ist der Hotel Manager mit uns noch zum Abfahrtspunkt mitgekommen, damit wir den richtigen Shuttle erreichen. Vielen Dank
review.comment_negative: Es gibt nichts, über das wir uns beklagen könnten oder uns nicht gefallen hätte. Preis-/Leistung stimmt.

review.comment_positive:
Clean. Hotel was away from the main road, but do not worry as the passageway to the hotel entrance was well lit and not sketchy looking at all. This also means that it much quieter at night without the noise from the traffic. 
Reception is very helpful and friendly. 
Breakfast was at the opposite sister hotel - quite a decent spread; overall very good value!
review.comment_negative: There wasn't any windows in the room hence no view. But no complaints as it would have been noisy with a window.

review.rating: Great value, lovely staff, great location
review.comment_positive: Great location, great value for money, really lovely staff, rooms was clean and nice. They allowed us to keep the room longer as we had a later flight, so we could have a shower after our morning exploring, they also booked the airport taxi for us.
review.comment_negative: No windows in the room as the building is in the middle of a bunch of other buildings, not a big deal though, entry is through an alley which has been nicely decorated to lead to the hotel. Breakfast was across the road at a sister hotel, again not an issue, just confused us on the first morning till we asked.

review.comment_positive: Very central but no traffic noise, and a great breakfast.  The hotel staff were super helpful, friendly and spoke good English.  A big thanks to Grace, Tracey, Henry and Justin.

review.rating: Veldig fornøyd med oppholder, du for mye for pengene😀
review.comment_positive:
Koselig , liten hotell som ligger litt gjemt i gamlebyen Hanoi ( French Quarters). Hyggelig og hjelpsom personalet, store rom og gode senger.
Frokost blitt servert på hoteller/ hovedbygget på andre siden av litt  trafikkerte vei.
review.comment_negative: Alt ok, men vasken plassert på rommet ikke på badet.

review.rating: 環境清幽性價比好的住宿
review.comment_positive: 性價比很好的住宿，地點靠近還劍湖，早餐不錯，就是連吃5天菜色都差不多。櫃台人員十分熱心，第一次碰到櫃台人員熱心認真地介紹河內老城區的景點，好吃的店，該買的伴手禮。有甚麼問題他們都會熱心回答。早餐跟SPA是在對街的姊妹店，住宿SPA有35%折扣，還不錯。對外連接口是一條小巷子，畫成山谷的形狀，所以叫VALLEY，正因如此才聽不到街上大多數的喇叭聲，越南人超愛按喇叭。
review.comment_negative: 隔音也就一般，真的按很大聲還是聽的到，隔壁關門大聲點也聽得到。不過多數時間都蠻安靜的。床略有點硬，廁所門有點故障難關。窗戶打開只能看到牆壁，但是能透氣。

review.comment_positive: Klasse Lage, sehr reichhaltiges Frühstück und ein schönes und sehr sauberes Zimmer. Das beste war aber ein außergewöhnlich freundliches Personal, insbesondere Mrs. Grace. Ich wurde täglich gefragt, wie mein Tag bzw. der über das Hotel vermittelte Ausflug war. Ein außergewöhnlicher Aufenthalt.
The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful. It was perfectly located and the rooms were exceptional.
Phòng decor xinh sạch sẽ, lễ tân cũng nhiệt tình

The hotel is very good located, busy streets with many shops and restaurants.
The staff at the reception extremely helpful and nice.
Breakfast (at the hotel across the street) is good, room is spacious enough.
review.comment_negative:
The hotel is in the narrow long building between the other buildings, so there is almost no view from the little window.
The light near the mirror is not enough bright, it's not easy to apply makeup.

review.rating: hotel that feels like coming Home !
review.comment_positive: this hotel I can highly recommend, super friendly staff , Dave he works at night and early morning is super helpful and always in for a nice talk, Grace and many more they are such a great team . The breakfast team  doing there best pampering all guest . As well making ice coffee and Juses without sugar . Amazing breakfast and fresh fruits . When I had to call to emergency line in Holland that wasn’t any problem , cost they didn’t charge me . Next day they all ask me if I was okay , after visiting hospital. As well the people in the sister Hotel are so friendly . The bell boys always smiling and bowing for me . The massage service is great as well ( went two times ) and they are open until late and  every night fully booked . The rooms looks great as well , comfortable beds and a nice shower .  hanoi is a busy city so nice if you can walk out to a place that feels like home.
review.comment_negative: only thing a real luggage room will be a big plus if they have that with a lock on it .

review.comment_positive: Le personnel a été très accueillant et aidant pour notre séjour et transit vers nos autres étapes. Le petit déjeuner  est très bon. L'hôtel est très calme

review.rating: Great value for a great location and very hospitable staff
review.comment_positive: Excellent location. Absolutely beautiful, caring staff. Loved our interactions with Grace , Jenny and a few others whose name , I don’t remember. Great value for money .

Personnel is veeery sweet, sometimes, probably, too much)) Liked breakfast. Air conditioner remote control is near the bed which is pretty convenient. I haven't heard neighbors through the walls and ceiling, which is nice, but I heard very clearly when somebody was entering the floor.
review.comment_negative: There was two showerheads, but I wasn't able to run water through that one which you can hold, so could only use that one which is fixed high above, it's not convenient. Also wish it were a night light in a room, but I haven't saw some of those in any other hotel during my 2 weeks in Vietnam.

review.comment_positive: sạch sẽ
review.comment_negative: hơi bí

review.comment_positive: The hotel and the staff were great. Buffet excellent.
review.comment_negative:
The only letdown was booking.com
My wife is Vietnamese and they put their surname first, so booking.com did the same with my booking with Vietjet, but a British surname is last. So because of this we had to buy more tickets as Vietjet couldn't find our booking as they used my middle name and surname as a double barrel surname !!! Tried to explain on the phone 20 days before fying but nothing got sorted !!

review.comment_positive: La posizione, la gentilezza dello staff.
review.comment_negative: La colazione con poca scelta e la mancanza di una finestra in camera.

review.rating: Tolles Hotel mit sehr angenehmer Atmosphäre
review.comment_positive: Wir waren 2 Nächte in dem Hotel und empfehlen es gerne weiter! Die Lage ist perfekt. Die Ausstattung der Zimmer und die Betten sind prima. Alles sehr sauber. Das Personal ist super hilfsbereit und freundlich - es ist eine Freude, dort zu sein!!! Das Frühstück wird im gleichnamigen Hotel gegenüber serviert und ist sehr vielfältig/topp! Wir würden auf jeden Fall wieder kommen. Herzlichen Dank, Andrea und Norbert

review.rating: Great service, great location, comfortable rooms
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was perfectly located in the old town. It was super easy to get to from where the buses to and from Sapa pick up and it was walking distance to almost everywhere you'd want to go in the old town.

The rooms were very comfortable and nicely decorated. The breakfast was great with plenty of options to choose from.

The main thing that was great was the staff. They were absolutely wonderful for the whole stay (we actually stayed on two separate occasions as we passed through Hanoi twice). They organised transfers to and from the airport for us, sorted out a take away breakfast when we had to get up early and Tracey's food recommendations were amazing. Honestly, we were made to feel so looked after while we were there.
Friendly staff. The location was great. The room was clean and nice with soft bed. I love the decorations.
review.comment_negative: The room without window.

review.comment_positive: everything was perfect. stand outs are definitely the staff and the air con.

review.rating: Exceptional staff with a genuine desire to help.
review.comment_positive: The staff were amazing, exceptional customer service with a genuine desire to help - if I could give 20/10 I would.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: The service of the People Who work there
review.comment_negative: Little bit dusty, thats my only critism

review.comment_positive: Location is perfect. Staff is incredible. Kim's hospitality is impressive and she is super helpful. The breakfast is nice. Beef Pho is wonderful and better than some restaurants on the street. Surely will be back at the next visit to Hanoi.
review.comment_negative: The water temperature is a bit unstable.

review.rating: Next Level Service in geschmackvollem Ambiente in zentraler Lage
review.comment_positive:
Nach Durchsicht der vielen positiven Bewertungen sind wir mir sehr hohen Erwartungen angereist ... diese wurden nicht enttäuscht. 
Der Service den die Angestellten bieten ist wirklich next Level.

Ebenfalls hervorzuheben ist das hervorragende Frühstück und die geschmackvolle Einrichtung der Zimmer.

Die Lage ist super Zentral und dennoch war das Zimmer leise.
Hôtel tellement bien placé au cœur de tout les centres d'intérêts à visiter. Je recommande ++

Excelente ubicación, personal increíble en su disponibilidad y apoyo ante cualquier consulta.
Si bien la habitación no tenía ventana, contaba con lo necesario y un poco más para hacer de la estadía un excelente lugar.

Our stay at the Hanoi Emerald Waters was amazing. The welcoming was super warm with a drink, opening doors and friendly staff that helped with the luggage. We got great hints for good food and shopping places and lots of instructions how to behave in Vietnam. The rooms itself have been totally clean and pretty modern. We also got a free room upgreat. The staff speaks good english and is really eager to help you make the best out of the stay. The breakfast buffet was amazing and had many options. It was definitly the best we hotel we had during our three weeks in Vietnam! Highly reccomended.
review.comment_negative: Nothing to say ;-)

review.comment_positive: staff goes beyond all expectations , very caring , location is walking distance to all major attractions
review.comment_negative: breakfast has limited option for non meat , non fish eaters which gets repeated alternate days . spa was a let down

review.rating: Great for a short weekend getaway
review.comment_positive: The breakfast was not very diverse but tasty. All the staff are very friendly and helpful.
Jerry, Grace and Kim are wonderful hosts! We had a great stay and the staff were very helpful with early check-in, storing our luggage, and ordering services. Great hotel and great breakfast!
Best and most helpful staff, great location, comfy bed
review.comment_negative: Pokey room

review.rating: I highly recommend it as the staff will sort you out!
review.comment_positive:
The property is located really well. If you’re in Hanoi then the Old Quarter is the place to be. It’s where the lake is, the cathedral too! also loads of places to go out to at night. 

Also, the staff is just amazing. Jerry was so so good helped us through the trip. We literally didn’t have to lift a finger. They also organise tours from the hotel at great prices so we didn’t have to do anything really! 

Big Big Thanks to Jerry! Also to Tom & Dave

review.rating: The hotel’ s location is good. The room is clean and comfortable. Breakfast is great. Except that, the staffs are amazin
review.comment_positive: The staffs
מיקום מעולה, קרוב להכל. הצוות מקסים, עוזרים בכל מה שצריך.
review.comment_negative: בארוחת בוקר חסרים דברים כמו גבינות, ירקות, מאפים.

review.comment_positive: Very good location
review.comment_negative: Bathroom is too small.

review.comment_positive: The hotel staff was so helpful in arranging our activities in Hanoi! The location of the hotel was perfect for walking around the old quarter.
l’accueil du personnel qui était adorable et à l’écoute

review.rating: The staff was incredibly nice and helpful.
review.comment_positive: Justin and the rest of the staff were super friendly and accommodating. They took our ideas for two tours we wanted to do, booked them, were very helpful with communicating with the tour operators and us, and took care of the payments so that we only had to make one total payment to the hotel.  Breakfast was great.  Location is perfect.
review.comment_negative: Lack of any view was probably made up for by being buffered from street noise.  No real complaint here.

review.comment_positive: Everything! The staff, service, room - everything was great.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Great location in the Old Quarter. Exceptional staff and service. Kim and Jerry went above and beyond to assist us in any way and feel at ease. They were always pleasant, checked in to see how we were doing, and if they could help us in any way. They provided excellent recommendations to attractions and places to eat. Breakfast was good. Rooms were clean and comfortable.

review.rating: Pleasant, Good Staff, Very Helpful throughout the entire stay. They care like Family.
review.comment_positive:
Cleanliness,
Very good in old quarter

review.rating: Value for money in the heart of old town.
review.comment_positive: Hotel is located very centrally in old town - walking distance to many attractions including the lake, night markets and beer street. Room was cozy but totally perfect for a long weekend and the staff are a highlight. They bring joy and  to each interaction.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Great hospitality, Grace, Kim and Jerry are very nice, friendly, helpful and always be there when I need them. Perfect location, 5-10 minutes walk to everywhere close to the center. The hotel also arranged the tour to Ha Long Bay, exceptional experience. Breakfast is amazing, you can choose from a wide variety of food that are freshly made. Laundry service has been prompt. Good value for money as well.
review.comment_negative: If I have to pick up one small thing, it’s when I was at the massage place, the therapist didn’t close the door despite multiple reminders. A bit weird but other than that, everything is okay…

review.comment_positive: Ubicacion
review.comment_negative: El desayuno es un poco pobre

review.comment_positive: The staff was exceptional, providing top notch services . The breakfast was also good, with many options and changes daily.
review.comment_negative: The bathroom can be improved. Prefer a partition of the shower place so the whole bathroom doesn’t get wet after showering.

review.comment_positive:
Leckeres Frühstück,  sehr freundliche Mitarbeiter an der Rezeption und Jerry ist ein toller Tourmanager.
Man kann sich nur rund um wohl fühlen. Es wurde für die späte Abreise bei Bedarf eine Dusche bereitgestellt. 
Sehr gute Lage in  Hanoi.
All staff were so friendly & welcoming, very knowledgeable on the area & places to see. Location - only a short walk into the centre. The rooms we stayed in were very comfortable, clean & quiet.
super friendly staff, so helpful. great location too.
review.comment_negative: windows don’t look out onto the street so the rooms were low on light, but we spent most of the day out and about anyway so it didn’t really matter

review.rating: Perfect place to stay in Hanoi‘s Old Quarter
review.comment_positive:
The Hotel is located in the middle of the Old Quarter with all good restaurants and sights within close distance. Rooms are spacious, very clean, and nicely decorated. Breakfast location is across the street with a huge selection of local and international options.
The best thing about our stay, however, was the exceptional service. Friendly staff provided us with all the information and recommendations we needed. We also had the opportunity to store our luggage for multiple days and take a shower before our night bus departure to Ha Giang.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Super location. Staff are just amazing👏. They could not have been more helpful. Everyone we dealt with was fantastic but especially Grace, Justin and Tracey who helped us with a late checkout. Vietnam is a very friendly place but this hotel is especially helpful. Cannot wait to visit again. Loved it.
review.comment_negative: Nothing! Perfect stay.

review.comment_positive: みんないい人でした。
review.comment_negative: なし。

review.rating: Fantastisch nieuw hotel midden in centrum.

review.rating: A great base to explore Hanoi from and the staff had great tips

review.rating: J’y retourne sans hésiter et avec grand plaisir.
review.comment_positive:
Accueil très chaleureux 
Personnes toujours prêtes à nous aider. 
Sourire toujours présent.
Je recommande.
review.comment_negative: Tout était parfait

review.comment_positive: The hotel is in an amazing location for exploring Hanoi. The staff are absolutely amazing and can’t do enough to help, Jerry helped us arrange a trip to Halong Bay and Nim Bin and both were faultless. Grace and Ellie were also so helpful and really help make our stay so good. The room was great and the bed was super comfy! The breakfast was also great! can’t recommend enough!

review.rating: Perfect hotel with even more perfect people :)
review.comment_positive:
Everything was amazing :)
The staff were always so supportive and friendly.
They booked all the tours and taxis for us :)
Everything is in walking distance from the hotel :)
I wanted to surprise my girlfriend with a little something when we arrived and asked them for help. They did an amazing amazing job. My girlfriend absolutely loved it.
Thanks again for everything :)
review.comment_negative:
