review.rating: Great stay in Hanoi city centre.
review.comment_positive: Super friendly staff, great breakfast buffet, nice room. Close to centre of Hanoi.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
일단 직원들이 너무너무너무 친절해요
체크인할 때 알아듣기 쉽게 잘 설명해주고 사파로 가는 사람들이 많아서 그런지 먼저 다음 날 일정이 어떻게 되는지 물어봐주심. 하루 자고 다음날 밤 늦게 슬리핑버스 타고 사파로 출발하는 일정이라고 말했더니 먼저 캐리어는 맡아줄테니까 여행하다가 피곤하면 로비와서 쉬라고하고 샤워실이 따로 있었는데 가기전에 샤워하고 가도된다고(이게 너무 좋았음) 습해서 끈적거리고 갈때 찝찝해서 어쩌나했는데 너무 뽀송하게 버스타러 갈 수 있었어요! 그리고 버스 픽업기사분이 오기로해서 밖에서 기다리는데 직원 두분이 같이 기다려주길래 먼저 들어가시라 했는데 20분이 넘도록 기사분이 안오셔서 당황하고있었는데 직원분이 나오시더니 직접 기사분한테 전화해주셔서 안전하게 버스타고 사파에 잘 도착했어요☺️
review.comment_negative:
조식이 먹을게 없다는거😅
저는 호텔픽업신청해서 따라가서 한번에 갈 수 있었는데
호텔입구가 골목안에 숨어있어서 처음에 찾기 힘들 수 있음
그래도 위치는 호안끼엠에서 가깝고 괜찮아요

review.comment_positive: Super netter und hilfsbereiter Service und komfortable Zimmer.
review.comment_negative: Frühstück findet im Partnerhotel, über die Straße, statt - das sollte vorher bekannt sein (gerade für geheingeschränkte Personen). Buffet ist ok.

review.comment_positive: Giường ngủ bình thường, phòng hơi ồn ào.
tiện nghi
review.comment_negative: không có

review.rating: Great hotel in old city center with kindest staff
review.comment_positive: The staff was the greatest, they were very helpful and did their best to make us feel welcomed and comfortable. We forgot our itag at the hotel and Grace went beyond her responsabilities for us to retrieve it. The room was clean with AC built-in wall and the breakfast at the "sister" hotel across the street is varied and delicious. You also can leave luggages with them in case you have late leaving from the city.

Locatie en service van het personeel. Ontbijt is in het hotel aan de overkant, erg goede hoeveelheid en kwaliteit. We werden opgehaald voor een tour, de twee hotels communiceren hier goed over met elkaar.
review.comment_negative: De airco blaast ook op de zachtste stand nog erg hard en is gericht op het bed. Lekker koel maar iets minder comfortabel.

review.comment_positive: Helpful staff. Had a room upgrade.
Vriendelijk en behulpzaam personeel en goede locatie

Reception is super friendly, especially Grace who provide more than expected service, such as introduce voluntarily tourist attraction nearby and provide useful advices what to pay attention visiting tourist site, she's super friendly and helpful. 
Not only Grace, but other hotel employees provide attentive services to guest. 
Massage service is a good rate after discount for hotel guest.
Hotel room has many power plugs which is a very convenience design for guest.
review.comment_negative: The entry is not easy to find, that's the only part not really convenience for first time visitor, other than that is great.

review.comment_positive: Staff were extremely friendly and engaging. Nice quiet location but very central.
review.comment_negative: Nothing at all

review.rating: Fantastisch hotel, zeer gastvrij met een geweldig ontbijt
review.comment_positive: Het lieve en zeer behulpzame personeel en het geweldig uitgebreide ontbijt
review.comment_negative: Niets, alles was dik in orde

review.comment_positive: La situación es excepcional, en el centro pero fuera de las calles más ruidosas. El personal muy, muy amable. Sus recomendaciones muy útiles. Además disponen de una ducha para después del checkout, por lo que si tienes un vuelo nocturno te guardan el equipaje y te proporcionan toallas para la ducha.

review.rating: sảng khoái tinh thần , rất đẹp

review.rating: The staff is extremely courteous and helpful. They will go out of the way to support.
review.comment_positive: Breakfast is offered in their branch hotel which is right across the lane to this property. Their were ample choices and I would call it a decent breakfast to start your day with.

review.rating: Fantastic location, really comfortable and the staff were amazing, so helpful
review.comment_positive: Excellent location, walking distance to the lake and within the old quarter. Very central
review.comment_negative: There isn’t an outside area or bar to relax in but that ok, plenty close by

review.comment_positive:
The service from all staff throughout our stay was exceptional. But special mention to Grace who is an amazing asset to the Hotel. Her Customer Service is next level. She kept our friends updated on the arrival of their passport left behind at our Tam Coc Hotel. Her advice on restaurants were top notch. I have stayed in many 5*+ Hotels in my 30yrs as a Travel Agent & the level of service we received was up there.
Loved our cute room decor. Breakfast across the road was great . Location excellent for Old Quarter.

the place was so comfortable and very clean, with spacious rooms, plenty of charging ports. staff were very friendly and always helpful. decent breakfast as well. it is also located just slightly out of the old quarter but still near enough to it & the lake — which means a convenient location but also less noise.
review.comment_negative: no window, can’t tell what time it is from inside the room

review.comment_positive: The location was amazing! Just 5 minutes walk away from Cafe Giang and the lake. Plus the staff are incredibly helpful and warm which made the overall stay even better than it already was!

Clean rooms, regular amenities update, room service, recommendations,

From check in to check out everything was superb, great recommendations for places to visit by Jerry, and it actually felt like each and person of the staff really enjoyed their work and that clearly resembled in their aura, will love to visit them again
아침식사 기대보다 다양하고 맛도 좋았다.
review.comment_negative: 없음

review.comment_positive: Nhân viên ok, giường nằm êm thoải mái
review.comment_negative: K có cửa sổ

review.comment_positive: The hotel has a very good location in the old city center of Hanoi. The rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable. The staff is very friendly, especially Mr. Jerry.
Everything is nice: room in clean and spacious, stuff is extremely friendly, good breakfast, central location.

review.rating: Greatest staff and service. Quiet, well ventilated room. Very accommodating.
review.comment_positive:
- Good breakfast, phở/eggs and buffet.
- LOCATION was GREAT : 3 minutes walk to lake, 5 minutes walk to bus for Ha Giang, right in the city center
- Service and STAFF was AMAZING. They are so welcoming and especially Justin, who even found the phone we forgot in a taxi !! Thank you so much. 
The staff will make you feel like a VIP. Also, they kept our luggage safe during our 4 days trip to Ha Giang, we could take a shower before the night bus and the plane, they gave us water bottles for the trip.
- Room had no window (pretty common in HN) BUT out of all the hotels we stayed in Vietnam, was the BEST VENTILATED (no humidity felt at all, everywhere else there was condensation on the windows in the morning and felt very humid). Also very well lit so we did not feel the lack of window.
The QUIETEST room we had in VN as well. No need for earplugs.
review.comment_negative: Nothing we would totally go there again

review.rating: Perfectly located hotel and credibly nice staff
review.comment_positive:
For sure there are more luxurious hotels in Hanoi, but you will not find a second one where you are welcomed as warmly and friendly as here. Upon arrival I was given countless tips for sightseeing in Hanoi. All my concerns were taken care of (such as booking a trip to Ha Long Bay for me) and help was given with my travel plans.
I used Hanoi as a hub to do several multi-day tours in surrounding areas and I came back to Emerald Waters Hotel Valley every time because I felt so comfortable and welcome here. 
The rooms are sufficiently large and clean. The breakfast is extensive and offers everything you need. If you want to wash, you can use the very inexpensive laundry service. On my last day I could use the shower in the basement before leaving for the airport and prepare for the long flight back.
Thanks especially to Kim, Grace and Jerry for the great help, the great stay and the nice conversations. When I will travel to Hanoi again, I know where I will sleep.
review.comment_negative: Everything in was to my satisfaction and I had nothing to complain about.

review.rating: Cheap well located hotel with very helpful staff.
review.comment_positive:
Really helpful and polite staff, especially Tracy. The staff here seemed genuinely very happy to be receiving international guests again. 
Tracy provided me with a map and gave me great directions and some tips for coffee / dinner etc. 

The price is also good. I paid circa £50 / 65USD for 2 night stay. 

Well located for shopping, and walking the old district.
review.comment_negative: The hotel has little to no natural light and my room had no windows. Having no natural light is very disorientating and therefore I checked out after staying only 2 days.

review.comment_positive: the staff was amazing. reception 10/10. I would’ve given this place a 10/10 if it wasn’t for some small signs of poor cleaning in the bathroom. There was hair in the shower head when I got there and there after every room clean. on the 5th day, I saw some ants by the sink. otherwise, had a lovely stay

review.rating: J’ai été très bien accueilli par des gens adorables !
review.comment_positive:
La proximité,
Près du centre ville et du lac ! Le gentillesse du personnel et les chambres très propres et Tout confort !

review.rating: Perfektes Hotel für einen Aufenthalt in Hanoi.
review.comment_positive: Das Personal war super lieb und hat uns bei der Reiseorganisation sehr geholfen. Der Spa war auch super. Das ganze Hotel war sauber und in einer tollen Lage.

The location was excellent, this hotel is very small with even smaller entrance, I was disappointed at first but the stuff is too cheerful and helpful, which compensated the size of hotel. The location is a plus.
nhân viên nhiệt tình, phòng ốc sạch sẽ và rất chill 🫶🏻
review.comment_negative: nên bổ sung thêm 1 cái thùng rác nhỏ để đựng rác ăn uống, bông tẩy trang,... tại chỉ có 1 cái ở nhà vệ sinh nên mình cảm thấy k tiện lắm.

review.comment_positive: ngay trung tâm
review.comment_negative: nằm trong hẻm nhỏ

review.comment_positive: 櫃台員工服務友善親切，並幫忙處理預訂下龍灣行程的接送問題，早餐豐盛美味，地點離中心景點步行即可到達。
review.comment_negative: No

review.comment_positive: The room and facility are clean, the staff were extraordinarily helpful and friendly, great location  near the Hoan Kiem Lake and old quarter neighborhood, and they also provide suffiecient breakfast.

review.rating: Unique hospitality and helpfulness - Thank you!
review.comment_positive:
Staying at the Emerald Waters Valley Hotel was such a good decision! After having booked, we stayed in contact with Jerry, who perfectly organised a pick up from the airport. Jerry, Grace, Kim and everyone else at the hotel did their best to let us feel comfortable and gave us some great ideas how to spend our days and to stay safe during our time in Hanoi. They also organised a free walking tour with our kind, friendly and very lovely guide, our transfer to Cat Ba and helped us book an overnight train from Ninh Bin to Da Nang. 
We can highly recommend staying at the Emerald Waters Hotel Valley.
Great service and location! The staff was very sweet and helpful

review.rating: Excellent. Permanent place to stay in Hanoi.
review.comment_positive:
Amazing, friendly & helpful staff. 
Ready to help with everything that’s not even their concern.
The staff were awesome, the location could t have been better. it was set back a little from the street so really quiet night’s sleep.

Hotel was a great stay. Would highly reccommend and wouldn't stop anywhere else in hanoi if I were to return. The room was very clean and comfortable. The hotel is right by tourist attractions, plenty of food and drinks to choose from in the surrounding area. 
Most of all , the staff well and truly made our stay. They can't do enough for you. Very attentive and made you feel very welcome. They arranged our transport from the airport and was very easy to contact with fast response times. They were happy to help with future tavel plans and gave us ideas. After our stay at emerald waters hotel We went to ha long Bay for the night and they allowed us to return the following day to leave our bags while we explored hanoi further and then arranged our transfer onto ninh binh . Forever grateful 🙏
Nothing more I can say its a perfect hotel the staff can't do enough. Anything you need they will sort. Exceptional service
Friendly helpful staff
review.comment_negative: Good breakfast

review.comment_positive: Staff was very nice and supportive. We were welcomed with very nice drink. On arriving, we were briefed about the Hanoi city. Even, staff came out to bid good bie on departure. Thank you for your excellent service. We will definitely recommend others to stay here.
Staffs are nice and helpful.
review.comment_negative: The hotel is hidden behind another building with just 1.5m gap with the other building in front... no space for sunshine to come in the rooms... the aircon system seemed dirty, lacked regular cleaning of the filters... the bed is facing the aircon which does not help either...

review.comment_positive: Great location in the Old Quarter, very helpful and polite staff.
Elegant. Silent. Well located. Excellent service. Honest price. Very grateful  for staying here 🙏.
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.comment_positive:
We weren’t able to go through all the troubles we had during our stay without help of the staffs from the hotel. Especially Ms. Kim, thank you so much for your full support. We had two toddlers on our trip. It makes whole a lot difference when you can depend on hotel staffs who were always there for us n so kind. 

Breakfast was awesome. 

Location is great. Accessible to old city, the lake, and restaurants. 

It’s quieter than any other hotels cos it’s not facing the Main Street. 

Highly recommended.
The staff was really helpful and the hotel room clean and comfy. We loved the breakfast
Service and staff members very helpful at anytime

The location is perfect, right in the heart of old town next to the lake with the water puppet show and to the weekend night market. The staff are wonderful and could not do more to make sure you have the best stay in Hanoi.
everything was great in particular it’s front desk Kim and Jerry

review.comment_positive: Don't normally leave reviews. Staff were amazing. So accommodating. Stayed in 7 hotels on our trip to Vietnam and the team here gave by far the best customer experience. Shout out to Jerry and Kim!

review.comment_positive: Świetna obsługa, dobrze mówi po angielsku i jest bardzo pomocna. Pomogli nam wysłać pocztówki, a także zorganizować kartony i taśmę klejącą, żebyśmy mogli zapakować wietnamskie kapelusze na podróż powrotną :) skorzystaliśmy również z transportu na lotnisko, bezproblemowo i w dobrej cenie. review.comment_positive:
Le personnel de cet Hôtel est incroyable. Toujours de bons conseils, toujours prêt à vous aider, peu importe l’heure.
j’ai dormis dans de nombreux hôtels, mais je n’ai jamais rencontré un personnel d’un tel professionnalisme !
De plus l’hôtel est très bien placé, au centre de Hanoï.
les chambres sont spacieuses et très propres.

Je recommande cet hôtel, en partie pour son merveilleux personnel !
review.comment_negative: RAS

review.comment_positive:
Le personnel est d’une gentillesse rare. 
je vous recommande cet hôtel.
review.comment_negative: tout était parfait

review.rating: EXCELLENT STAY WONDERFUL LOCATION AND AMAZING STAFF
review.comment_positive:
Location Staff Location. This property is in the heart of Hanoi old quarter close to the lake and all the shops/spas/restaurants. Everything is within walking distance and highly convenient. 

To top it all , this hotel really has the most amazing staff Jerry and everyone in the front desk is SUPER CARING AND SUPER HELPFUL. They really do care about your comfort and well being. 

Perfect examples are:
We were coming in on New Year’s Day. The cab couldn’t enter the hotel street due to the rush. The hotel sent staff to the main road to fetch and our luggage.  Also we checked in twice in the hotel. At the second instance they did not even make us wait one minute as they used all the docs from the first check in. Staff REALLY DOES CARE. It makes all the difference.
review.comment_negative: Nothing- it is not a plush hotel but the staff here really make your stay pleasant and worthwhile. Kudos to their staff.

review.comment_positive:
Lễ tân và nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, chu đáo, đối với khách nâng như nâng trứng hứng như hứng hoa =))
Vị trí trung tâm rất tiện đi tham quan và ăn uống
Phòng ở mức khá, tuy cách âm không được tốt lắm.

review.rating: Perfect stay in the Old Quarter of Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Friendly staff, exceptional service, comfy beds.

Ended up being one of the best stays in Hanoi because of the hospitality. Couple of weeks prior to checking in Mr Jerry was so accommodating through whatsapp and advised on what to expect and how to go about Hanoi. 2 days before checking in, the hotel allowed all of us to leave our luggage as we had a cruise to Ha Long bay and didnt want to carry big bags. That's when we met Ms Tracy and she recommended the nicest eateries in Hanoi town and gave us a map on how to get there. On the day of checking in we had the pleasure of meeting Mr Justin and he made our stay so comfortable for the whole 2days. Hospitality at this hotel is 11/10. 

Breakfast- delicious. Probably the best beef pho i had
Cleanliness- Very Good
Beds- Very Comfortable
Besides noises from corridors, the nights were not noisy eventhough the hotel was in the middle of town.
review.comment_negative: To be nit-picky, i prefer rooms with windows and also would have been better if the sink was in the toilet.

review.rating: Felt like being at home in Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Location, staff friendliness
The staff were unbelievable, so helpful and kind. Loved our stay here.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive:
Staff service and hospitality are just excellent! Really makes a difference on the hotel. The restaurant they recommended was also very good! The location is perfect.
The shower and bed are also really good.

Die Zimmer sind sehr schön, mit Liebe zum Detail eingerichtet und dazu komfortabel. Das Bett war super bequem. Die Lage, direkt um Stadtzentrum und trotzdem ruhig. Das Frühstück war gut, wird aber von Schwester- Hotel angeboten. Einmal über die Straße. War für uns kein Thema.

review.rating: Clean, good location and wonderful staff!

review.rating: Best staff, great location, and all you need. Great.
review.comment_positive: The hotel is clean and all you need for a couple nights in Hanoi. But where it really shines is the AMAZING STAFF! Who helped me book the most amazing day at halong bay before even getting to vietnam and had no problems upgrading me to the premium when i asked to pay the extra later on. Big thank you to grace and the rest of the team there for making my stay so great and so helpful with everything!
review.comment_negative: Air conditioning was slightly weak for me being from a cold country and but still worked.

review.comment_positive: El personal es excelente, son muy dispuestos a ayudar y a mejorar tu estancia todo lo que puedan. Volvemos en unos dias!

review.rating: A value for money Hotel with good breakfast and fantastic staff
review.comment_positive: The hotel is very convenient and near to food and attractions around the old quarter. The staff Grace is the gem that makes our stay a memorable one as she went all the way out to ensure that any issues were sorted even before our arrival.
The staff were very helpful with everything, we ended up booking three different trips via the hotel and all were good value!
review.comment_negative: Our room had no window meaning that on the day that we were ill during our stay we had to spend the entire day inside a windowless room.

review.comment_positive:
The staff here are wonderful. It felt like I had a safe place while alone in Hanoi. Grace, Tracey and another lady (I'm sorry I didn't get her name) were especially warm and helpful. The room was clean and very comfortable. Having eggs made to order at breakfast is a nice touch. 
It was in the middle of the old Quarter but there was no traffic noise!
review.comment_negative: The only downside is that My room lacked natural light, but I think because it didn't have a window or face the street this also meant it didn't let in any outside noise, so perhaps still a good trade off.

review.comment_positive: Very nice and clean room, the staff are very helpful and extremely nice.
review.comment_negative: A bit of flushing water noise from other rooms at night.

review.rating: Good place to stay at and good value
review.comment_positive: Friendly staff. Hotel was clean and welcoming. Lot’s of tourist attractions nearby
review.comment_negative: My room didn’t have any windows

review.rating: Great location, clean and welcoming staff
review.comment_positive: Really nice hotel located in the old quarter. We also stayed at other hotels on the same street and found this one to be the best. The staff were super friendly and spoke good English, gave us a good map to the surroundings and made us feel at home. The room and bathroom were very clean and new compared to others, small but enough for two people (worth the price). Thanks Jerry see you next time!

La gentillesse des réceptionnistes, Kim et Grace tous les bons conseils pour profiter pleinement de notre séjour à Hanoï.
Emplacement,  petit déjeuner, rapport qualité prix.

NB The Hanoi Emerald Waters Valley Hotel is not the same building as the Hanoi Emerald Waters which is based across the street. Hanoi Emerald Waters Valley is also on Lo Su but is down a little alleyway so keep your eyes peeled for the sign. Breakfast and the spa facilities are based in the main hotel but the staff are very helpful directing/escorting you between buildings.

review.rating: Excellent customer service. Many thanks to Jerry and his team.

review.rating: El mejor hotel de todo nuestro viaje por Vietnam.
review.comment_positive:
El hotel está un poco escondido, dentro de un callejón, pero sus habitaciones están realmente bien. Limpias, cómodas, no les falta detalle.
El personal que conforma la plantilla es una maravilla. Buscan soluciones y te ayudan en todo momento, te aconsejan los mejores sitios y son súper serviciales.
El desayuno (que se sirve en el hotel de enfrente que pertenece a la misma cadena) es delicioso y cuenta con una carta muy amplia, además de platos que elaboran al momento si los quieres.
Si volvemos a Hanoi, no dudaremos en repetir hotel.

review.comment_positive: All the staff were lovely. Always welcomed us with a smile. Happy to help with anything we asked. We especially loved Justin and Grace for their care and attention to us. We had a enjoyable stay

review.rating: Perfect stay. One of the best experiences we ever had.
review.comment_positive: This was one of the best hotels we ever stayed at. Jerry and his employee at the reception (i forgot her name unfortunately) are one of the nicest people we ever met, we were treated extremely well. He personally escorted us in and out of the Hotel and looked after us. We had a couple massage at the spa and got a big discount without even asking, it was amazing. I cant stress enough how generous and polite the staff was, they even asked us everyday how we were and helped us with anything we asked, we will be sure to come back next time we‘re in Hanoi and only stay here.

review.rating: I had a good time at the hotel and the staff and service are beyond awesome!
review.comment_positive: The food selection have good variety.  The taste of the pho 🍲 is really good.
review.comment_negative: The sign fit the location is a little bit hidden and not readily visible.

review.comment_positive:
Die Lage! Im Herzen des old Quarters. Mittendrin, überall kommt man gut zu Fuß hin. Perfekte Lage! Der Empfang im Hotel, so herzlich, so warm und hilfsbereit. Man merkt man ist wirklich willkommen. 
Die Zimmer waren schon eingerichtet und hatten definitiv Charme. 
Eine perfekte rundum Betreuung. Das Frühstück war gut, es gab eine gute Auswahl. 
Wir kommen sogar wieder, der nächste Aufenthalt im Hotel steht schon fest.
service is amazing, super helpful!
review.comment_negative: very noisy, you will hear everything that happens in the room next to you or on the corridor :( better bring your ohropax.

review.comment_positive: Locatie, service, gastvrijheid
Great staffing and really nice location in the old quarter
friendly and flexible staff
review.comment_negative: breakfast can be improved

review.comment_positive: Located on back street in the city center and no noise at night. Good for rest. Comfy beds and nice interior design. Staff is so polite and welcoming. Enjoyed it a lot. Breakfast is varied and buffet, good quality. This is a new hotel 3 years old, sister of the main hotel on main road. Very good value for money. Totally recommended, if I knew before I would have cancelled my airbnb and stayed here longer.
review.comment_negative: All superb

review.rating: Ubicación perfecta en el centro de Hanoi
review.comment_positive:
Tanto Kim como el resto del staff nos recibieron genial, gestionaron el traslado al aeropuerto e incluso nos ofrecieron una mejora en la habitación a una categoría superior.
Ambas habitaciones eran amplias, limpias, con una decoración cuidada y camas cómodas. En definitiva, muy agradables para descansar.
El desayuno se sirve en el hotel de enfrente (de la misma cadena) y es tipo buffet muy completo. Por poner alguna pega, hay muchísimas más opciones saladas que dulces.
La ubicación es magnífica en el Old Quarter a un paso de todo lo que necesitas ver.
El día del check out nos permitieron usar una sala para descansar tras dejar la habitación y darnos una ducha antes de salir.
review.comment_negative: El hotel está en un patio interior al que se accede por un estrecho callejón, por lo que las habitaciones o no tienen ventanas o dan a otro edificio muy cercano. Esto es algo a tener en cuenta ya que en las fotos quizás no lo muestran al 100%. Para nosotros no fue un problema ya que solo usábamos la habitación para dormir.

review.comment_positive: Grace was very helpful in planning all my trip activities!

Sólo nos quedamos una noche por qué el otro hotel de la cadena no tenía disponibilidad y como nos gustó pues reservamos una habitacion en la misma cadena. La habitación estaba bien y el personal encantador
review.comment_negative: La habitación no tenía ventana pero no nos importo ya que solo íbamos a dormir

review.comment_positive: Nhân viên lễ tân bình thường, phòng ở mức chấp nhận.

review.rating: Great style, really comfortable beda, lovely staff
review.comment_positive: The hotel located right in the old town, is in two parts, across the road from each other, our part down a pleasant alley with murals had new  beautiful patterned black and white tiles on the floors, which made a lovely atmosphere. Jerry, the manager and all staff were lovely and we were upgraded to a spacious corner room with stylish ensuite and very comfortable beds, The breakfast was great and when we had to leave early the next day Jerry had a simple breakfast made for us to take with us. A wonderful stay, thank you Jerry and staff. Note also that the car the hotel offered to and from the airport is good value and costs less than a taxi. ( we took the taxi out and the car back)
review.comment_negative: Not the hotel’s fault, but if you take a tour that collects you from the hotel, make sure to say the street number so they go to the right part of the hotel. although the room looked into the side of another building it wasn’t a problem as we kept the curtains closed and were out in the daytime.

review.comment_positive:
Disponibilité et gentillesse du personnel qui répond parfaitement à toutes nos attentes/demandes rapidement et aimablement.

Top du top. Nous avons été surclassés sans rien demander.

Très propre. 
Beaucoup d'informations sur les choses à faire/voir/manger.
Emplacement privilégié à deux pas du marché. 

La climatisation est très high-tech et performante. (En été ça fait du bien)

Réductions intéressantes de 35% pour les massages juste de l'autre côté de la rue.

On recommande à 200% !

La habitación aunque no tenía ventana, fue fantástica y fue mejor que no tuviera porque en la calle había mucho ruido y de este modo no oimos nada de nada. Todo estaba super limpio, la cercanía al centro fue perfecta y el personal hiper amable.
El desayuno era variado y completo.
Sin duda alguna super recomendable.

The location was perfect, the staff was very friendly and helpfull. You can ask them anything and they always try to help you. The activities they offer are very good and even cheaper than the offices elswhere in town. When we come back to Hanoi we surely would stay again in this hotel.

review.rating: Amazing staff, quiet rooms, great location
review.comment_positive:
- Amazing staff, very friendly and always willing to help. They always make sure you have the best stay possible and they have so much dedication for what they do. I truly cannot recommend them enough, they are doing a great job! 
- Great location, very close to the Sword Lake and right in the middle of the action
- Quiet rooms and comfy beds, slept very well
- Very good breakfast, lots of options, both European and Asian
- Possibility to book Ha Long & Ninh Binh tours, which are very well organized and great value for money
- Quick turnaround for laundry (we gave them the clothes in the morning and they were back in the evening)
review.comment_negative: - Cleanliness could be improved, there were lots of hairs on the shower head and found some hairs on the bed as well... Also, we stayed for six nights and our sheets were never changed in that period. Towels were replaced daily though, which I appreciate.

review.comment_positive: schone ruime kamer, personeel heel vriendelijk
review.comment_negative: niets, alles was perfect zeker voor de prijs.

review.rating: Wonderful stay! Highly recommended for anyone wanting to experience the vibe of the Old Quarter in Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Location is amazing - right in the middle of all the action of the Old Quarter. Staff are exceptionally accommodating and helpful.

It was one of the best service we have received while on vacation. The room was very comfortable and clean, the breakfast was delicious and with so many options to choose from and the staff was incredibly fiendly, professional and attentive to our needs. Also, the hotel location was perfect, as it is close to the center.
review.comment_negative: The room we stayed in didn’t have a window and the shower didn’t have glass to separate it from the rest of the bathroom. Other than that, whici was not a big deal, everything was amazing.

review.comment_positive: Ở mức bình thường thôi, không có gì đặc biệt.

review.rating: Wonderful staff and amazing location! Strongly recommend
review.comment_positive: We had an amazing stay at Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley. Jerry, Kim and all the staff members were very helpful and made sure we have a comfortable stay in their city. They provided us with early check-in and breakfast on the day of arrival as we had morning flight. Guided us on all the routes and excursions we can visit. Location is the best as it’s in old quarter and major attractions are just walking by. We would strongly recommended to stay with them! -Ayushi & Pratyush
The staff were very attentive and helpful throughout our stay, most especially Grace, Justin and Tracy.  They made sure our stay was pleasant and enjoyable.

review.rating: I will definitely return here on my next trip to Hanoi.
review.comment_positive: The staff are excellent. They were extremely helpful and went above and beyond expectations.
Clean room. Great location. Helpful staff. Nice breakfast

Innanzitutto lo staff, semplicemente eccezionale. Una menzione speciale a Grace che ha seguito ogni fase dalla prenotazione alla pianificazione delle escursioni e ci ha fatto sentire a casa fin dal primo momento. È la prima volta che incontro una professionista di questo livello e con questa passione verso il proprio lavoro. Accoglienza ed attenzione a tutti i dettagli straordinaria. Camera accogliente,  pulita ed accessoriata di ogni comfort. Colazione ricca e varia per tutti i gusti. Location vicino a tutti i principali punti d'interesse. Ottima Spa a prezzi vantaggiosi.
review.comment_negative: Tutto perfetto

review.rating: Great location, nice room in a very central location

- shower if you leave late (amazing value)
sạch sẽ trong tầm giá . các bạn nhân viên luôn vui vẻ và hỏi thăm khách hàng

The hotel is perfectly located in the middle of the old quarter. If you plan to stay a bit longer, you might miss a window in the room. But who’s visiting Hanoi to stay in the room ;-)

review.comment_negative: The hotel is inside a long lane on the main street. Its fun, but catches you at a surprise. No view from Windows was a little sad.

review.comment_positive: El personal i la ubicació. Immillorable.

review.rating: 飯店經理JUSTIN的服務熱忱讓我們有極佳的住宿體驗(還幫我們修理行李箱)，每位員工也都很親切，旅客都會被照顧的妥妥的，有被在乎的感覺。
review.comment_positive:
推薦給台灣來的旅客們!
老城區裡，離咖啡街超近，去哪都方便，鬧中取靜，房間內是完全聽不到大街的吵雜聲，早餐新鮮，選擇不算超級多但絕對吃得飽，每一位員工都很親切，大廳香香的很放鬆，房內寬敞有窗，床墊軟硬適中，枕頭2顆/人(軟硬各一，符合不同睡眠習慣)

They were very helpful, attentive and made sure that we were taken care of very well.  Five stars for the staff and the service.

review.rating: A wonderful stay with great staff
review.comment_positive: We just loved the staff here, they were so much fun and speak great English ☺️ So helpful in suggesting places to go. Thank you for making our time here so enjoyable. We will miss them and would return again if we ever went to Hanoi again. They also helped us to book a trip to Halong Bay and upgraded our room to a bigger size. The price of the room is also really affordable.
review.comment_negative: The first room didn't really have a view but we didn't mind too much as it was a great size and nice and cool after a hot day. A few more TV options would be good for English speaking visitors and perhaps slippers and robes in the room would have made our stay extra special :)

review.comment_positive: location, staff, value for money

review.comment_positive: sang sạch đẹp

Lo staff eccezionale, tutti molto gentili. Hotel molto pulito, la nostra camera era molto grande con tutti i confort, molto silenziosa anche se eravamo in pieno centro. Ci hanno organizzato loro la crociera ad Halong Bay, e il tour a Sapa.
Per la colazione bisogna attraversare la strada nell'edificio difronte. È a buffet molto abbondante, tutto molto buono.
Grazie per l'ospitalità.

review.rating: Cozy little place in the heart of Hanoi with extremely helpful staff.

Wir sind wetterbedingt einen Tag früher nach Sapa abgereist, was überhaupt kein Problem nicht darstellte.

review.comment_positive: El personal es muy atento y te ayuda en todo lo que necesitas para facilitar tu viaje. El desayuno es excelente. La ubicación es excelente.

review.rating: Perfect place to stay - great staff, location and value
review.comment_positive: Lovely team - so caring, kind and helpful. Justin, Grace, Tracy, Henry and Sophie made our stay wonderful. Excellent room and location too, right in the thick of the thick of the action, just five minutes walk to the lake and the Old Quarter. If you stay in Hanoi and you don’t wish to spend a fortune, this place ticks all the boxes.

review.comment_positive: Both Jerry and his team were very helpful. The decor in the room was immaculate. The breakfast was elaborate .

review.rating: A wonderful hotel in the center of Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Outstanding hospitality, great location, large and clean rooms, excellent breakfast, quiet and very convenient, great value for your money.

De staff is geweldig. Schone kamers, goede service , top locatie dichtbij veel highlights maar de staff is dus echt 10/10. Zelfs na het uitchecken kregen we online nog hulp. Niks minder dan perfect. Raad dit iedereen aan!
review.comment_negative: Niks

review.comment_positive: Gần trung tâm, sạch sẽ, nv nhiệt tình
personale preparato e accogliente

1.最好的Reception
這是我們這趟在越南住過的三間飯店裡面，最令我們印象深刻的。尤其是 Kim 與 Elle 的貼心，從抵達入住時像朋友般的問候與閒聊，他們會推薦 old quater 的美食，會記得你的行程並體貼的詢問是否需要協助。我們在河內時因為遇到颱風，下龍灣的行程被迫取消，所有的行程也需要相應的修改。比起其他的飯店在溝通的過程中對於 refund policy 的不近人情，Kim 反而主動提出是否有什麼他們可以協助的地方，真的讓我們受寵若驚，也感受到賓至如歸。我們叫 Grab 要前往下一間飯店時，Grab 司機在抵達之後無預警地取消訂單，也是 Elle 陪著我們頂著太陽與司機溝通，並馬上幫我們預定了下一台車。一般來說入住飯店的櫃檯在與客人互動時比較制式，不像 Hostel 的工作人員會很熱情的跟你分享當地的好吃好玩，但是我在 Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley 確實有感受到越南人的親切與熱情！

2.早餐
這家的早餐用餐地點需要過一個馬路去對面的姐妹飯店用餐，不過飯店的主廚手藝非常值得稱讚，不論是現煮的河粉,預先炒好的料理,沙拉等的口味都是非常令人滿意！
review.comment_negative: 房型沒有對外窗與窗景，不過好處是，即使身處河內老城區，待在房間內也不會被馬路上吵雜的喇叭聲或是商家的音樂而影響睡眠。所以如果你不介意房間沒有風景，我覺得這裡會是CP值很高的選擇。

review.comment_positive: The staff made this stay for me! In particular Grace & Justin- they were both so lovely and attentive. Had the best recommendations! :)
review.comment_negative: Nothing!

review.comment_negative: Vòi tắm hơi khó dùng

review.rating: Toller Service vom Personal - wirklich spitze! Sehr leckeres Frühstücksbuffet!
review.comment_positive: Wir sind sehr früh in Hanoi gelandet und waren bereits gegen 8 Uhr morgens im Hotel. Wir wurden sofort zum Frühstück eingeladen und danach durften wir direkt auf‘s Zimmer, so gegen 10 Uhr morgens. M. E. nicht selbstverständlich. Wir hatten einen 3 tägigen Ausflug gebucht und durften bis zu unserer Rückkehr unser großes Gepäck dort lassen. Alles schön überwacht damit nichts weg kommt.

Great property, really close to the centre and with nice, clean rooms. the staff members are really kind and helpful (they even offered me breakfast and early check in, as a room was available) when I arrived tired from my flight. I decided to stay here again when I returned to Hanoi for two more nights as I was really happy the first time.

review.rating: Wonderful staff, bed, location. Breakfast wasn't good. Hotel was dark, poorly decorated.
review.comment_positive: I really like the staff. They were all wonderful and genuinely nice people. They were also very competent at their job.
review.comment_negative: I didn't like the breakfast. It was also located in their other hotel across the street. There wasn't enough food variety and the taste was just meh.

それと従業員の皆さんの雰囲気作りや旅行のサポートをなら任せてほしいという姿勢がとても頼りになります。是非利用してみてください。
最低限の警戒心を持つのは前提ですが、よく知らない土地でもここなら安心できます。

Very strong aircon, good sized room, good amenities in the bedroom even providing some snacks which isn't common in the hotels we have stayed in in Vietnam. The staff were exceptional throughout the whole stay making us feel welcome and even offering to hold our bags for us for 3 days while we were on a tour. They also offer guests a waiting area with toilet and shower facilities to use during the day if you have already checked out.
