review.rating: Staff were lovely location is excellent.
review.comment_positive: Staff were excellent  happy to help with baggage and local knowledge of the area made getting around  stress free and easy
review.comment_negative: No window in the room

review.comment_positive: The location of this hotel is fantastic. Central to all of the main hot spots in Hanoi.  Only a few short steps from the lake. 5 min walk to night Market, a couple more to beer street. We travelled with our 14 month old baby and you couldn't hear a single noise from surrounding areas at night. So close enough to the action but not in the middle of it! The staff were amazing, so kind, friendly and helpful. They (as did all the Vietnamese people we have met) made such a fuss about our little girl. So helpful in organising food recommendations, airport transfers, a mechanic immediately when our shower was cold (due to the sudden drop in outside temperature). Always loaning umbrellas and offering help to us, and happy to chat too! We would happily recommend this hotel.
review.comment_negative: Happy with everything during our stay.

review.rating: We will stay here again for future visits.
review.comment_positive: Best location in the heart of Old Town and near the lake, wonderful and attentive staff, clean, good breakfast, very reasonable price.
review.comment_negative: None

review.comment_positive: Relatively new and clean. Location is good. Staff was helpful and welcoming. Grace, the sales manager, went above and beyond to ensure our stay was comfortable and well taken care of.

review.rating: Everything from hotel location to room comfort and service by hotel staff was all exceptional.
review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful 2-night stay at this hotel, which is very well located near the Hoan Kiem Lake. We received a very warm welcome from Grace, the hotel manager, who let us check in early. The bed was very comfortable and the room amenities were all above average. There were plenty of food selections at breakfast, and the service by the hotel staff was excellent. We wish we could stay longer.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really.

review.comment_positive: Mr. Jerry hat den Aufenthalt perfekt gemacht. Er und sein Team haben sich um alles gekümmert (wir konnten früher einchecken, Tipps und Buchungen für Ausflüge, Flughafentransfer usw.), alle waren super aufmerksam.  Einige Zimmer haben keine Fenster,  bei der Lautstärke der Stadt ist es aber auch besser,  durch die Klimaanlage war es trotzdem sehr gut. In die Old Town sind es nur wenige Gehminuten. Alles ist zu Fuß erreichbar.  Das Frühstück ist auf der anderen Seite der Straße aber sehr lecker und reichhaltig.

Depois de ter me hospedado em seis cidades diferentes no Vietnã em diferentes tipos de hospedagem posso dizer que essa foi a melhor.
A equipe da gerencia e recepção é perfeita.  São muito agradáveis,  gentis,  resolvem de um tudo para a gente, auxiliam sempre, de boa vontade, sempre com um sorriso no rosto.
 O quarto é bem decorado, amplo, o banheiro é funcional e o chuveiro permite um banho bem relaxante. Tudo limpo. Roupa de cama e banho muito boas.
 O café da manhã foi o mais abundante do pais, contando com um buffet vasto com itens regionais, frutas, café, iogurte, chá, phó e outros itens a la carte preparados na hora.
Muito perto de vários pontos turisticos e do ponto final do ônibus que vem do aeroporto (talvez seja o 86?!).
A equipe providencia ingressos para apresentações, transfer para o aeroporto, sugere restaurantes bons...nota 1000.
review.comment_negative: Pra mim, uma iluminação mais clara (eles optam pela luz amarela, mais aconchegante), principalmente na área do espelho e um espelho de corpo inteiro seriam interessantes.

review.comment_positive: Perfect location, nice staff, nice decoration
review.comment_negative: Moldy bathroom, no view from the window - wall direct in front

review.rating: Great service and value for money
review.comment_positive: The location and the breakfast were amazing. the staff was very friendly and accommodating. they helped us with every detail.
review.comment_negative: the sink in the bedroom was a little old.

review.comment_positive: The location was great and the room was comfortable as well as pretty. There were decent Vietnamese and western options for breakfast with fresh ordered eggs and pho which I enjoyed a lot. But what made my stay absolutely fabulous was the staff there, as they were so friendly and helpful, especially Grace! She answered lots of my questions and provided information even before I reached there, and the restaurants she recommended were affordable and delicious. After comparing prices I got from travel agents, I booked my Ha Long Bay cruise from the hotel as well. Cannot recommend more!
Der Service war perfekt !
Personal

review.rating: 性價比高的飯店，下次有機會仍會考慮入住
review.comment_positive: 飯店人員很親切熱誠，早餐還算豐富，很好吃。
review.comment_negative: 無

review.comment_positive:
possibly the best service i've ever experienced at a hotel!!!!! From the moment i made a booking i was contacted by a hotel staff on the app to arrange for airport pick up and tours, all of my subsequent replies and questions were met with fast responses. everyone at the hotel was very warm, welcoming and personal. from the moment we arrived till the day we left. special shoutout to kim and dave for being so hospitable - giving us recommendations on places to visit, restaurants to dine at, tips on buying things and navigating around the city, and checking in on us. they went above and beyond! they could have possibly been the best thing about our trip! :)

rooms were cosy and clean too.
review.comment_negative: no windows in the room but no biggie

review.rating: 5 star hotel service for an amazing price in a great location!
review.comment_positive: The staff were so amazing and went above and beyond! They were so helpful with tips and recommendations for Hanoi. They even offered to give us advice for our whole trip! Room was always spotless and laundry service was great. Breakfast was also delicious with plenty of options. Also had a 35% discount on in-house massages. Highly recommend!
The staff were all so helpful especially Grace , the hotel was so central to everything
review.comment_negative: Rooms dark not much natural light due to the style of building

review.comment_positive: We were a couple from Greece staying at Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley. Everything was perfect. The location was just next to the city centre, a few minutes away from the lake. The room was always clean and the bed was very comfortable. We also enjoyed the breakfast as there was a variety of things to eat. Our experience was nothing short of exceptional, primarily due to the incredibly kind and attentive personnel. From the moment we walked through the doors, we were greeted with warm smiles and genuine hospitality. Warm thanks to Grace and the rest of the team (sorry for not remembering the names) for being more than professionals. The personnel was really the highlight of our stay.
Khách sạn bình thường, không quá tệ.
Staffs very helpful. Room is nice.
review.comment_negative: Hotel entrance is narrow

review.comment_positive: Wir waren sehr zufrieden mit dem Hotel, Service, Frühstück, Zimmer trotz Nasszelle.
review.comment_negative: Das Zimmer war etwas kleiner als erwartet, kein schöner Ausblick aus dem kleinen Fenster.

review.rating: It's a  nice hotel in great location
review.comment_positive: The hotel was very well located. The highlight of this hotel though is staff, especially Jerry, who is the kindest person ever. Even though there were some complications with my room, Jerry ensured that my stay is comfortable. If you want to meet amazing people that introduce you to Vietnamese hospitality,  stay here.
review.comment_negative: Noise from the neighbours and lack of window in my room.

review.rating: My girlfriend and I had a wonderful stay! The staffs are great!
review.comment_positive:
1. The location of the hotel is right in the old quarter which is one of the most popular areas to visit in Hanoi, so there is no need to get a cab.  
2. The rooms are ones of the cleanest hotels I have ever stayed. And it is so quiet that you won’t be able to hear the horn sounds from motorbikes or cars outside the hotel.
3. One of the major reasons I speak highly of this hotel is that the service and helps from the staffs are impeccable.  Jerry, Grace, and one of the female staffs who I forgot the name (If you see this, I’m sorry I forgot your name!) are the reasons why I write this review. They are very helpful, and they genuinely care about you. I was advised to exchange currency across the street, and the agency across the hotel scammed me. After I came back to the hotel, I told Grace about it, and she asked me to follow her to the agency and helped me get everything right! 
4. They can get you cheaper tours and taxis than your own ways. 
In a word, there is no doubt I will stay in Emeraldwaters Hotel Valley whenever I decide to spend a night in Hanoi! 
If you are the owner of this hotel, get this, your staffs are the reasons why your hotels are so good. Make sure they don’t leave your hotel, or it’s going to be your loss!
review.comment_negative: There is none!

review.rating: 飯店位在鬧區，但不是第一排，反而比較安靜。旅館的人員都很熱情的接待，房間大且舒適乾淨，算是此行中最滿意的飯店之一。
review.comment_positive: 房間舒適，早餐豐盛。

review.rating: מלון ברמה ממוקם טוב, צוות טוב
review.comment_positive:
מלון טוב ברמה גבוהה, מנהל המלון והצוות שלו מאוד חמודים ועוזרים בכל מה שצריך כולל סגירת אטרקציות ומוניות במחירים יותר טובים מהGrab, רואים שחשוב להם מהלקוח. זרימת המים במקלחת חזקה מאוד וגם בברזים.
ממליץ לכל הישראלים, מנהל המלון אוהב ישראלים ויעשה לכם דילים למסאגים

I am very pleased by staying at this hotel. The staff especially receptionist Minhh Lee was very helpful and friendly. She is an amazing person and a personality with a gorgeous smile on her face. They helped us and gave a lot of useful recommendations for visiting hotspots in Hanoi. Highly recommend the hotel. Thank you for everything.

review.rating: für einen kleinen Stadttrip sehr gut
review.comment_positive: Die Lage ist ausgezeichnet und alle Highlights fussläufig erreichbar. Das Personal informiert einen sehr gut und wir konnten uns zws 2 Zimmern entscheiden. toller Service. es ist sehr ruhig innerhalb des Hotels, zum schlafen perfekt.
review.comment_negative: die Bauart des Hotels lässt nicht bei jedem Zimmer Fenster zu.

review.comment_positive:
La posizione è perfetta, in pieno quartiere vecchio, il personale di una gentilezza lodevole, un grazie a Jerry e allo staff per la preziosa collaborazione. La colazione buona con prevalenza di cucina vietnamita,
 In rapporto al prezzo sono soddisfatto.
review.comment_negative: La camera senza finestra e il lavabo a fianco del letto non è molto comodo. Comunque sopportabile.

review.rating: nicest staff ever, room with no window
review.comment_positive:
the staff are amazing, nicest people ever
everything was clean
comfy room
review.comment_negative:
the room didn’t have window which made it very claustrophobic
shower was broken
breakfast was quite disappointing if you are expecting a western style buffet

review.rating: Clean, comfy and modern hotel in the Old Quarter
review.comment_positive: The hotel is right in the Old Quarter and the rooms are very clean. After a bad experience with another hotel we weren’t very hopeful, but Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley really impressed us. Clean and comfy rooms, super helpful staff and very tasty breakfast at their sister hotel across the road. Jerry in the reception went above and beyond to help us and sort us out with our travels. Thanks guys!
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Kind and smart staffs, cosy room, incredibly delicious breakfast

The staff was exceptional! Especially Grace and Justin who were very kind and helpful and always smiling. Location was also fantastic. A couple blocks away from the lake and popular areas of the Old Quarter, and a couple blocks away in the other direction from the freeway which made it very easy to access going to/from the airport. This hotel is recessed from the main road (accessed through one of the skinny hallways that are common throughout Hanoi) which meant it was really quiet. Rooms have a window facing an interior space which allowed natural light in without the street noise which was greatly appreciated. Would definitely stay again.

Desayuno completo y variado.
Como repetimos varios días distintos nos dieron una habitación superior por el mismo precio

The staff were AMAZING. Made our Vietnam trip so easy and pleasant. They were super friendly and attentive, really helpful with information and also practical help. We loved the personal welcome and goodbye each time, and the genuine interactions with us. 

The rooms were clean, spacious, and had all the amenities you would expect. The breakfast was delicious (you could order fresh pho and omelettes!) and really good to have breakfast included when we had early morning starts due to tours. 

The location is perfect, right in the Old Quarter and near loads of great food places!
review.comment_negative: The only thing we didn't like was the lack of natural light in the room, but it's not a deal-breaker by any means.

review.rating: Séjour très agréable, avec des chambres confortables et propres, petit-déjeuner de qualité et un personnel très agréable
review.comment_positive: Chambre silencieuse et très propre, établissement au goût du jour. Personnel professionnel et aux petits soins !
review.comment_negative: RAS

review.comment_positive: The lovely friendly staff
review.comment_negative:
The photos are a bit deceiving. The rooms are very small & the fridge didn’t work. 
There was no restaurant operating at the property. It was served at a neighbouring property.

review.comment_positive: 員工態度佳，Lilie 小姐還會説中文。早餐比預期的還要好。

Nhân viên thân thiện, các bạn lễ tân chu đáo, chăm sóc khách và làm hài lòng khách hàng. 
Bữa sáng ngon.

The property was located very near to the Hoan Kiem lake in a busy street, yet there was no noise from the traffic in the room. The room was very beautiful with all the amenities. All the staff were helpful and always greeted us with a smile. My shoes got soaked in the rain, they cleaned and dried them without any extra charge, just make our whole stay even more comfortable. Jerry, the manager gave us a free upgrade and helped in creating an optimal itinerary for going around Hanoi. The room and bathroom was spacious and squeaky clean. The breakfast offered was delicious and had a lot of options. There is not a single thing that we didn’t like about the property.
review.comment_negative: Nothing at all

review.comment_positive: Excellent staff who were very friendly and helpful throughout our stay. Great location, close to Hoan Kiem Lake and many shops/restaurants. Clean and quiet rooms (can only hear people in the corridor but minimal noise overall). Delicious breakfast with a great selection and made to order pho or eggs! Very good value for the price.

review.rating: 櫃檯服務人員，總是笑臉迎人，幫忙解決問題，得到很多協助，讓旅行的體驗更棒。
review.comment_positive: 服務和￼早餐￼
review.comment_negative: 沒有

review.rating: こじんまりしたホテル
review.comment_positive:
スタッフがベトナム滞在の事や帰りのバスの時間など色々気にかけてくれた。
空港バス（86）バス停や、水上人形劇、湖などが徒歩圏内で便利であった。
ランドリーサービスは3ドル／1kgで、朝出したら夜に洗って畳んで返してくれて便利であった。
朝食会場は斜め前の「系列店」のホテルの2階で、ビュッフェ形式＋オムレツやフォーなどはオーダーで食べれました。
review.comment_negative:
このホテルは少し奥まったところにあり、細い道を通るため、初見では分かりにくい。
このホテルの「系列店」が斜め前にあるので、そちらと間違えてしまった。
しかし、系列店も親切で、私の荷物を持って案内してくれた。

review.comment_positive: Dịch vụ dọn phòng ở mức được. Nhân viên bình thường.
Excellent staff - really exceptional - very helpful. Very clean and comfortable. Superb breakfast with wide choice. Very good value for money. Good location on S edge of Old Quarter.
Very clean, wonderful staff.

The employee is very friendly and willing to help.
The hotel shows credit card is acceptable but when I arrived, the employee said some problem with the bank. But still they found a way for me to use the credit card which is good.
review.comment_negative: Insulation is not good, easily to hear the sound from other rooms and the hallway.

review.comment_positive: Excellent location, it’s right in the old quarters and next to the lake. we found very convenient to just walk and go everywhere - lake, night market, beer street etc. The breakfast was one of the best we had in vietnam. Good spread in both veg & non veg & it is just across the street. Everything was smooth from check in to check out & we also opted for their airport pickup/drop which was nicely priced. The room was small & cozy and AC worked fine so we didn’t really miss a balcony. Infact it was much quieter so it helped us get a nice sleep :)
review.comment_negative: Nothing, we got everything we need.

review.rating: Very friendly staff. Spa need to be improved
review.comment_positive: Very friendly staff, smiling and greeting you all the time. Special shout-out to Jerry and Ellie for ensuring all of our inquiries are met. Good WiFi connection throughout the hotel and rooms are clean and comfortable.
review.comment_negative: Hopefully they can improve on the spa service and facility and privacy. There were no doors and the masseuse did not close the curtain during the massage and when we get changed. The manager was talking to other guests at the lobby and we can hear it loudly during the massage.

review.comment_positive: The service is fantastic, and all the staff go above and beyond to be helpful throughout the duration of my stay. Breakfast is pretty substantial. The location is excellent and provides accessibility to local cafes and restaurants, especially Cafe Giang, which is the home of the original egg coffee. As a solo female traveller, I was initially apprehensive because I had to pass through a very short alley to access the main entrance (later learned this was the norm for may places in Hanoi), but I was pleasantly surprised at how comfortable the room was.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really. If you're looking for extra facilities like a pool or rooftop bar, they don't really have that, but you don't really need one if you plan on exploring Hanoi and surrounding cities.

review.comment_positive: Super emplacement, le staff au top!!!
review.comment_negative: Pas de fenêtre 😔 ou fenêtre condamne

review.comment_positive:
Short walking distance to the lake and other attractions at Old Quarters. Exceptional advice from the staff on Halong Bay, Sapa & Ha Giang. They will even help you to book.

Even help us book a taxi service to the airport below Grab's price.

Service from Jerry and Grace is highly appreciated.
review.comment_negative: It's a little hidden but not too hard to find as the sister hotel is just across the main road.

review.comment_positive: The staff are very helpful and friendly.
Vị trí bình thường, phòng sạch, dịch vụ ở mức trung bình.

review.rating: Pleasant. Great location. Friendliness of staff made my day.
review.comment_positive: Breakfast at spa was very good. Friendly and helpful staff. Fantastic location.
review.comment_negative: Design of bathroom could be improved. Better partitioning to prevent water splatter all over the place.

review.comment_positive: The service was AMAZING. Grace and Tony did everything to make our stay unforgettable.

Everything about this hotel was excellent, the hotel is in the perfect location, close to the old quarter,  lake, night market and at weekends the walking district, but if you wish to go a little further in the city, the staff will organise a grab "taxi" and the rates are very reasonable. 
The breakfast is of a very high order with a very varid menu to suit all tastes, and the staff are very attentive and will make you something special to suit your dietary needs. 
As I've mentioned the staff they are without exception the most efficient, charming and helpful I ever met, and I will strongly recommend this and its sister hotel Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel and Spa, to my friends and family.
review.comment_negative: Having to leave.

review.comment_positive:
Fantastisch hotel  met zeer behulpzaam en meedenkend personeel.
Speciale vermelding voor Jerry die alles voor je regelt en ook na verblijf in hotel contact houdt of alles goed gaat wat hij heeft geregeld. 
Pluspunt is het diner in hun andere hotel, zeer goed.
sạch tiện
Bữa sáng ngon. Lễ tân và nhân viên nhiệt tình, chuyên nghiệp

review.rating: Gets a 10 and I dont give them often!
review.comment_positive:
Great hotel. I dont often give a 10 but here gets one! 

Clean room and hotel, good room layout, efficent aircon, great breakfast selection in a relaxed environment and such helpful and friendly smart uniformed staff both at recieption and breakfast.

We cancelled a booking with another hotel across the road to return here after our first stay. Its marginally more expensive than some others in the area but totally worth it.

Airport transfers are very reasonably priced too.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive: Located in the old quarter. Stayed just one night. It was good.
review.comment_negative: Disliked nothing.

review.comment_positive: Các bạn nhân viên rất nhiệt tình

This small boutique hotel has staff with the biggest smiles and the best service.Staying here was the highlight of our trip.Every individual member believes that service is the only thing that separates the wheat from the chaffe.Kim and Jerry who were always so cheerful and accomodating,but most importantly the concierge Grace who was the embodiment of her name with all things Grac-ious and Grace-ful.Every guest was personally escorted by the whole team to their vehicles  when they checked out and as an Indian ,that hit home because that's precisely how we treat our guests and relatives.Location is excellent as it is in the heart of the Old quarter making it close to Everything important!
review.comment_negative: Rooms are small but it's fine for a small family or couple

review.rating: First visit to Hanoi , would definitely return to this hotel
review.comment_positive: Great location , fabulous friendly helpful staff , especially Kim , nice rooms , good breakfast …would highly recommend
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Great stay in Old Quarter. Walking distance to major sites. Clean rooms with some elegant design. Comfortable beds and pillows. Quiet at night, great breakfast variety! Amazing staff!
review.comment_negative: We truly had no complaints.

review.rating: Clean and friendly staff. Beautiful rooms!
review.comment_positive: So clean and location was excellent! The room was upgraded to larger beds. Staff were beyond accommodating and friendly! The breakfast buffet was so good as well.
review.comment_negative: Absolutely nothing. Place was great!

review.comment_positive:
Das Personal war ausserordentlich bemüht und hat uns bei allen Anliegen unterstützt und uns viel Reiseplanung abgenommen! 
Nach unserer Abreise erhielt ich wenige Tage später noch eine Mail, ob alles geklappt habe :) rund um wunderbar!
the room is clean, staffs are very courteous and helpful
review.comment_negative: The hotel entrance is in the alley, we have to cross the road to have breakfast in another hotel. The window look into the neighbours’ property

review.comment_positive: Friendly staff and location.
review.comment_negative: No pool.

review.comment_positive:
Établissement incroyable. Nous étions dans le deuxième bâtiment de l’hôtel, juste en face du principal. (attention Valley n’est pas le principal). Il se trouve dans une petite allée cachée et cela rajoute à l’expérience ! 
la chambre était parfaite concernant le confort et la taille. Bien décorée et des lits/coussins très moelleux. 
L’accueil et le personnel ont été incroyable avec nous. Très chaleureux, à l’écoute, répondant à plus que nos demandes. Nous avons été chouchoutés, comme si nous étions à la maison. 
Je reviendrai dans cet hôtel pour mon prochain séjour au Vietnam sans hésitation.
review.comment_negative: La chambre était placée dans un endroit un peu bruyant. pour les sensibles au bruit, penser à demander une chambre calme.

review.comment_positive:
amazing location right on the edge of old town - good shops and restaurants close by and not far from beer street. all tourist destinations walkable. good wifi. staff couldn’t be nicer and more helpful if they tried!! 

breakfast buffet amazing- is in the sister hotel over the road which did not bother us
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.rating: Good hotel in a great location with fabulous staff.
review.comment_positive: The staff Are excellent, especially Grace :)
review.comment_negative: Room was quite small for 4 people.

review.comment_positive: The staff are phenomenal!

From the moment you arrived you felt part of their family. Communication with staff before and during stay was outstanding. Hotel is in a great location walking distance to most things and restaurants are plentiful and close. Despite how busy the area the rooms are quiet. They booked excursions for us, provided airport shuttle, cared for our luggage while we toured Ha Long Bay did everything and more to make our stay great. Check in was simple as was check out. The breakfast across the street was outstanding. A special thanks to Jerry, Grace and Kim for the kindness and always greeting us with a warm smile and a helping hand.
review.comment_negative: Everything was great.

review.rating: Little home in the heart of Hanoi old quarter
review.comment_positive: the staff was amazing, super friendly. They had decorated our bed with flowers for my birthday and one boy from reception surprised me with cake and birthday song. Thank you for that
The behaviour of the staff
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Le personnel est adorable, accueillant et aidant. Le petit déjeuner est varié et très bon. L’emplacement est génial. C’était parfait
Comfortable and hospitable stay. Very helpful staff. Good breakfast. Spa experience was also great
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
Perfect choice. Amazing service and warm welcoming and all staffs are extremely kind. Great location and clean. The hotel is hidden from the street tho it’s very quiet which is the BEST to sleep. I’m satisfied staying the hotel. Big thank you for Tracy, Grace, Justin and door man who did really good job and support my stay in Vietnam. I strongly recommend to stay this hotel.
おすすめです！とても親切な対応をしていただきました。滞在中のアドバイスなど、部屋で困ったことがあったら親身に寄り添って、解決しようとしてくれます。部屋に窓がなかったので伝えたらすぐにお部屋をかえて頂きました。日本人観光客に対してとても礼儀正しく接してくださり、これからたくさんの旅行客にきてほしいと言っていましたので、ぜひご検討ください
friendly staff

review.rating: decent for how much it costs
review.comment_positive: outside the location but decent
review.comment_negative: the entrance in the hotel is a bit scary

review.comment_positive: Erg vriendelijk personeel. Kregen na 1 nacht een upgrade naar een ruimere kamer met raam. Hotel is centraal gelegen.
review.comment_negative:
Jammer dat er geen douchegordijn/wand in de badkamer was. Nu was er veel nat na het douchen.
Ontbijt is in een 'zuster' hotel aan de overkant. Aziatisch georiënteerd. Personeel daar was minder vriendelijk.

review.comment_positive: De ligging van het hotel is ideaal, op korte loopafstand van het meer en de nachtmarkt. Het personeel is ontzettend behulpzaam en lief en ze regelen alles voor je. Jerry, Grace, Justin en Tracey, bedankt voor alles!
localização perfeita, funcionários muito disponíveis, simpáticos e com um enorme sentido de profissionalismo.

Emplacement idéal à proximité de la vieille ville d'Hanoi.
L'hôtel est en retrait de la rue, on y accède par une ruelle, ce qui limite le bruit.
Nous avons choisi une chambre "sans vue" ce qui participe également à n'avoir pas de bruit

Le personnel est très serviable. 
Mention particulière à TRACY :)
review.comment_negative: Rien

review.comment_positive: Tucked away in the streets of Hanoi with very friendly staff and beautiful interior.

I stay in Hanoi hotels quite often and was very pleased with this hotel, trying if for the first time. I found everything, from design to bedding quality and BF buffet, to be at a higher quality level than comparable hotels in the old quarter in the same price range. And located in a little lane, away from the busy and noisy street, hence unusually quiet for the area. Top class, even though must add my comments refer to the suite.
review.comment_negative:
- Missing: international TV/news channels, somehow no BBCworld, CNN, DW, TV5
- Large window but facing the grey wall of the neighbouring building 1 mtr away (which makes it also quiet though)
- Was on 7th floor, slightly worried about no escape route in case of fire

review.rating: It was a very pleasant and comfortable stay. Will welcome new travellers to consider this hotel.
review.comment_positive: The staff was very helpful and provided good tours to do in Hanoi. I took up their offer for a 2D1N Ha Long Bay tour, and it was extremely affordable and they gave me a room with a balcony. Excellent service!

review.rating: The staff ! Specially Miss Tracy from the reception. She is a real jewel of Hanoi !!
review.comment_positive: Breakfast excellent and location too, only few minutes walk from the Lake.
review.comment_negative: Everything was fine !

review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel, with very nice, kind and helpful staff and at last an enjoyable breakfast with western and Asian options! The bed was very comfortable and the room quite and clean.
review.comment_negative: Everything was great!

review.comment_positive:
J’ai tout aimé dans cet hôtel.
L’emplacement est central mais les chambres sont très calmes et propre.
Le petit déjeuner était très bon et variés. 

Mention spéciale pour le personnel, aux petits soins, qui a marqué notre séjour au Vietnam.

review.rating: Great stay, perfect location and the loveliest staff
review.comment_positive: Jerry and staff were so helpful and friendly. They went above and beyond to help and guide us during our stay
Чисто, аккуратно, очень доброжелательные люди, всегда помогут👍 Чудесные завтраки😋

I have to say: best hotelstay in asia I had. From beginning to end just perfect. Super warm welcome by two lovelyyalways smiling ladies at my late check-in. Whilst perfectly nice small talk they suggested, what to do in the city on a saturday evening. After having a perfect shower (better water pressure than at home and temperaturerange you could either boil an egg or start a penguin farm, you have everything there) I enjoyed the very beautiful room (as seen on pictures) and a very confy bed before heading to the city which yeah just is in front of the main door. Unfortunately I had to leave already. The stay was however finished with a perfectly organized taxidrive to the airport.
Will definitely come back.
Special thanks also to the man who always so kindly opened the main door, when I returned home or went out!
review.comment_negative: If so, I walked into the wrong hotel first, as the one on the other side of the road was called almost the same and had a much more prominent entrance. But the staff immediately brought me to the right spot and helped with luggage, which was nice.

review.comment_positive: Localização fantástica, funcionários muito prestativos, explicaram tudo para nós sobre Hanoi, ajudaram-nos a escolher os melhores passeios. Agradecimentos especiais para Gracie.
hizmet

review.rating: The hotel staffs made our trip much more relaxing
review.comment_positive: From the beginning booking to the end of the trip, hotel staffs went over above and beyond, they were super helpful. They helped us arrange airport transportation, Day tour, laundry services, etc.  Breakfast was good too.10 out of 10 hospitality.  If we come back to visit Hanoi, we definitely book this hotel again.

The hotel is very well located, you can easily reach main attractions by walking. The staff is so kind and always ready to help. 

Grace made sure our stay was smooth and helped us having a wonderful time with them. She made us feel so welcome, her and her colleagues were definitely a highlight of this stay. 

It’s clean and comfortable and has everything you need.

- Extraordinary hospitality
- Super pleasent staff
- Amazing Breakfast with variations everyday
- Spacious rooms
- Walking distance to various main spots
- Many classic foodie stops just around the corne
review.comment_negative: Absolutely Nothing

review.comment_positive:
The staff were incredible.
They made the hotel. The location couldn't be better
review.comment_negative: Some of the facilities are limited but you can use the sister hotel next door.

review.comment_positive: The staff here are very kind and friendly and I like them all very much. The hotel was lovely and clean and so was my room. The bed was super comfortable and I slept very well. I would  stay here again and highly recommend this hotel.

Excellent service, hotel might be 4 stars but the service is 5 stars. The position of the hotel is good, although the entrance is a bit hidden and we missed it at first.
The bed and pillows were very comfortable for us.
review.comment_negative: The windows can't be opened, the room is small so the humidity can get high after you take a shower. The AC didn't always solve the issue

review.rating: Staff were really friendly and helpful. Would recommend to any friend going to hanoi
review.comment_positive: Location was ideal in the centre of the old town. Breakfast was a mixture of local and european food.
review.comment_negative: Nothing i can think off

review.comment_positive:
Amazing staff who went out of their way to make us feel welcome and comfortable. Comfy clean rooms, great breakfast selection and location was central but on a quieter street. We could not hear any street noise at all in our room.
We enjoyed our stay so much we booked again for our last night before our flight out!

review.rating: Perfect place to stay in Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Great people, great location, top value
review.comment_negative: Not really

review.rating: Incredible service from staff, beautiful place
review.comment_positive: Beautiful, clean hotel in a great location with exceptional service. All of the staff were incredibly helpful and went above and beyond for every question or request we had. Special shoutout to Justin, Grace and Tracy - best service ever!
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
Gem of a hotel in Hanoi old quarter! The rooms are neat and clean and breakfast nice but what sets this apart are the staff - Jerry, Nancy and Kim all helped with what was very odd requests - from helping find a place that sells a local toy to makeup remover! They have a nice area to store your luggage and showers in case you have a later flight like we did. This was the last leg of our trip so we didn’t need onward help or sightseeing in Hanoi but I’m sure they would be excellent at helping if needed.

We also needed to extend our stay but booking.com wouldn’t let us do it. So a few quick messages to Nancy and it was easily sorted. 

They also have reasonable airport transfers (which we used)
review.comment_negative: Nothing. Price to quality ratio is great!

review.rating: Absolutely wonderful stay. Top staff and great location.
review.comment_positive:
Believe the hype. The staff here are incredible and the location could NOT have been better.
Yes, there are no windows... But we only sleep and shower in the room.
Yes, breakfast is just across the street (literally across the road)... But that isn't nearly the weirdest thing you'll see in Hanoi!

We'll stay with them again any and every time we visit Hanoi.
review.comment_negative: Really struggling to think of anything... The shower didn't drain very fast!? Does that count??!

review.comment_positive: Khách sạn thơm, sạch sẽ, đẹp mắt

review.rating: ハノイが好きになるホテル
review.comment_positive:
内装やインテリアがかわいくスタッフがとても親切で、滞在を楽しむことができました。
私の顔と名前を覚えてくれており、雑談で早朝のフライトと聞くと、名前や部屋番号を確認しなくても、間違わずにタクシー手配とお弁当の手配をしてくれました。ホスピタリティが素晴らしかったです。
review.comment_negative:
排水が遅い。シャワーの温度調節が難しかったことぐらいで、慣れれば問題なかったです。
窓があるともっと良かった。

review.comment_positive: Everything is great, Jerry the concierge is one of the nicest people I’ve met, so helpful and proactive. Really enjoyed my stay.
Staff in this place is really amazing!!! All time that we stay here they were so kind to us))) ❣️
Chỗ nghỉ tốt. phòng sạch sẽ . tiện nghi
review.comment_negative: nhân viên có như không. khách đến k thèm hỏi

review.comment_positive: We had a great stay! The rooms are nicely decorated, comfortable and the shower is powerful. Breakfast was tasty and there was plenty of choice. All the staff are extremely friendly and helpful, especially on reception - they want to make sure your stay is perfect. The hotel is also in a great location. Would definitely recommend!

El hotel está muy bien ubicado, ya que puedes ir andando por el centro de Hanoi sin problemas. Las habitaciones están limpias y cumplen con la función para descansar y poder recuperar fuerzas.
El personal es EXTREMADAMENTE amable, nos ayudaron en todo tanto antes de llegar al hotel, como durante la estancia. Quisiera destacar la amabilidad y generosidad de Grace quien cuidó de nosotros en todo momento. Pudimos realizar excursiones contratadas con el hotel y todo fue estupendo.
Gracias!
review.comment_negative: nada, todo fue perfecto!

review.rating: Amazing value per money, great hospitality and the best & friendliest staff!
review.comment_positive:
In terms of value for money most probably the best you can get in Hanoi. We specifically loved the breakfast and the overall hospitality as everyone here always walks the extra mile for their guests (made early check-in possible, offered breakfast while waiting for the room, provided best service possible at all times, packed breakfast for us when we had to leave early for the airport, etc.) 
Excellent location as well!
The food was excellent! One of the best breakfast spread I've ever seen.
It is a really nice hotel with excellent staff, great intercontinental breakfast and perfectly located. I couldn't recommend it more! If you are looking for a very nice accommodation - book this one.

The room was big, and very nice furniture. But what made the difference was the staff. The staff was very friendly and willing to help with any questions or requests we had. Even when we had checked out and went back to Hanoi I visit the hotel back for their SPA services because we liked the service.. Thank you Justin, Geraff!!!

We stayed on 3 different occasions during our stay in Vietnam On each occasion the staff were so welcoming, organised, helpful and reassuring and professional. Special thanks to Grace, Jerry and Tracey and the two young men that helped us when we left at 5.15 am The hotel provided a breakfast for our early departure too
Rooms were clean , bed comfy and water hot and rooms quiet at night as hotel set back from the road. Theses were things much appreciated during our 5 week tour 
The hotel is ideally situated in the old district too

This hotel is an excellent value, and a great location to best of Hanoi￼! The breakfast buffet is the best we’ve ever had, and is well worth more than the price of the room. At first the setting off the street seems awkward, but you quickly realize it provides for greater privacy and less street noise.
Phòng tắm tạm được, có nước nóng. Khá ổn.

Extremely kind staff willing to help with anything and arranging the transfer for us last minute. Hotel is clean and sufficiently equipped, large shower. Perfect location in the very centre, walking distance anywhere in old town. Breakfast with wide range of food - predominantly savoury but some sweet as well.
trang trí phong cách indochine rất đẹp
review.comment_negative: thiếu view

review.comment_positive: really wonderful service 10/10. All staff went above and beyond for everything!
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.comment_positive: it’s just back off the street away from the craziness, super clean and friendly
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.rating: 立地も施設もスタッフの方々も素晴らしいです
review.comment_positive:
ホテルの部屋は非常に綺麗で、ベッドも寝心地がよかったです！朝ごはんは想像以上に豪華で、かつ美味しかったです。立地は観光客にはとても良いと思います。旧市街に歩いて行けますし、近くに良いスパやカフェもありました。
チェックアウト後も、地下のトイレやシャワー、洗面台を使っていいよ！とのことでお借りしました。深夜発の飛行機だったので歯磨きなども済ませることができて助かりました。
フロントの方はとても親切で、困ったことがあれば何でも聞いて！と頼りがいがありました。同行者が無くし物をした際は大変親身に対応してくださり、お店やタクシーに電話をかけてくださりました…。本当にありがとうございました。
review.comment_negative: 繁華街にあるので、街中の喧騒はホテルの部屋に居ても届きます。でも、極端に気になる程ではないです。

review.comment_positive: Everything was nice. Breakfast had veg, guide was good, location. English speaking. Great service by Grace, Jerry and Tracy.
review.comment_negative: Room was small. Small hotel with narrow entrance

review.comment_positive: Wir haben einen 3 tägigen Ausflug gemacht und durften unser großes Gepäck dort lassen. war alles noch da, wird alles überwacht. Einen Transfer zum Flughafen haben wir auch beim Hotel gebucht, hat auch hervorragend funktioniert. Wir können das Hotel wirklich sehr empfehlen. Tolles Personal, super freundlich und denkt mit.

review.rating: Jerry and Grace were the most phenomenal hosts we have ever had
review.comment_positive: The hotel was great but the staff were fantastic. Jerry and Grace truly gave the property a 5 star rating.  They arranged all our excursions and each was outstanding. They arranged transport, sightseeing, soccer game etc. Fantastic
review.comment_negative: I liked everything

review.rating: Amazing staff who made our stay in Hanoi very, very memorable!
review.comment_positive: The staff are wonderful, they went above and beyond to make our stay wonderful. Truly lovely people. The breakfast was also great, plenty to choose from and fresh.
review.comment_negative: The images of the rooms are a 3D rendered image and not a true representation of the space. We discussed this issue with Kim, who apologised, moved us to a bigger room and explained she would pass on the information to the owner.

review.comment_positive: everything was perfect
Conveniently positioned in the middle of everything. The staff were really attentive and helpful. The breakfast was excellent 😃
The location was amazing and the staff was the sweetest.
Khá ổn với mức giá này. Sẽ cân nhắc nếu tiết kiệm.

review.rating: Amazing service and care from the hotel staff !
review.comment_positive: The hotel is located in an alley leading into it, it is not on the main road directly. We wondered how the rooms would be. But I can tell you that the staff here go out of their way to make you feel welcome and cared for, even when your stay is over. I had a wonderful experience with Grace and Ellie who are the ever-smiling and helpful front desk ladies. They are amazing !! Since my husband had to work, they gave us a room that had a bigger desk space so he could place his laptops. That made him happy. When we checked out and flew to another city, I realized that I had left my new Adidas sandals back at this hotel. Grace actually sent me my sandals to our next hotel by express post with great efficiency and without making a single fuss ! I am so grateful for this. This is surely hospitality and service at its best and I will not forget it !
review.comment_negative: The breakfast options for a vegan like me are close to nil. Just fruits and fruit juice for me,  since everything else has egg in it - bread included.

review.rating: Our 6th hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter in 4 months, by far the absolute best.
review.comment_positive: Everything!! We booked 2 nights & extended to 5. Location, comfortable & dark rooms, daily housekeeping, fresh daily breakfast and of course the staff. Special mention to Kim & Ellie and of course Jerry the incredible manager who leads a wonderful, efficient, caring, professional yet friendly team. We are travelling with our 1 & 2 yr old, the staff were beyond amazing with our young family. Don’t hesitate to book here, you won’t be disappointed.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive:
The central location was perfect for us. 
Above that, the staff of the hotel is amazing. They really are. 
They are caring and help you with everything. 10 out of 10 🤩
Atención del personal
The entire staff is outstanding. Our third trip to Viet Nam and by far the best
review.comment_negative: That we had to leave. Loved it

review.comment_positive: The hotel was in a great location, the staff were really friendly and they booked all the trips and taxi that we needed. They offered a really great breakfast in their sister hotel over the road. We would definitely stay here again - we loved Hanoi
Nice staff and nice breakfast! The room is also quite nice.
The staff was so friendly and helpfull and the hotel was very nice and luxury.
Great hotel. The staff helped us with everything, they were amazing.
Sehr Freuntliches Personal. Zentral und trotzdem ruhig
Le personnel est aux petits soins. L’hôtel est confortable et bien décoré. Il est également très bien placé.
review.comment_negative: La chambre et la salle de bain sont un peu petites mais surtout il n’y a pas de fenêtre.

review.comment_positive: Muy limpio, cómodo, genial ubicado y está muy aislado del ruido.

Het meeste vriendelijke personeel wat ik ooit ben tegengekomen in een hotel. Fijne kamer, heerlijk bed en een goed ontbijt. 

Locatie is ook geweldig als je de oude stad van Hanoi wil bezoeken.

Zeer aan te raden!!
Friendly staff, arranged breakfast to go

The hotel is placed close to anything we needed, close to the center.the stuff was super helpfull. They helped us book a trip to Halong Bay and they will help you always with anything you might need, just ask.

review.comment_negative: We loved everything :)

review.rating: Super freundliches Personal, gute Lage. Wir kommen gerne wieder.
review.comment_positive: Das Personal war extrem freundlich und bemüht. Betten waren weich, Frühstück war im Schwesternhotel auf der anderen Straßenseite und ausreichend Auf Probleme wurde sofort eingegangen. Auch den Bus für unseren nächsten Aufenthalt konnten wir dort buchen.
review.comment_negative: Kein Tageslicht im Zimmer. Wir hatten nur  ein Fenster das in einen Schacht ging. Störte uns aber dann nicht wirklich weil wir den ganzen Tag unterwegs waren.

review.comment_positive: Very good Service. My luggage didn't arrive with the airplane, so Jerry helped with supporting by calling the airport collected ideas to deiner my  luggage to our next accomodation and got it finally that it have been briought the same day! Super!!
Excepcional el trato de todo el personal

Die Lage ist hervorragend man befindet sich in mitten von Hanoi, trotzdem ist von dem Trubel im Hotel / auf den Zimmern nichts zu hören. Das Personal ist super freundlich und zuvorkommend. Wir wurden herzlich empfangen und bekamen gleich ein paar Tipps für unseren Aufenthalt in Hanoi. Man kann im Hotel auch SIM-Karten für ca 8€ kaufen. Das Frühstück war super und auch die Sauberkeit lässt keine Wünsche offen.

review.rating: Cozy hotel in a nice location, needs refurbishing.
review.comment_positive: The staff is very polite and kind. They are always available to help and give suggestions. The rooms are also kept very clean.
review.comment_negative: There are no windows in the rooms and the lighting is very dim. Furthermore, the rooms end up being very humid because of the lack of windows. Overall, the furniture is old and a bit worn off.

review.rating: Great place and the staff are hard worker and very help fil
review.comment_positive: The area and the staff are super great ! I recommand this hotel !!!!!
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: phòng ấm cúng, cổ điển

Great Location and Friendly Staff. 

Wonderful stay. The location is excellent with easy access to the historical places. Warm and friendly staff which made the stay all the more pleasant. Kim and Jerry were extremely helpful and hospitable. Room was good with comfortable beds. Clean and hygienic toliet. Breakfast was also good with ample options. Highly Recommend.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast is across the street in sister Hotel. Would have preferred in-house.

review.rating: Super friendly staff, great location, clean hotel.
review.comment_positive:
Amazing hotel ! The staff is super friendly and will go above and beyond to try and help/accommodate you. The room was nice, good size, and clean. Breakfast was very tasty (for both Western and Asian food preferences). They offer a same day laundry service, which is very nice. The location was perfect as well ! Located in Old Quarter and very nearby all the entertainment.

All in all, it was a very good stay and I would definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family.
review.comment_negative: Everything was very good !

review.rating: Cozy boutique hotel with good service
review.comment_positive: Great location with lots of restaurants and cafes nearby. The staffs are friendly and flexible. They even let me use shower at shower room after check out, as I needed to take redeye flight.
review.comment_negative: Standard room does not have window, but it's okay if you just sleep there.

review.comment_positive: excellent location for walking everywhere but set back from the road so quiet. amazing staff - very friendly and couldn’t do enough to help. Great recommendations from them on where to eat etc. comfortable hotel. great breakfast.
review.comment_negative: nothing.

review.comment_positive:
The exceptional service from the hotel staff.
I was so happy with the service that I will agin stay at this place in future trip to 🇻🇳Vietnam.

The hotel is definitely a highlight of our journey in Hanoi! Every staff is warm-hearted, they provided what we really needed during our stay, and made us an unforgettable family trip : )

Reasonable price, various choices of breakfast, excellent location, lovely decorations, and not to mention, irreplaceable hospitality. Strongly recommend!

review.rating: Super clean, great location, very helpful staff. Would recommend .
review.comment_positive: The hotel staff were very welcoming and helpful. Our aircon broke and they fixed it swiftly even on a busy public holiday. The staff helped us book tours and were great at suggesting restaurants etc

Super Lage und die familiäre Betreuung frr Angestellten haben den Aufenthalt umso schöner gemacht. Ich kann das Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley wärmsten weiterempfehlen!

review.rating: Hotel stay was very comfortable in a great location with wonderful helpful staff.
review.comment_positive: Staff were very attentive and helpful.  Breakfast was amazing with great selection.  The room was spacious and comfortable with excellent air conditioning.
review.comment_negative: The only drawback to our room is that there was no window to allow natural light.  However, for the price and the rest of the positives, this was a minor issue.

review.rating: Fantastisk beliggenhed og en fantastisk service af personalet
review.comment_positive: Fantastisk beliggenhed og en fantastisk service af personalet.

review.rating: It is absolutely worth the money.

Hotel's team is wonderful.
Alai they helped me a lot with some issues of the visit. Like setting the esim, Grab App and doawnloading missing files to my phone.

review.rating: An excellent experience for a short stay
review.comment_positive: Great Location and wonderful staff

review.rating: Tolle Unterkunft in bester Lage von Hanoi!
review.comment_positive: Das überaus freundliche Personal hat jederzeit dafür gesorgt, dass wir uns rundum wohl fühlen! Wir durften nach einem anstrengenden Nachtflug sehr früh einchecken. Sie waren bei allen Fragen zur Umgebung, Buchungen für die Weiterreise und Aktivitäten sehr hilfreich. Wir haben uns sehr willkommen gefühlt und hatten eine tolle Zeit in Hanoi. Die Zimmer sind sauber und haben eine gute Größe. Das Frühstücksbuffet ist reichhaltig. Und das beste am Hotel ist sicher die Lage, fußläufig ins Old Quarter und French Quarter von Hanoi. Wie empfehlen das Hotel gern weiter!
review.comment_negative: Unser Zimmer hatte leider kein Fenster, das hat uns aber nicht so gestört, da wir tagsüber viel unterwegs waren. Nachts ist es etwas hellhörig.

review.rating: Good service and friendly staff. Will recommend this hotel as a value option.
review.comment_positive: The service was superb. Big thank you to Jerry, Kim and Grace for the hospitality. Whatsapp me after my stay to make sure that everything is still going smoothly as I am still in Vietnam. Genuinely care for their guests. The Sapa tour that I booked with them was fantastic as well.
Fijne plek midden in de stad, schone goed verzorgde kamer. Fijne behulpzame mensen.

review.rating: The location is everything… the breakfast is incredible and I’m really happy I chose to stay there
review.comment_positive: Incredible breakfast (really good fresh juices, large selection). The location is amazing, you really can’t beat it. The staff was really helpful too and I only wish I could have stayed longer
review.comment_negative: Some bedrooms don’t have windows… it’s really common in Vietnam :) I asked them to move me to a room with one and they did it (even upgraded it) thank you again!

review.comment_positive: Jerry and his team were marvellous hosts. It was our wedding anniversary and they made such a terrific effort to make it a memorable occasion for us including decorating our room beautifully.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Nothing more I could say fantastic little hotel

Great location!
Best breakfast we had in Vietnam!
The room was well done, and the bed was super comfy!
Tracy and Bling at the front desk were very helpful. Mr Jerry, the hotel manager, has the hotel's and guest best interest.

Highly recommend
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Jerry is the most amazing staff member. Before we arrived we messaged the motel to ask about tours. Jerry went above and beyond, we arrived at on the overnight sleeper train hours before check in and they provided us with showers and breakfast BEFORE we were able to check in. They also organised our tour of Halong Bay for a night, and had accomodation available to us on our return plus an airport shuttle. Jerry is their best staff member, making sure you feel welcome and super accomodating. Would highly recommend!!

review.rating: in one word, the stay was comfortable and wonderful. special mention of Kim who was super super super nice and ensured w
review.comment_positive: the location and the hospitality
review.comment_negative: no windows in the room

review.comment_positive: Lokalizacja. Przemiła i bardzo pomocna obsługa hotelu. Bardzo dobre śniadania
room very small but very comfortable and clean. The window is a dwmi- which should be clearer when booking but the hotel service staff and breakfast are really great
review.comment_negative: demi window

review.comment_positive: The staff was really exceptional. Everyone incredible helpful, always open to give advices. They gave us free breakfast the first day and prepared our room very early (around 10) so we could sleep after our long flight from Europe. They suggested us a free walking tour with a student and that was also very good and worth instead of just walking around alone in Hanoi city center. They helped us to book the bus to Ha Giang and they let us take away our breakfast as we departed very early. They were very responsive, kind and helpful. We couldnt wish for a better experience! Thank you! Dora & Riccardo

We had one of the best stays in our travel here. The staff was superb!!! We had massages, tours, box lunch here. Breakfast is delicious and with so many options that we didn’t need to have lunch after having breakfast there! We highly recommend this hotel!!! Congratulations for this hidden gem!

The Emerald Waters is a quaint hotel conveniently located at the edge of the old town, at walking distance from several attractions. The staff was extremely helpful and friendly to us, especially Grace and Tracy. The hotel arranged tours with the best providers, and offered great advice on attractions in town, such as restaurants, cafés, and the water puppets show, for which they made reservations for us. We felt at home at the Emerald Waters, and we highly recommend it.
review.comment_negative: The room was not spacious, but it was comfortable. Unfortunately it did not have a view.

review.comment_positive: Staff were excellent. Very quiet.
Exceptionally friendly staff, nice room and big comfy bed. Very close to attractions in Hanoi
review.comment_negative: Bathroom tiles were a bit lethal when wet

review.rating: The best hotel staff I've experienced in all my years traveling
review.comment_positive: I've never had such a welcoming and thoughtful experience at a hotel! Everyone was so lovely from the minute we arrived. One of my friends and I got sick halfway during our stay and the hotel staff went above and beyond to be accommodating. I'd recommend anyone to stay at this hotel because you won't receive such customer service elsewhere.

- Lage: sehr zentral
- Personal: hilfsbereit und sehr freundlich
- Sauberkeit

review.rating: Exceptional service and best stay in Hanoi
review.comment_positive: The hotel was very well situated in old quarter Hanoi, inside an alley way which helped with a quiet atmosphere amidst the hustle and bustle of Hanoi. The room were clean daily, the location was quiet quiet and beds were super comfortable. The breakfast provided was delicious with great variety, and the staff really went above and beyond to make sure you are well taken care of. The receptionists gave us a run down of everything we need to know about Hanoi when we arrived, and the staff always helped with our bags and doors. They also made sure to act us our point of contact when we had your pick ups so we were not left on our own to navigate. The managers helped us book cars to the airport, managed our laundry, and even kept our bags overnight when we left for Ha Long Bay for 1 night after checking out, which was a favor they definitely were not obliged to. Special thanks to Grace and Jerry who took great care of us. We highly highly recommend this hotel to anyone to stays in Hanoi! Great value and exceptional service!!
review.comment_negative: Absolutely nothing

review.comment_positive: Jerry and all his staff were exceptional.  Kim at the front desk went above and beyond, giving us helpful information on getting around, restaurants, tours etc., even got us a couple of Vietnamese newspapers and books, etc. Room was a nice size, quiet. Breakfast selection was good. Nice location in the Old Quarter.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really. (something perhaps for future renovation consideration - shower stall floor was a tad shallow, so water could easily spill onto other parts of the bathroom. We asked for extra bath mats, so those helped.)

review.comment_positive: ấn tượng với mùi hương hoa thơm ngay khi bước vào, Ks mới sạch đẹp, nv thân thiện ngay cc

location was really good, very close to the Hoan Kiem lake, rooms were neat and very clean. staff were very helpful and accommodating. special thanks to Mr Jerry who has been nothing but wonderful and helpful throughout our stay
review.comment_negative: rooms were without view since its actually located behind another building but thats ok actually, it ls quite from the hustle and bustle of the city

review.rating: I didn’t want to leave and I definitely want to come back for longer!
review.comment_positive:
Beautifully designed and lovely interiors
The rooms are nice and spacious. Don’t expect a view but it doesn’t really matter because you’re in the city centre so there’s nothing much but buildings around the hotel. The location is really great and you can explore a lot of the old quarter and popular tourist sights by foot. The service and hospitality is second to none. The immense warmth, helpfulness and thoughtfulness by each and every member of the staff is nothing like I have seen before. After checkout we have to spend quite a few hours before our flight to da nang. Jerry and the rest of the staff made sure we had everything we need to feel comfortable, rest, and freshen up before being picked up. They also arranged for a car at a nominal cost.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really jumps out

review.comment_positive: Nice and clean hotel
review.comment_negative: No much choice of breakfast

review.rating: Incredibly friendly staff, excellent breakfast and very well located!
review.comment_positive: The staff were super friendly and helpful. Before our trip they helped organise transport from the airport to the hotel and they also helped organise transport to our next destination, all for reasonable prices. It was very convenient to chat with them over WhatsApp and they were always prompt with their responses.
Perfect location. Clean. Very good service. Quiet room. Staff incredibly helpful and professional. Confortable bed. Value hard to find in the area. Worth the price.

review.rating: Very kind staff and lovely service
review.comment_positive: Pretty close to everything, all walking distance
review.comment_negative: Rooms can be noisy because of the close proximity to other buildings and the street

review.comment_positive: hospitality and location

review.comment_negative: Nothing! Exceptional stay.

review.rating: Great hospitality at a great location!
review.comment_positive: Clean property
review.comment_negative: entrance might be missed for the first time

review.comment_positive: Schoon, fijne bedden, stil terwijl midden in de stad. Goede uitvalsbasis. Vriendelijk personeel

review.rating: Great hotel, lovely staff and excellent location.
review.comment_positive: The hotel was very nice, we really enjoyed our stay. the staff were all so welcoming and very helpful. The hotel is in a great location too.

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and will definitely be the hotel of choice should we return to Hanoi - staff were amazing, location is extremely central and the breakfast buffet was fantastic. The hotel and staff exceeded our expectations on all fronts.
Khách sạn phù hợp với giá, nhân viên lễ tân tạm ổn.
The staff in the lobby were all exceptional. Super lovely and nice every time coming in and out. Even helped us book transport, food recommendations, and book a day tour.
review.comment_negative: No windows in the room.

review.comment_positive: I loved my stay at Emerald waters, the hotel is beautifully designed and set back in a small alley away from the noise of the road. The bed was extremely comfortable and the shower was great! The staff are extremely kind and helpful and we have booked to come and stay again next week we loved it so much.
Great location, quiet even though in center of old town. Nice breakfast too. The caretaker Jerry? Was very kind and open and ensured a good stay there.
review.comment_negative: Only potential minus was maybe to cross the road to the other hotel for breakfast but the breakfast itself was great :)

review.comment_positive: Tout était très bien.
review.comment_negative: Le bruit du moteur au 8 ème étage

review.comment_positive:
Staff was extremely accommodating and friendly.
The price of the room as well as other services (airport drop off and laundry) are cheaper than other hotels or grab.
Free walking tour available 
They will also go through a map with you, which contains recommendations of where to go and eat. This was really helpful for me as a solo traveller who has not planned anything to do in Hanoi.
Location is very central, which made going around quite easy.
This will be my go to hotel if I visit Hanoi again in the future.

Staffs are very friendly and helpful.
Location is great

review.rating: Highly recommend for the wonderful staffs
review.comment_positive:
May not be a 5star hotel, but the service attitude of the entire hotel staffs were no less than 5star. Special thanks to Grace for helping us organise a day trip to Ninh Binh, and a 2D1N cruise at Ha Long Bay. Grace was very responsive, and we are so glad to have trusted her recommendations for our trip itineraries. 
Manager Jerry was very approachable, so was Kim and  the restaurant staffs. Highly recommend this hotel for their wonderful staffs.
review.comment_negative: Executive suite has windows but no view. The saving grace is you can get a peaceful night rest, away from the constant honking noise of traffic.

review.comment_positive: Da disponibilidade e simpatia dos funcionários para que não nos faltasse nada. O quarto era confortável e tinha tudo o que era preciso. Pequeno Almoço variado e bom. Possibilidade de tomar duche tardio antes de ir para o aeroporto. O hotel é silencioso apesar da sua localização no centro e onde há muito ruído. Fica recuado da estrada. Tem que se percorrer um corredor para aceder ao hotel. Como se fosse nas traseiras da fachada principal do prédio. Ouviu-se algum ruído de outros hóspedes mas nada que perturbe uma boa noite de sono
review.comment_negative: A limpeza era boa comparada com outros hotéis do país mas poderia melhorar. Na europa o nível de exigência da limpeza é maior. Por exemplo o chão não é limpo com água e sabão todos os dias.

review.comment_positive:
Excellent customer service. Grace, Kim and Gerry were so welcoming and couldn't do enough for you to make your stay a pleasant one. Grace was exceptional!
Great location. Comfortable beds. Lovely breakfast. No iron in room but they will provide one if required. 
Would definitely stay here again.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.rating: Amazing property. Great staff friendly attentive and helpful
review.comment_positive:
The staff where extremely friendly and helpful 
Accommodation was amazing 
Close to everything we wanted 
A huge thank you to Kim   Couldn’t be more helpful. Absolutely beautiful person. Thanks again for our holiday xx
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Love the staff, location and comfortable stay.
review.comment_positive: Jerry and his staff were excellent and very helpful during our stay. He arranged our tours and got us really good deals and services. Location is excellent as all the food nearby is delicious. I will recommend this hotel and getting tours and recommendations from Jerry.
Hotel staff , front desk and whole team are so generous and very helpful. They follow up and guide each one with lot of patience. Very happy with their hospitality.

review.rating: would recommend due to the kindness of the staff
review.comment_positive: extremely friendly and kind staff, they were super helpful and responsive with any query. their English was amazing. great location of hotel
review.comment_negative: it was a shame to us to not have a pool or gym. the water pressure in the shower was super low

review.rating: This hotel is a little hidden gem!
review.comment_positive: This hotel is a little hidden gem! Perfect location for exploring Hanoi. The rooms are comfortable & very quiet even though you’re in the centre of the old quarter. The staff are so friendly & helpful & couldn’t have done more for us, we loved our stay here.

review.rating: とても快適にすごせました
review.comment_positive:
スタッフ皆さん大変親切でした
車やバイクの音などもほとんど聞こえませんでした

review.rating: Excellent stay at heart of Hanoi with five star service
review.comment_positive: Excellent stay at heart of Hanoi with five star service - Jerry and his team took great care of me and my family. They also provided great recommendation for transfer and tour. Overall we felt at home!
review.comment_negative: Nothing, all excellent

review.comment_positive: The location is absolutely perfect - a five minute walk to the centre of the Old Quarter and very easily accessible by taxi. The staff couldn’t have been more helpful, especially Jerry, Grace, Ellie and Tom. We booked day trips through the hotel too and the staff made everything so easy for us. The rooms were perfect, plenty of space for five nights. Couldn’t recommend higher!
review.comment_negative: Having to leave!

review.comment_positive: Ottima posizione, staff straordinario, colazione completa.
Phù hợp với gia đình không yêu cầu cao về tiện nghi.
Trải nghiệm ở mức bình thường, đúng giá.

review.rating: What made our stay at this wonderful Old Quarters Hanoi Hotel memorable are the services of Jerry and Jack. Jerry the ma
review.comment_positive: What made our stay at this wonderful Old Quarters Hanoi Hotel memorable are the services of Jerry and Jack. Jerry the manager not only made sure our intention to make Hanoi the center of our visits to Sapa/Fansipan, Halong Bay and Ninh Binh went smoothly and arranged just the way we wanted, but he also followed our journey every step on-line to make sure we get to everywhere on time and safely. And, his staff Jack was equally amazing. His initiative to correct a problem that arose unexpectedly was totally beyond the normal standard service. The warmth and detailed services of Jerry and Jack and the rest of the staff showed us that they are the true ambassadors of Vietnam. Come to Vietnam and find out for yourself how wonderful is this country.
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.rating: Awesome stay in Hanoi old quarter
review.comment_positive: Excellent hospitality by every staff and a special mention is Ms. Grace. She is absolutely sweet and she guided on attractions nearby and even helped to get a cab booked. They supported with early check in and late check out as well. It was our first trip to Hanoi and they made it memorable. Thanks to everyone..
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Nosso melhor hotel na viagem à Asia! Excelente! Recomendamos fortemente.
review.comment_positive: Nós amamos o hotel, em todos os aspectos. Chegamos e já na recepção sentimos muita gentileza no atendimento. Nos orientaram sobre acomodação, os deram um up-grade de quarto na nossa segunda estada (quando voltamos do cruzeiro em ha long) e nos deram dicas bem práticas sobre o que fazer na cidade! O hotel é lindo, os quartos um charme, limpeza excelente. Foi a melhor cama de todas na nossa viagem pela Asia (Tailandia, Vietnam e Camboja). O café da manha também um dos melhores! Amamos o noodles do cafe da manha! A localização é perfeita, perto das atraçoes principais em Hanoi. Fizemos tudo a pé: lago, teatro de marionetes, rua da cerveja, passeio ao redor do lago, café com ovo! O famoso Café Giảng fica a poucos minutos a pé, nós recomendamos muito, vale a pena!
review.comment_negative: tudo perfeito! Ficamos preocupados em achar a entrada do hotel, mas é super tranquilo!

review.rating: I cannot recommend this hotel enough! The staff were so friendly and attentive, they went above and beyond, helping us p
review.comment_positive: The hotel is well situated in Hanoi making it easy to get around the city. The hotel is well kept and the rooms were very clean but it was the staff that made our time at the hotel so positive. Jerry and co went above and beyond to make us feel welcomed, they provided advice and assisted us with booking other parts of our journey. Nothing was ever too big an ask

review.rating: Super hôtel au cœur de la vieille ville
review.comment_positive: le personnel de l’hôtel ! ils étaient aux petits soins de À à Z avec nous. Nous avons été hyper bien conseillés pour la découverte de la ville et du Vietnam. Nous avons aussi des attentions particulières pour notre arrivée et notre lune de miel. l’hôtel est très bien situé (à moins de 5 minutes à pied du lac et de la vieille ville). la chambre était propre spacieuse bref super !
review.comment_negative: RIEN

review.comment_positive: The staff, Grace and the rest of the team, were fantastic going out of their way to help, provide recommendations, organise taxis etc.
Personal war sehr hilfreich und kostenlose Hanoi Tour mit Studenten wurde angeboten. Nach checkout wurden uns noch Duschen angeboten, da wir erst Abend abgereist sind.

The location in Old Quarter was perfect and easily walkable to a lot of the attractions. 
Grace and her team were absolutely amazing and attentive to what you needed. They made our stay very pleasant and enjoyable. 
Breakfast was topnotch and I looked forward to it every morning. 
Fantastic hotel overall and would highly recommend for your perfect stay in Hanoi.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Mi sono sentita come a casa, indimenticabile
review.comment_positive: La posizione è ideale, in pieno centro, ma la camera era tranquilla. Ottima e varia colazione a buffet, personale gentilissimo e sempre a disposizione. A loro un abbraccio. La stanza 801 elegante spaziosa e funzionale
review.comment_negative: Nella camera 804 mancava un comodino

review.rating: 服務人員Grace&Kim服務非常好。地點很好，在到訪之前就協助很多問題，還幫忙安排下龍灣的行程，給予很多優惠。到機場之後也幫忙聯繫接送的司機，第一時間給予很大的協助。在飯店期間每個服務人員都很熱心幫忙，推薦當地食物，英文能力也很好
review.comment_positive: 飯店人員親切的服務
review.comment_negative: 洗澡排水系統稍弱

review.comment_positive: The staff were extremely helpful and always served with a smile.

review.rating: Amazing hotel near Hoan Kiem Lake.
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel tucked back from a main road. Would stay here again. Room was clean, water hot, the most lovely and helpful staff.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.rating: Awesome start of our trip through Vietnam
review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful stay at Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley. All the staff were so attentive, loving and wonderful carrying. We extended our stay and will definitely come back once we are in Hanoi again. Thank you so much!

review.rating: Das personal war super freundlich. Und wurde direkt ein take away Frühstück angeboten, da unser Checkout sehr früh war u
review.comment_positive: Super freundliches Personal

While the hotel might not look like much from the street, it's a veritable oasis in the old quarter. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at the hotel with its lovely rooms. The staff were absolutely brilliant and went out of their way to make me feel at home. I would highly recommend staying here, and I'm definitely looking at returning here on my next visit to Hanoi.

We was there less than 24 hours. Last night in Hanoi before Flying back to Italy. These guys stole our hearts! So kind, helpful and genuine. Justin, grace, Louis, Danny, the night shift guys. They delivered excellent customer service and went extra-mile. Hotel in old Town, very close to the lake. Rooms clean and pretty. Excellent breakfast. Perfect spot to Discover Hanoi.
review.comment_negative: Just to be picky, no Window in the toilet

review.rating: Amazing staff, great location, small room.
review.comment_positive:
Very friendly and helpfull staff, they gave me a lot of tips what to do in Hanoi and what to look out for.
Good breakfast and good location in the middle of old quarter. Everything is really walkable, on the weekend Hoan Kiem Area is closed for traffic and you can easily walk there in 3 minutes.
review.comment_negative:
Room is relatively small, and although there was a small window, I was looking straight at a wall of the next building. But probably a commom thing in this area.
Breakfast is in the sister hotel across the street, which is not a problem at all.

review.rating: This hotel is pleasant and relaxed and made a very convenient base for seeing the city.
review.comment_positive: The room and beds were comfortable and quiet. Staff spoke very good English and were very understanding when we had to make last minute changes in arrangements.
review.comment_negative: Some areas of the hotel seemed unprepared for visitors, but the hotel had plainly been hit hard by the recent Covid epidemic.

review.comment_positive: Utmärkt läge! Jättetrevlig och hjälpsam personal! Jag hade rekommenderat detta hotell till alla som vill besöka Hanoi.
sạch sẽ

review.comment_positive: Staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful.
good at hospitality we get

review.rating: friendly stuff willing to help you enjoy every step of your trip
review.comment_positive: everything
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.comment_positive: Everything was good. Staff were excellent, it was clean and well located.

We loved our stay! The stuff is incredible friendly and helpful. They were so engaged and gave us good advice. We‘ve been on a trip for two days and when we came back we had no room anymore but still had to wait the whole day for our nightbus. The stuff told us that we can come back to the hotel and wait in the lobby as long as we want. 

Breakfast was also amazing and so was the room cleaning.

Definitely worth the money and we definitely recommend. 

Perfect located.
