review.comment_positive: Excellent staff, great amenities
review.comment_negative: Nil criticism

review.rating: Really enjoyed our stay in this hotel and again the staff made it.
review.comment_positive: The staff were amazing in this hotel.The breakfast was very good and the location was perfect.
I love the service especially from Grace and Justin. They always help with a big smile every time

review.rating: Amabilidad y profesionalidad, junto a una excelente ubicación hacen un éxito de la estancia
review.comment_positive: Ubicacions excelente, centrico però tranquilo, personal muy amable

review.rating: Coup de cœur pour cet hôtel et son personnel si attentionné !
review.comment_positive:
Cet hôtel est incroyable, un vrai coup de cœur. Déjà il est très bien placé et à l’abris du bruit des rues de Hanoï, mais c’est surtout un coup de cœur pour le personnel. D’une gentillesse rare, ils nous ont aidé et accompagné pendant tout notre voyage, même après notre départ de l’hôtel. Ce furent de très belles rencontres. Nous avons dormi 3 x 1 nuit dans cet hôtel et c’était toujours un plaisir d’y revenir et de les retrouver. Nous étions presque à la maison! 
Merci pour ce séjour, ne changez rien !

review.rating: Nice and clean hotel in good location
review.comment_positive: Very good location, spacious clean room and very friendly staff - we even got upgraded to a better room for free
Phòng đủ dùng cho chuyến đi ngắn. Không có gì đặc sắc.
Sehr freundliches und engagiertes Personal, zentrale Lage

We hebben een fijn verblijf gehad. We zijn warm verwelkomt door Kim en kregen een upgrade van de kamer. We vlogen op de dag van vertrek pas 's avonds maar mochten in het hotel nog douchen, heel erg fijn! Via het hotel hebben er een taxi naar de luchthaven geregeld voor een goede prijs. Wij zouden dit hotel aanraden.

review.rating: Amazing hotel, great location, great food, lovely staff!
review.comment_positive:
The staff were so welcoming and friendly! Jerry the manager was so unbelievably helpful. Even when we weren’t staying here he offered for us to come and shower or use the facilities if needed. 
Amazing breakfast, super massage, amazing rooms!
We also had a free upgrade to a family room on arrival which made our stay very comfortable.
dedicated staff and delicious breakfast!
review.comment_negative: Nothing at all.

review.comment_positive: The hospitality and kindness of the stuff
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
The staff was always very friendly and helpful. The room was exactly as described and very clean. The breakfast, which is served directly across the street at the sister hotel, is very good and there are many vegetarian options. The location is perfect and yet it was very quiet in our room.
We would definitely recommend this hotel!

This place is right at the center of old quarter and everything we needed were at a 
walking distance. The room was clean and comfortable. The staff were great and very helpful. Special shout out to Grace, Ellie and Kim for their hospitality!!
review.comment_negative: NA

review.comment_positive: Không có

Personnel accueillant,  serviable et très attentionné. 
Chambre confortable et calme.
Très bon petit déjeuner. 
Hôtel très bien situé dans le centre d'Hanoï
review.comment_negative: Rien

review.rating: Overall, it was a pleasant stay.  Clean facility & commendable service from staff.
review.comment_positive: The staff are attentive and courteous. Jerry was very gracious with all our queries. Assisted us well  with all of our needs especially with the tour packages.  Free airport transfer when you book a tour package.  The spa service is very good.  Location is near restaurants and cafes and also walking distance from the night market. Buffet breakfast included.
review.comment_negative: Very narrow entrance. Breakfast buffet and spa is located in another hotel across the street. Although, hotel staff will always accompany you. In-room TV only has local shows. Thus, no use for foreigners like us.

review.rating: It was perfect and the best introduction to Vietnam.
review.comment_positive: After traveling through Vietnam for three weeks, I can confidently say this was the best place we stayed at. The breakfast was excellent, the staff were polite and helpful, the massages at the spa were reasonably priced and honestly a bit addictive, the décor was modern and tasteful, the bed was extremely comfy, the AC was refreshing, and there was no noise at night. I wish every hotel were as nice as this one!
review.comment_negative: Nothing. I would definitely stay here again if I’m ever back in Hanoi.

review.comment_positive: The hotel is fantastic, very well located. The staff was simply outstanding. Grace, Ellie and Kim really went above and beyond to make our honeymoon perfect. They helped us with transportation, tours and lots of amazing food and restaurants recommendations.

The staff at the hotel were amazing, quite attentive to our needs and very warm. Would like to especially highlight Kim's polite, helpful and warm hospitality. The location of the hotel is excellent, walking distance to many great places to eat, historical sites and museums. A lovely stay all in all.
Really nice staff, they are really friendly and lovely. Nice location, really near Ho Guom Lake, easy for you to explore the city.

The staff are amazing. I could not sleep in the night, one of the receptionist brought me a flower tea which helped alot. Everyone in this hotel is so helpful and friendly. 
And the Spa, you have 35% discount and that's great I used spa 3 times

amazing customer service helped us out from minute one they booked our cruise around halong bay a transfer from the airport and a transfer back very comfortable and large rooms very convenient for Hanoi I wouldn’t stay anywhere else

Das Personal ist unglaublich freundlich. Sofort bei der Ankunft haben wir viele Informationen über die Stadt bekommen, später  bekamen wir Hilfe beim Buchen weitere Reise. Das Hotel ist mitten in der Altstadt,  trotzdem super ruhig.  Betten mega bequem,  Frühstück sehr lecker.  Wir würden gerne wieder kommen.
review.comment_negative: Es gibt absolut nichts zu bemängeln.  Das Hotel ist spitze.

review.rating: A gem at a low price with the best staff you could ask for
review.comment_positive:
Staff were amazing 
Nothing was too much trouble 
Manager Jerry was superb
Location ideal for everything 
Rooms 5 star 
Breakfast to die for 
Don’t have any negatives !!

review.comment_positive:
Die Lage und Größe des Zimmers waren super. 
Das Personal war auch sehr nett (für unseren Geschmack schon fast zu nett, es wurde sich jeden Tag morgens erkundigt, was wir vor haben und abends, wie es war. Das sind wir sonst nicht gewohnt :D)
review.comment_negative: Es gab leider kein richtiges Fenster.

review.comment_positive: Great location and great staff and and great rooms!

Personnel très aimable et serviable.

review.comment_positive: Location and good spa in sister property across the road. Breakfast also in sister property across the road - good selection of items.
review.comment_negative: rooms were small however excellent value for money

review.comment_positive:
The location was great but the staff were what made the stay stand out!! 
The staff were always friendly, willing to help us and so lovely and attentive. Breakfast was delicious
review.comment_negative: Our room was great but didn’t have any windows/ natural light

review.comment_positive: Everything about the hotel was perfect, location,staff, breakfast... The staff was extremely kind, we booked for 3 nights but we decided to go to a halong bay tour and spend a night at the boat, they accepted to change our reservation so we didn't need to pay for an extra night. They didn't have to do this, but they did anyway, and they let us leave our luggage at the hotel while we were at the boat. I would definitely stay at this hotel at our next arrival
De vriendelijkheid van het personeel is echt uitmuntend! Altijd in voor een praatje en een goed advies.

review.rating: Tuyệt vời mình sẽ quay lại, nếu có dịp. Và mình sẽ giới thiệu cho người khác.
review.comment_positive: Mình thích thái độ nhân viên ở đây. Mọi người đều rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình. Ngoài ra đồ ăn sáng ở đây ko đa dạng, nhưng món nào cũng rất ổn. Vị trí cũng khá gần hồ hoàn kiếm, nên buổi tối có thể dạo quanh hồ để tìm đồ ăn và đi chơi. Ngoài ra dịch vụ xe đưa rước ra sân bay giá cả cũng phải chăng, rẻ hơn cả Grab.
review.comment_negative: Có một hôm mình đi sớm vội nên không ăn sáng được. Thế nên mình có nhờ nhân viên soạn đồ ăn sáng giùm mình. Nhưng mà đồ nhân viên lấy khá là không ngon, có 2-3 cái bánh cùng vài hộp mứt cam và bơ. Mứt cam thì không ngon còn bánh ngọt thì ko được bao nhiêu. Bánh mì thì lại khá khô. Mình mong là sẽ có thêm nhiều bánh ngọt. Nhưng mà cách đóng gói đồ ăn thì rất tỉ mỉ.

review.comment_positive: The staff was very friendly,  they give a lot of information and they were very supportive
review.comment_negative: Breakfast was in another building

review.rating: Excellent hotel with attentive staff near Hoan Kiem lake.
review.comment_positive: Everything was great. The location is right near hoan kiem lake. All of the staff are amazing and are happy to help you arrange taxi's or provide advice about the sights. The room is real nice. The breakfast was amazing. Massive selection to choose from and they also cook you eggs or pho fresh. I've actually stayed here on 3 different occasions over the past few weeks and wouldn't hesitate to come back.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive: sạch sẽ, gần trung tâm
Nhân viên rất dễ thương. Phòng mới, tuy ko rộng lắm nhưng ko bị bí. Khăn & ga sạch sẽ, thơm.

Cama comodísima, instalaciones y aire acondicionado genial genial!!. Desayuno muy variado.
Equipo de atención y personal EXCELENTE. 
Pudimos hacer entrega de ropa para la colada, por 6€. 
RECOMENDABLE TOTALMENTE

review.rating: Perfect Stay in Old Quarter Hanoi
review.comment_positive:
Die Lage war perfect, mittten in Old quarter, 5 min zum Hoan Kiem Lake. Überall gibts es leckereien zum Essen. Das Zimmer war sehr groß und das Frühstück sehr umfangreich.
Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hat gerne Ratschläge gegeben.

review.rating: Great place to stay for 1 or 2 nights in Hanoi
review.comment_positive: very friendly staff and super helpful, great location
review.comment_negative: no window or balcony in the room so no natural light

review.comment_positive: The hotel is across their other main one in an alley, but the room and service are the same (I believe). The staff is all extremely nice and they really look out for you and provide helpful tips about traveling. They greet us every time they see us with a smile and we feel truly heartful. The bed is comfortable. The location is great too - very close to some places of sightseeing and we basically walk everywhere we want to go.
review.comment_negative:
There are only two things I don't like but it's not a big deal - 
1. the shower temperature could go high and low sometimes.
2. we saw a big dead cockroach one day on our bathroom floor. I know it's common to see it in hot areas in Asia and glad it's dead already but still gave us a chill down the spine.

review.comment_positive: Posizione ottima. Staff, ragazzi e ragazze, disponibili, deliziosi e accoglienti. In particolare Ellie. Colazione ricca e abbondante. Molto apprezzati transfer con scooter e sleepers nella stanza. Consigliatissimo

Stayed here one night on our way out of Vietnam. Spacious comfortable clean room. The staff is fabulous and very warm. Breakfast spread at the sisters hotel next door was ok. Hotel is in a great location, walking distance to the old quarter.  All in all, Great value for money.
Excellent location in the Old Quarters. Pick up and drop off location for many tours of La Homg Bay and Ning Binh. Friendly staff. Good value if you don’t mind the awkward front entrance.
review.comment_negative: Awkward front entrance

review.comment_positive: The room and location were great, but what makes this place amazing is the staff! So helpful and friendly, we really enjoyed our stay, thank you!

모두친절하고
깨끗한편입니다 
일반4성급 5성급호텔생각하시면안되고

review.comment_negative: 없음

review.rating: great location, very nice design, staff very friendly and helpful, clean rooms, quiet at night.
review.comment_positive: great location, very nice design, staff very friendly and helpful, clean rooms, quiet at night.

Merci a tout le personnel de l équipe qui est au top et aux petits soins.  Spécialement a Kim et Ellie pour leurs informations précieuses et leur réactivité. Et le petit détail le jour de l anniversaire de mon fils. Trop forte !

review.rating: Wonderful place to stay in Hanoi
review.comment_positive: The staff is extremely efficient and supportive right from pickup from airport till check out. Kudos to Jerry & team for making our stay a memorable one.
review.comment_negative: Everything was great.  Nothing to complain here

review.rating: Excellent hotel in the Old Quarter
review.comment_positive: The hotel was  quiet, clean, comfortable and well maintained.   The location was excellent with the central lake only a few minutes walk away.  Very friendly staff who greeted us every time we went through the foyer.
review.comment_negative: Be aware that the hotel is back from the street, so rooms don't have much/any natural light.   This was fine for us because we weren't in the rooms much, and it made a great place to sleep in the bustle of Hanoi.

review.comment_positive:
I must tell that I am so happy and lucky to find the property for the trip in Ha Noi.
If you are looking for a place that feel like at home , please do not hesitate to choose this hotel.
It is boutique hotel but surely you will make you satisfied from the first moment you meet them.
100% want to recommend to everyone who is planning to come to Ha Noi.
Caring , lovely staff will help you at anytime.
Before booking this hotel , I had read some comment which can be negative but please understand that it just is individual opinion.With the price you book here , they deserve 100% highest score.
When we left , all of staff went out to waive us to say goodbye.what a warm gesture

The staff's commitment to please you is incredible! Our room had just an internal window, but the manager was happy to upgrade us as we were not well enough to use the AC, so we needed a window opened during the night.
Comfy bed, walking distance to the busy city centre, laundry service within hours... We were very happy with this last minute find.
review.comment_negative: The breakfast is served over to the hotel's sister as this boutique hotel is too tiny to facilitate it. Staying longer than a night might be an issue for some??

review.comment_positive: Przemili ludzie w hotelu, bardzo pomocni. Hotel ułożony w samym centrum, blisko do wszystkich atrakcji, nie korzystaliśmy z taksówek. Śniadania urozmaicone i pyszne.

review.rating: Heerlijk hotel, mooie kamer en badkamer, lekker bed, heerlijk ontbijt en vriendelijke mensen die je overal mee willen he
review.comment_positive:
Wat mij het meest beviel is het lieve personeel. Zij hebben zoveel voor hun gasten over. Een lach een vriendelijke buiging. Niets is teveel. Ja super!
Je wordt in de ochtend zelfs naar de overkant van de weg gebracht, omdat daar het heerlijke, zeer gevarieerde ontbijt wordt geserveerd.
review.comment_negative: Ik heb geen minpunten. Ik vind dat de prijs/kwaliteit verhouding meer dan goed is.

review.comment_positive:
We could not be happier with our stay at Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel! 
The room was very clean and comfortable. The breakfast was delicious, and the staff was incredible! They helped us book transport to our other hotels in different cities and even checked in on us when we were no longer in Hanoi! A sincere thank you to Ellie and Kim who went above and beyond! We've never experienced such amazing service before.
review.comment_negative: Nothing. We were beyond satisfied with our stay.

review.rating: L'hôtel idéal pour un séjour à Hanoi!
review.comment_positive: Nous avons passé au final 7 nuits au Emerald Waters Hotel Valley car nous y sommes revenus à chacune de nos étapes à Hanoi. Nous tenons tout particulièrement à remercier Jerry, le gérant, et Kim et Grace à l'accueil : leur équipe a fait en sorte que notre séjour soit mémorable. Ils sont super souriants, sympathiques, toujours à l'écoute et prêts à aider. C'est vraiment ce qui fait a différence. Et l'hôtel est très bien : les chambres sont très jolies, les lits très confortables, le petit déjeuner sous forme de buffet et vraiment très bien, très varié, il y en a pour tous les goûts et c'est très bon. L'emplacement est idéal, juste à côté du lac Hoa Kiem et du vieux quartier, tout en étant au calme car ne donnant pas directement sur la rue. Bref, c'était parfait!
review.comment_negative: Juste un point : les chambres sont sombres car les fenêtres donnent sur les murs des immeubles à côté car l'hôtel ne donne pas directement sur la rue. Mais c'est aussi ça qui fait qu'on est au calme!

review.comment_positive: Cosy room, excellent breakfast, very friendly and super helpful staff, Highly recommendable!
Staff gentilissimo e super disponibile!!! Il miglior staff mai incontrato viaggiando. Colazione super ricca, c'era veramente di tutto. Posizione perfetta!
review.comment_negative: Il bagno è composto da wc e doccia senza separazione. Il lavello è nella stanza. Nessun problema e tutto pulito.

review.comment_positive: The hotel team is lovely and helpful - they helped us to arrange traveling after stay in Hanoi and with a very good prices. Food was tasty and with a big selection. Also they have Spa with very good deals.

De ligging van het hotel is perfect.
Het personeel zeer vriendelijk en regelen alles tot in de puntjes voor je. 
Heerlijke bedden. En als je uitcheckt en je taxi of vliegtuig vertrekt pas eind middag,  dan heb je nog steeds gelegenheid om te douchen.
Ontbijt zeer goed.
Voor een volgende keer Hanoi zouden we weer naar dit hotel gaan.
review.comment_negative: Eigenlijk niets. Het enige was dat de vloer en douche wat beter schoongemaakt had kunnen worden.

review.rating: Best first stay in vietnam and very nice and accommodating staff
review.comment_positive: There’s soo many great things about the hotel. The staff itself were soo accomodating and welcoming. They’re really passionate about their guest and how they can have a great stay in Hanoi. For me and my family, we stayed here for our first day in vietnam and the hotel offered soo much from transportation, pickups from airport, to tours around the area. The breakfast was very exceptional (especially the poached egg served in the broth 🤤) the facilities are kept clean and rooms were also comfortable and quiet despite it being in the old quarter centre.

review.rating: We had an amazing stay at Hanoi Emerald Waters Valley hotel - Jerry and his team were so friendly.
review.comment_positive: We had an amazing stay at Hanoi Emerald Waters Valley hotel - Jerry and his team were so friendly and helpful and gave us loads of recommendations of what to do in the city and were really flexible for when we had to check in early, check out late etc. They upgraded our room for the second night we stayed and organised transfers for us. We will definitely stay there again when we come back to Hanoi, and we appreciated all they did for us.
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.comment_positive: Very clean and friendly staff. It was very close to beer street which Is a great spot for nightlife. The free breakfast was also excellent which is just across the street.

review.rating: Szuper elhelyezkedés, szuper kedves és előzékeny személyzet.
review.comment_positive: A személyzet kevessége, vendégszeretete. Hotel elhelyezkedése, felszereltsége, minősége. Reggeli minősége, mennyisége, étterem személyzet kedvessége, előzékenysége. Hotel manager Grace profizmusa, kedvessége, előzékenysége, segítőkészsége.
Heel vriendelijk personeel die je met alles hielpen. Jerry maakte het verschil!

reviewer.name: Kevin
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.comment_positive:
Full disclosure: this is a hotel in Hanoi, Vietnam - so if you expected a grand lobby with a valet, you're in for quite a shock. The entrance to the hotel seemed "interesting" and I had my doubts instantly. HOWEVER, what the hotel lacked in appearance, it quickly made up for with the service from the staff. They were extremely helpful and informative with any query. 

Moreover, it's important to know that English is still a foreign language here and can be quite tricky to convey your point across to the opposite person. Considering this, I really admire the resilience of the staff who made efforts to speak in English - special shout out to Jerry for being awesome.

Besides this, the room was good, clean and had everything we needed for 2 nights - which is a comfy mattress, hot water to shower and functioning AC.

The breakfast spread is great - I highly recommend it. 

P.S. The lack of a window in the room, could definitely be felt :(
review.comment_negative:
Narrow and uncommon seeming entrance.
Lack of a window in our room. 


Yeah, that's all I didn't like but hey, GREAT value for money.

review.comment_positive: The front desk is excellent, we stay 2 nights and every day we were welcomed with the warmest smile and attitude. The breakfast is also great.
review.comment_negative: As expected, the room in the Old Quarter is not spacious and there's no view from our room.

review.comment_positive:
Location 
And I really don’t think I have ever met such accommodating friendly staff anywhere
review.comment_negative: Nothing

reviewer.name: Svet_lana
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.comment_positive: Staff at the hotel are exceptional - very helpful and polite, we were happy to leave them generous tips for their assistance. Location is convenient, WIFi worked well. Breakfast was served in the hotel across the road, which wasn't a problem for us. Breakfast buffet offered pho, eggs prepared to order and a selection of other usual (and unusual for Westerners items). I also used SPA at the sister-hotel across the road and can't recommend their massage enough - it was very good! In-house guests get 35% discount which makes their prices compatible.
review.comment_negative: Our room was particularly small and didn't have a window, but we booked the last room and we saw that other rooms were better. When looking at the photos, I didn't realise that the shower did not have a bathtub/shower basin/tray, so the toilet floor would get wet when you take shower. I am not a fan of such arrangements and normally avoid such rooms.

review.comment_positive:
I would like to thank you for all the kindness and warm helpful staff :) 
The hotel is super central, convenient location.
Breakfast was great variety. 
the Room was clean and very comfy!

review.rating: Very friendly and helpful staff at the hotel. Thank you Jerry, David, Tracy, Jack, Tom!
review.comment_positive:
The beds were very comfortable and clean. AC was great and hotel staff were lovely and welcoming. They were very helpful in assisting us with our itinerary and in ensuring our needs were met. 

The hotel was located behind the main road which meant that we were shielded from the noisy traffic at night. 

There was also a good breakfast selection.

The exceptional staff is the highlight of the hotel! 
I was staying in a separate building in front of the hotel (across the street), which I guess is where the cheaper rooms or the promo bookings are allocated. It is a little annoying (crossing the street to go for breakfast in rainy Hanoi) but given the good discount it was absolutely fine. Rooms are small but clean. Located right in the heart of Old Town. Super helpful staff.

review.rating: Great location. Beautiful room and comfortable bed. Super friendly staff.
review.comment_positive: Central located in the Old Town. Very comfortable bed and a beautiful decorated room. Great breakfast with a wide selection of food. Staff are very helpful and super friendly.
review.comment_negative: The room had a small window looking out at a wall. No views.

review.comment_positive: Dobrý personál hodně přátelský a milý. Čistý nový pokoj a dobře vybavený. Vhodný i pro malé děti. Nabízí dětskou postýlku a jídelní židličku. Lokalita velmi dobrá.
review.comment_negative: Jídelna je jinde není hned v hotelu

review.comment_positive: Staff were amazing, nothing was too much trouble. Hotel is great , in centre of old town 2mins from the lake. Breakfast is served in sister hotel directly across the road. Spa there was fab too

Good location
All staff realy Very kind .
Sevice is good
Clean room.
review.comment_negative: No more

review.comment_positive: very friendly staff

Our second stay at this hotel! The team looked after our luggage while we went off on a 4 day trip before returning to the hotel which was really helpful. Tracy on reception looked after us so well, organising our onward transfer and giving us loads of local information. We were also upgraded to the family room which was a real treat. We left very early and were given a breakfast box to eat on the way 😋 We felt very well looked after. We will definitely stay again!
Отличная гостиница расположенная в самом центре города. Номер чистые ухоженные. Персонал хорошо говорит по английски.

המיקום נהדר. הצוות בקבלה יעיל ושמח תמיד לעזור. 
תמורה נהדרת למחיר.
review.comment_negative: הטלויזיה לא עבדה כנדרש. אין מספיק שקעים בחדר. אין ארון לבגדים.

review.comment_positive:
De locatie midden in old quarter op loopafstand van Hoan Kiem meer en restaurantjes. Fijne ruime kamer met alle voorzieningen, zeer schoon. De mensen bij de receptie meer dan vriendelijk, behulpzaam en vol handige tips. 

Ontbijt aan de overzijde in ander hotel zelfde keten was heel uitgebreid. Je kan hier ook dineren. 

Pickup transfer van airport was zeer aangenaam, vriendelijke chauffeur.
review.comment_negative: Niet van toepassing

review.comment_positive:
This hotel truly exceeded all of my expectations, and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a fantastic place to stay.

From the moment we arrived, we were greeted by the most friendly and welcoming receptionist, Dave. He made us feel right at home and ensured that our check-in process was as smooth and seamless as possible, despite our late arrival. To our surprise, they had even prepared a beautiful fruit plate for us, which was a lovely touch after our 7-hour bus ride from Ha Giang.
The level of service at The Emerald Waters Hotel is truly exceptional. Jerry, the manager, is the most pleasant person we spoke to during our stay. He greeted us the next morning with a warm smile and offered to help us with our luggage. He went above and beyond to ensure that our stay was comfortable and enjoyable.
La atención por parte de todo el personal es muy buena
review.comment_negative: Tener que cruzar la calle para ir a otro edificio del hotel que tienen y poder tener el desayuno.

review.rating: Soggiorno di qualche giorno ad Hanoi.
review.comment_positive:
Hotel in posizione ottimale per raggiungere il Quartiere Vecchio di Hanoi. 
La struttura è pulitissima e lo staff molto gentile e disponibile per aiutarci ad organizzare i nostri trasferimenti.
review.comment_negative: Le camere sono un po’ piccole ma molto accoglienti comunque.

review.comment_positive: The team is absolutely fabulous. We arrived early in the morning, and they helped us with an early check in and complementary breakfast. They helped booked reliable day trips to Ninh Binh and Ha Long Bay, and the rooms were quiet, well equipped, and very clean. No better place to stay at if you’re landing straight in Hanoi! Everything is just 5-10 mins away.
La location è perfetta per visitare la old Hanoi ed il lago. Inoltre la zona è piena di locali ed ottimi ristoranti. La reception è a 5 stelle.
Everything was perfect, especially the people who works there. Thanks for everything Justin and Grace.!!!
The staff was really friendly and the room very comfortable. The hotel is located close to the old city center and a few nice rooftop bars/restaurants.
review.comment_negative: During the spa it would be great if there was music and a bit less talking but nevertheless the massages were very nice!

review.comment_positive: Fabulous location, at the heart of the Old Quarter. The room was. decent size , with good facilities with one important exception: NO WINDOW, which (I checked) was not made  clear when I booked and it never occurred to me that a ‚deluxe’ room in a 4-star hotel could be windowless… The staff was super kind, friendly and helpful
review.comment_negative: As above

review.comment_positive: Nice design. New. Comfortable beds. Yummy breakfast
review.comment_negative: Needed to walk through a corridor to find it

review.comment_positive: location, value for money but most of all the super friendly staff! Especially Jerry is an exceptional host, helping us with travel arrangements, bookings etc. they were very flexible and also very kind and sweet for our 3 year old son, which made us feel at home. thank you Jerry and staff !

review.rating: Staying at Emerald Waters Hotel Valley made me feel very comfortable and welcome in Viet Nam.
review.comment_positive: The staff were fantastic. Hanoi's travel industry is quite competitive in terms of service, and this hotel is definitely a strong contender. I was treated with the utmost respect and attention, and it has given me a very favorable impression of Vietnam as a travel destination overall. Especially for a single traveler, attentive service is probably the most valuable item a hotel can offer. It's no wonder this hotel is a traveler favorite. Oh, and the coffee was fantastic!

Sehr nettes und zuvorkommendes Personal
Zimmer hatte eine gute Größe und die Lage war perfekt
Great location, superb service, clean room. Really valuable for money. Loved the hospitality of the service crew, they were so welcoming and made me feel like home.

review.rating: Best hotel in Hanoi old town, great staff and rooms!
review.comment_positive:
What makes this hotel special is the amazing staff, the location, the rooms and the breakfast.
We stayed at this hotel on 3 separate occasions and from the 2nd time we arrived they told us: "welcome home", and I must admit it started to feel like coming home!

Rooms are quiet because you are off the street, still you are at the central lake within minutes.
All the best restaurants also seem to be in this part of the old town.

Breakfast is great, they serve some western options but also lovely local food. You just cross the street to have breakfast, no problem the staff will show the way.

Also, they will keep your valuables safe when you book a multi day trip.
review.comment_negative: Nothing, pick this hotel!

review.rating: i definitely will recommend my friends and family to stay there when travel to Hanoi!
review.comment_positive: the staffs are extremely nice. keep it up 👍
review.comment_negative: their supreme location and many varieties of breakfast especially I like their pho.

review.comment_positive:
Gentilissimi, disponibili e posizione molto comoda 
Ringrazio ancora tracy, siamo arrivati con il volo molto presto e ha cercato di prepararci subito una stanza per farci riposare e ha offerto anche la colazione 
Grazie ancora
review.comment_negative: Nulla

review.rating: Amazing! We would 100% recommend you stay here, it will not disappoint!
review.comment_positive: We would 100% recommend you stay here! The staff were amazing, they're so friendly and kind, super eager to help with anything! The location couldn't have been better, easy walking distance from everything. The room was super comfortable and the perfect size and the shower had good water pressure!
Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful with suggestions on best dining spots in Hanoi.
review.comment_negative: There is no shower door in the bathroom.

review.comment_positive: Our brief stay at this boutique hotel was great. We were fortunate to receive a complimentary room upgrade, and our accommodations were simply exquisite. The one-night experience was a perfect blend of luxury and charm. Every aspect, from the stylish decor to the impeccable service, contributed to a delightful and memorable visit. This boutique gem exceeded our expectations, leaving us with a desire to return for another exceptional stay.
review.comment_negative: airport transfer car on our departure smelled of cigarettes and was old

review.comment_positive:
Besonders hervorheben möchte ich das Personal. So etwas habe ich noch in keinem anderen Hotel auf der Welt erlebt. Es ist als wäre man bei Freunden zu Gast. 
Die Lage ist einfach nur der Hammer. Mitten im Old Quarter aber trotzdem irgendwie ruhig. Was will man Mehr
review.comment_negative: Was mit nicht gefällt. Vielleicht nur wenn das Hotel ausgebucht ist.

review.rating: Das Hotel ist aufgrund der zentralen Lage und der Ruhe in den Zimmern nur zu empfehlen.
review.comment_positive: Das Personal war so freundlich und hilfsbereit!
The location was close to walking street and old town. The service was incredible good!! The stuff was really friendly and made our stay perfectly pleasant.
The location of the hotel was superb, being right in the middle of the Old Quarter and walking distance to many recommended sights and eateries.

Hotel in posizione centrale,ottima colazione,camera pulita ma soprattutto  la gentilezza e la cortesia  del personale. Siamo arrivati  la mattina alle 9.30 e,oltre ad averci offerto la colazione, ci hanno dato la camera subito dopo.
review.comment_negative: Nulla

review.rating: Beautiful little hotel in a great location!
review.comment_positive: Super friendly hospitality from Justin and Grace. They couldn't do enough for us. The room was comfortable (bed huge and super comfy) and clean. The hotel is a short walk (less than 5 mins)  from the lake and you soon get your bearings from there. We stayed here for 3 nights in an economy double room and then did a Ha long Bay cruise for one night. We were then booked in for another night and were given a deluxe room which was beautiful and spacious. Justin kindly kept our luggage safe for us while we were on the cruise, so all we needed was an overnight bag. Great little hotel which excels at customer service. Thank you for your hospitality.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Wir waren Total vier Mal wieder zurückgekehrt, das sollte genügend aussagend zu unserer Meinung sein
review.comment_positive: Die Angestellten sind äusserst engagiert, zuvorkommend und gut gelaunt. Sehr schöne Zimmer und ein reichhaltiges Buffet am Morgen. Sehr praktisch und zu empfehlen ist auch die Reiseberatung und Planung im Hotel.
review.comment_negative: Tageslicht wäre schön, wenn man viel unterwegs ist jedoch nicht notwendig. Die Zimmer sind in Richtung Korridor ringhörig, jedoch gibt es vier Zimmer pro Stockwerk und der Lärm hällt sich in Grenzen.

review.comment_positive: Muy limpio, excelente ubicación, el personal muy amable, desayuno rico
El personal es muy amable y atento

The location was good. The staff was very attentive and polite. They said hello and goodbye whenever you came or left. They did my laundry and it was very affordable. The complimentary breakfast was nice, as well.
review.comment_negative: My room felt like it needed to be dusted and the window to the outside was really a window to another hallway. That made it feel a bit dark. I wish there was space in the lobby area, but there was a weird table in the back of the first floor. It would be cool if they did something with that space for the guests.

review.rating: Ideale locatie en oase van rust in de drukke stad!
review.comment_positive: Ontzettend behulpzaam en vriendelijk personeel. Mensen aan de receptie spraken prima Engels waardoor het erg gemakkelijk communiceren was. Het ontbijt is top! Goede koffie en zeer behulpzaam personeel.
review.comment_negative: De wasbak zat op de slaapkamer. Verlichting boven de spiegel was minimaal. De spiraal in het bed was voelbaar bij het omdraaien in de nacht. Ook was het bed voor ons wat aan de kleine kant.

review.rating: A perfect place for couples to relax and enjoy their stay in the heart of Hanoi. Felt so at ease and at home.
review.comment_positive:
Clean
Comfortable 
Amazing 5 star service from Jerry and staff.
Extremely extremely friendly and helpful team!
Good position, amazing staff, so kind, they help you for everything, really appreciated
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.rating: Gold standard customer service at this hotel!
review.comment_positive: I like the sofisticated design of the property. It's an unusual but very good find because you have to go through a very tight alley to get to their lobby. I find that fun & unique about the property. The rooms do not have a window but the design compliments that. The windowless setup does not make it feel stuffy but homey instead. The beds were comfortable & the bathroom was functional without discounting style. The breakfast is served across the street at their sister hotel. I can definitely say that their breakfast served one of the best dishes among all the hotel stays I've been to on my trip. The dishes are quality and they made sure that there is diversity in their options. The restaurant staff were very hands on and hygienic in serving the dinners. The overall selection of food is amazing. Saving the best factor that I liked about the stay the most for last is the staff. Everyone in the hotel has greeted us warmly & sincerely. I'd especially like to thank Mr. Jerry for helping me throughout my trip. He has provided assistance beyond what is expected of a hotel manager. He has assisted me in my transport bookings & has guided me to ensure that my stay in Hanoi will be good. Although Hanoi is the last stop of our trip and this hotel was our last hotel, he has ensured that I am aware that I can reach out to him anytime for help no matter where I am in Vietnam. And lastly upon our check out at dawn, he had prepared a to-go breakfast bag for each one of us as we will miss their breakfast. This was a very kind & considerate gesture that we didn't expect to experience. Again, I am very grateful for his service and am very glad that I have found a new friend during the trip. Thank you Hanoi Emerald Waters Valley & thank you Jerry! ☺️
review.comment_negative: None. It was a stellar experience!

review.comment_positive: Jerry and Grace are the best.
Location near lake Old Quarter Hanoi bar, and restaurants, very good breakfast also Pho with very nice and help staff
review.comment_negative: Nn window

review.comment_positive: Nhân viên rất đáng yêu và thân thiện 🥰
Verschrikkelijk aardig personeel. Erg behulpzaam.

review.rating: I had an outstanding stay at Emerald Valley during my 3 week holiday in Vietnam. The room was clean, amazing service fro
review.comment_positive: Room, facilities, location, service
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Hidden, but not out of sight!
review.comment_positive: Spotlessly clean. Staff - Jerry, Kim and Grace - are so friendly and attentive. Location is perfect for the old quarter. Breakfast is excellent, although taken in the sister hotel, literally just across the road. Quiet at night. Really useful to be able to leave/store our heavy luggage during our Ha Long Bay trip. Great value for money.
review.comment_negative: A/C a bit noisy, but probably the same everywhere if you're not used to it.

review.comment_positive: חדרים גדולים , צוות מקסים, ארוחת בוקר מדהימה
review.comment_negative: אין חלון ( זה ככה ברוב המחנות בהאנוי להבנתי)

review.comment_positive: Friendly & helpful staffs. enjoy our stay at here. Breakfast food is great as well and the hotel is strategically locally in nearby attractions
review.comment_negative: shower water pressure

review.comment_positive: Vị trí khách sạn cũng tạm, gần một vài chỗ tiện lợi.
The breakfast was in the sister hotel across the road.  Plenty of choice and good breakfast
review.comment_negative: it was noisy in the hotel with alarms going off occasionally.  I think it was to do with other guests opening the emergency fire doors

review.comment_positive:
There are 0 negatives. The staff was the friendliest I’ve come across in Vietnam. The rooms were very clean and very comfortable. The staff can help you with absolutely anything you need. I loved it here! 
It also had one of the better breakfasts I’ve had while here.
review.comment_negative: Everything was perfect.

review.comment_positive: Super Service. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und immer zur Stelle. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und die Zimmer waren sehr sauber. Das Frühstück hatte eine große Auswahl. Die Lage ist perfekt (Old Quarter). Sehr empfehlenswert!
The staff were super friendly especially Justin and Grace - so helpful and pleasant and always taking care of me. It was a really nice experience because of them. I highly recommend this place.
Hotel located just few minutes walking to the old quarter. Staff is amazing, the best I’ve ever dealt with during my holidays.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: todo. el trato del personal sobretodo
nhân viên nhiệt tình

review.rating: I really liked my stay here. It made me feel like a princess.
review.comment_positive: The service was impeccable. I could feel that the personal was making an effort to make me feel welcome and add a personal touch to their service by remembering my name and some little details.
What we liked the most was how kind and friendly the staff was. The hotel was very clean and modern facilities, very nice and comfortable to spend an unforgettable vacation.
review.comment_negative: I have nothing to comment.

review.comment_positive: De vriendelijkheid van het personeel, het ontbijt en de mooie kamer.

Staff were really friendly and helpful, even helped us book a Ha Long Bay cruise and organised transport to/from airport at good price. Room was clean, breakfast included. Good location in the Old Quarter and away from the 'party streets'

Location is great. And room was nice, very clean and clearly very new. There isn't much window but if your just there for a few nights. Does also mean it's very quiet.
The biggest value was the staff. Honestly stayed in alot of Vietnamese hotels and staff are always nice but Kim & the team were just amazing. Helpful and accommodating above and beyond.

review.rating: Great value for your money. I ended up staying there twice in Hanoi. Perfect location and very clean and comfortable roo
review.comment_positive: Best value for your money, great clean room, great location and really helpful and sweet staff
review.comment_negative: Everything was great

review.comment_positive: convenient to go anywhere, you can walk to restaurants or landmark in Hanoi, a lot of local foods.
review.comment_negative: the reception every friendly, they recommend us about traveling to other place and night market in Hanoi, good communication and helpful for us, we will visit once again definitely.

review.comment_positive: Grace and her team were extremely helpful and very welcoming.  Nothing was too much trouble and always smiling . Overall a very nice stay.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really .

review.comment_positive: Wonderful staff, incredible breakfast selection, great location. Room was clean and comfortable. There’s a secret little bar near by when you walk out to the left- I can’t recall the name but it has old books stapled to the wall- must go.
review.comment_negative: The room is quiet small so it’s best for a just a few days or one person. It would be a bit challenging for two people for several days.

review.comment_positive: ομορφο ξενοδοχειο με πολυ περιποιημενα και καθαρα δωματια ,στο κεντρο της πολης
Good location, friendly staff
review.comment_negative:
Room without proper window
Staff tried to help but provided many wrong information which could have resulted in us missing important attractions

review.comment_positive:
Sehr hilfsbereites Personal, welches unseren Aufenthalt hier perfekt gemacht hat und uns sehr freundlich, zu jeder Tageszeit unterstützt und unsere Fragen beantwortet hat. Da wir früh nach Sapa aufgebrochen sind, durften wir früher am Frühstück teilnehmen und uns ein kleines Lunchpaket für die Fahrt zusammenstellen.

Über den Zeitraum war es auch möglich unser Gepäck dort unterzustellen.

Die Zimmer waren sehr leise und geräumig, die Betten sehr gemütlich und das ganze Zimmer und Bad außerordentlich sauber.
review.comment_negative: Es war perfekt.

review.comment_positive: Staff is super friendly, rooms are clean and the whole experience is just comfortable from start to end.

Wonderful staff! Mr. Jerry and his team were very helpful and friendly. We stayed at the hotel 3 times for a total of 5 nights. The regular rooms were a bit small so if you are planning to stay 2 nights or more, go for the bigger "family rooms"  which have more space to spread out and the shower area has a door instead of just a wet area like in a lot of Southeast Asian hotels.  The location is great, walking distance to most of the attractions.  The front desk staff will organize a car for you if needed.  Breakfast is good, served across the street in their sister hotel.
A great hotel for the value and absolutely fantastic staff.
Staff we loved, professional, helpful & informative. Thank you to Grace, Kim & Tracy!
review.comment_negative: Suggests restaurant on site, but there isn't. This was sited at the sister hotel over the road, which wasn't a problem for breakfast, but the evening dining had  been closed since COVID).

review.rating: Excellent. Thank you to Grace and the team!
review.comment_positive:
Grace and the team provided amazing service. We travelled as a group of 7 and transited through Hanoi a few times. Grace helped us book all our transfers to and from other locations (door to door to hotels) at good prices. Grace was quick to respond and always followed up, provided confirmations and updates (which is rare for Vietnam). Check in and out process was seamless and we travelled stress free. When members of our group had one night in Hanoi pre flights home, we all booked with the hotel again! 
Rooms were spacious and quiet but location was right in the middle of the Old quarter. Would highly recommend!

review.rating: Very cute and a place full of kindness!
review.comment_positive: Specially people attending guests are so kind, so proper and they took a lot of care of us. They felt us better than stay at home!
review.comment_negative: Everything was good enough!

review.rating: I love it. I will definitely come again if I ever visit Hanoi.
review.comment_positive: The staffs are so police and helpful. They would go out of their way to ensure your stay with them is pleasant. Also, they are kind enough to show me the best place for specific street food.

Como aspecto positivo, destacar sobretodo el trato de todo el personal, que es el mejor que hemos recibido nunca en un hotel. Además, mencionaría el mobiliario muy moderno y nuevo, la limpieza y la ubicación tan cerca del casco histórico.
review.comment_negative: La entrada al hotel es por un callejón que no hace justicia al resto de estética del hotel (en Google maps te puedes confundir con el hotel hermano que se encuentra enfrente) y el desayuno se da en ese otro hotel cruzando la calle. Por último, el hecho de que la habitación no tenga luz natural despista un poco, más aún si amanece a las 6.

review.comment_positive: La amabilidad y profesionalidad del personal
review.comment_negative: El calor en las calles

review.comment_positive:
L'emplacement, la propreté des lieux. C'est un hôtel situé en plein coeur du vieil Hanoï et pourtant c'est très calme. Il n'y a pas de fenêtre à la chambre mais pour avoir tester un autre hôtel dans ce quartier il vaut peut-être mieux pour le calme.
Une mention toute particulière au personnel de l'hôtel qui se plie en 4 pour que votre séjour se passe au mieux, . Merci à eux pour ce séjour
review.comment_negative: Tout est parfait

review.comment_positive: Great location, beautiful hotel tucked away! We were only here for 1 night but would have happily stayed here for longer. Nice spacious room, very clean and comfortable.
review.comment_negative: Water did get out of the shower area - which can make it a bit slippery when getting out. So just something to be mindful of!

review.rating: Most friendly and helpful staff we’ve ever met
review.comment_positive:
The staff were very very friendly and helpful. They will help you book trips, rent a scooter or whatever you need. They also help you to avoid getting scammed and get everything at the right price.
The hotel itself was also quite nice and clean and has massage facilities and breakfast.

Superb location
Friendly staffs
Reasonable price
review.comment_negative: Elevator and water pump sounds too much at night

review.comment_positive:
+ Breakfast was amazing
+ Location was very good 
+ The staff was very kind and helpful

The service of the staff, location, cleanliness and comfort of the beds etc were excellent. Grace and Ellie helped us with many little things and the bellboys etc very smiling and helpful too. The colourful murals on the little corridor coming in were so pretty, and breakfast in the sister hotel across the street was good. Staff there were just as smiley and friendly. Lots of good food and coffee shops around. We liked it so much we came back to stay another night
review.comment_negative: There are no windows in the room which was a little claustrophobic. Also the walls are very thin, so it can be a little noisy depending on the considerateness of other guests. But with ear plugs, it was fine. Nil noise from the street

review.comment_positive: The staff is extremely friendly and helpful, everyone is super nice and respectful, including the house keeping :D location was great
review.comment_negative:
The room. No natural light, very small window  with no view and 1m across the window is a wall. When you wake up, you feel bad and uncomfortable due darkness and no sunlight.

On the plus side the decorations in the room was good, bed was comfy, minibar was great 👍

review.comment_positive:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Classy, and I cannot express enough gratitude for the outstanding service and hospitality I experienced during my stay. From the moment we arrived, the staff went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and satisfaction. For the price I've paid, it is truly exceptional. 

First and foremost, the friendly staff members deserve special mention. Their warm smiles and genuine willingness to assist created a welcoming atmosphere that instantly made us feel at home. They were attentive, approachable, and always ready to offer assistance, making us feel valued and cared for throughout our stay. Not to forget, the breakfast spread is good too. 

The hotel itself was impeccable. The rooms were well-appointed, clean, and comfortable, providing a peaceful sanctuary after our long days of exploring. The facilities were modern and well-maintained, offering everything we needed for a pleasant stay.

Additionally, the hotel's central location was a major advantage. Easy accessible to all the attractions near Old Quarters 

Overall, I cannot recommend this hotel enough. The friendly and attentive staff, coupled with their willingness to go above and beyond, truly made our stay memorable. Their exceptional service and warm hospitality made us feel like valued guests, and I would not hesitate to book this hotel again based on this outstanding experience.

Thank you to the entire hotel team for their dedication and commitment to providing an exceptional guest experience. Your efforts truly made a difference, and I am grateful for the memories created during my stay.

The hotel is situated at the very heart of the old quarters makes it so easy for me to walk around day and night. The room is spotless, the staff cleans it every day. But what makes my stay remarkable is definitely the hotel staff. They took great care of my stay and were just beyond helpful. Special shoutout to Tracy, Jerry, Jack, Dave, and David :) You guys are exceptional!
review.comment_negative: None.

review.comment_positive: The staff and the location are excellent. This is the sister hotel of Hanoi emerald waters hotel and spa which is right across the road. The valley hotel is up a narrow lane way but don’t let this put you off, everything was great.
review.comment_negative: Wish there was a shower door or curtain so the whole bathroom didn’t get wet when showering. But this was the only thing that was not great.

review.rating: Oasis of calm in the bustling Old Quarter
review.comment_positive: Excellent location - quiet despite being in the bustling Old Quarter. Amazingly helpful staff. Nice breakfast.

review.rating: incredible staff makes for an incredible experience.
review.comment_positive: the staff were so welcoming and went to large lengths to inform us on what was around the hotel, making us feel very welcomed and comfortable. They even walked us across the road to breakfast adjust the traffic which was so thoughtful. Everyone was so friendly, it made our trip that much more memorable.

Very welcoming. The staff have good tips. Our room was so quiet, then we didn't hear any noises from the street even from the other guests. Very comfortable bed. Amazing restaurant on the same side of the street (banh-mi and french restaurant). Good location.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really. Rooms are small but cosy. No amenities.

review.comment_positive:
perfect room
nice beds
very friendly staff
review.comment_negative: everything was okay!

review.rating: Outstanding service at heart of Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Absolutely outstanding service (thank you Jerry and team for taking good care of us!), in great location and very comfortable. We definitely come back when we return to Hanoi. We booked tour and transfer with them and both were also outstanding.
review.comment_negative: Nothing, all great

review.rating: Super friendly hotel, Jerry is an exceptional manger
review.comment_positive: Jerry the manager was an absolute star. He was so helpful and went above and beyond to make our trip comfortable and effortless. The room was great as were the rest of the staff, but Jerry was a standout amazing asset to the team
review.comment_negative: N/A

review.comment_positive: Everything was good staff was really helpful and very supportive.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Super kleines Hotel. Das Personal ist wirklich sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Zimmer sind sehr gut. Mit Fenstern ist es halt in Hanoi etwas schwierig. Einmalig gutes Frühstück. Lässt keine Wünsche offen. Und die Lage ist sehr gut, direkt an der Altstadt. Das Hotel ist eine Empfehlung.
Personalet på hotellet var meget hjælpsomme. Det var dejligt at de gav anbefalinger til ting man kan lave og se i Hanoi. Der var meget rent og værelserne var behagelige
Rent och snyggt. Prisvärt.

The staff Jerry & Grace were incredible. I am forgetting the name of another female. She was also fantastic. The location is close to almost everything.
Will go back again because of their incredible service. The food is top notch too.
아침식사가 너무 맛있어요. 여기서 먹은 쌀국수가 밖에서 사먹은 것 보다 훨씬 좋습니다.
Have a great time staying here. Tracy 3个月, the receptionist girl, with a smiling face and cheerful personality, is really sweer and helpful. Hope to have a chance to be here again in the near future.
review.comment_negative: The network signal in 2nd is a bit weak, so it's difficult to receive phone call fr outside.

review.comment_positive: Desayuno muy completo y variado
Place in the very good place
review.comment_negative: the room is a little small and the toilet is not good smell

review.comment_positive:
Absolutely everything! The personnel were extremely friendly and helpful, specially Jerry and Ellie! If I come back to Hanoi I would definitely stay here again. 

The room was spacious, very clean and had a really comfortable bed. The buffet breakfast was delicious with many warm choices, pastries, iogurt, fresh fruit and more!
They also allowed me to store one backpacks at the hotel while doing the Ha Giang loop which was very helpful.
review.comment_negative: Nothing. The entrance is easy to miss from the street as it's a narrow alley.

review.comment_positive: Very clean and comfortable. The staff very nice and helpful.  Great breakfast. Good choice.

fong sạch nhìn tiện nghi rất ok

review.comment_positive: Bardzo przyjazna, pomocna obsługa. Czysto, bardzo dobra lokalizacja.

The staff is really polite and dedicated. They felt us feeling at home to a point that we missed their kindness during the trip. Breakfast is next to the hotel but outside but the food is absolutely fantastic. They arranged us our trips and solved efficiently every doubt.  We Will Come back for sure!

review.comment_negative: khăn tắm hơi cũ và cứng, phòng bí ko có quạt thông gió cho wc

review.comment_positive: Das Personal war extrem freundlich. Wir haben sehr nützliche Informationen und immer hilfreiche Tipps bekommen.

review.rating: I super love it here everything is amazing!
review.comment_positive: I like everything about this hotel, breakfast, room and most specially the STAFF. Staff are amazing helpful and approachable. This is HIGHLY recommended and next yr when we come back we will book here again! It's affordable and we really had fun staying here plus walking distance to night market, opera house and many more! Again I would like to thank the staff for putting HP BD to our room and for making us feel so special, thank you Jerry you're amazing!
review.comment_negative: none it was a perfect hotel for me

review.rating: 5 star service/staff - so helpful and accommodating.
review.comment_positive: staff are great and helpful. very comfy beds and good breakfast.
review.comment_negative: rooms are quite pokey, but I think that’s what you get in big cities.

review.comment_positive:
We had four memorable nights at this hotel. Our room was clean, it had a great air con and it was tucked away behind the busiest part of the Old Quarter. 

We are so thankful for the incredible staff. Grace was amazing, we really appreciated her throughout our stay. I had a little communication problem with a local tour and was quite concerned, Grace reached out to the travel agency and half an hour later everything was solved. She also made great local food and site recommendations. Also special thanks to Justin and Tracy.
The staff were fantastic
review.comment_negative: The bed was too hard

review.comment_positive:
location- near to all I intend to see- shops, old railway tracks, walking distance to the pick up location of my bus to Sa Pan, the lake and tons of coffee shops and restaurants around!
Bonus-  there is a great coffee shop across Moo Coffee, look for Dung

Breakfast-  great selection

Room- clean, organised

FacilitieS- to be fair I didnt get to see as I stayed overnight only.

staff- perfect! especially Jerry and the guy who checked us in on the 17th! Sorry Dude, i forgot your name! You have been awesome as well! Thanks to Anna too for helping us locate the La Mensa cafe!
The staffs are very kind and helpful. Tracy gave us lots of information about Hanoi, and Justin was very kind would ask how we doing every time we walked past the hall.
review.comment_negative: The shampoo is not foaming

review.comment_positive: Le personnel est exceptionnel : toujours souriant, disponible, prêt à rendre service.

We love the proximity of the property to everything, it is tucked away from all the noise of the city. We loved the all hotel staff especially — Jerry and Grace, they will just take care of you. Their hospitality is just top notch!
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive: Very friendly and helpful staff . Good food

The workers!! I cannot praise Grace and her male colleague (didn’t get his name) enough. They were so welcoming from the moment we walked in. As my boyfriend got sick, we had to cancel our trip to Sapa and they helped out with everything making sure we didn’t pay for it even if it was a last minute cancellation and they still didn’t charge us for the airport transfer (which is only free when booking a trip through the hotel). Honestly, I haven’t ever received better service. We were blown away. The location is also perfect close to everything. Can’t recommend enough!
review.comment_negative: Small room and with the internal window, it felt a bit claustrophobic, but ok for a short stay. A lot of nice from the hallways and the other rooms, you can hear everything!

review.rating: We had an amazing stay at this hotel. The staff are very kind and helpful. They let us store our luggage for a day and a
review.comment_positive: The property is clean & well maintained.

review.rating: Cozy, clean and comfortable with helpful staff!
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is new with good location which easy to get to the Old town and nearby places. The staffs were super helpful and friendly. The hotel is clean and comfortable. There are bars, pubs and resturants nearby which covers all your needs. If you want to book any travels or taxis while staying there, the staff goes above and beyond to assist!
Can absolutely recommend staying here!
review.comment_negative: It is a little bit hard to find if you have not been there before.

review.comment_positive: Staff is very welcoming, kind and helpfull. The room was clean and compfy. The hotel is nicely decorated and well located. The breakfast was delicious with "a la carte" items as well as a nice buffet. Def recommend!
review.comment_negative: Nothing ! It was great 👍

review.comment_positive: great location. great value. good breakfast. amazing staff. jerry especially. a wonderful person.
Excellent location, Friendly, cheerful and helpful staff. Jerry, Kim and ask the staff were excellent
review.comment_negative: None

review.comment_positive:
Really good location - it's central but not too busy or noisy. We couldn't hear any outdoor or hotel noise from our room. 

Breakfast was really nice with good variety. 

Staff were super helpful with recommendations and helping us get to and from airport.
Great experience overall
Nhân viên hỗ trợ nhiệt tình và linh hoạt.

Superb location 😍 In the middle of the Hanoi Old quarter. Everything is within walking distance. 
The staff was very kind, polite and always helpful🙏🏻
Breakfast was amazing too 😍 

We had a great time here.
review.comment_negative: The room was very small but comfortable. Could have been a bit bigger.

review.comment_positive:
Staff were very welcoming and helpful from the moment you stepped in, could converse well in English, and would go out of the way to ensure your comfort and convenience. 

The room was clean and very spacious. Toilet was clean and had good supply of hot water. Although there was no view for the window - the hotel was in the middle of buildings, we appreciated the natural lighting.
The bed was comfortable! 

Breakfast was great (across the road at their sister hotel) - good spread of food items.
review.comment_negative: nothing, really. would recommend this property to everyone!

review.rating: Mình thật sự ấn tượng với khách sạn. Khách sạn đẹp, vô cùng sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh. Các anh chị nhân viên đều rất nhiệt tình,
review.comment_positive: Không gian đẹp, yên tĩnh, thoải mái. Các anh chị nhân viên vô cùng nhiệt tình, chu đáo. 10 điểm 10 ah
Sehr freundliches Personal absolut jeder
review.comment_negative: Das Licht vor dem Badezimmer Spiegel , zum Rasieren zu wenig

review.comment_positive: Wifi khá ổn, phòng cũng sạch sẽ.
Fantastisk flotte og hyggelig personale som var veldig behjelpelige! De hentet oss på flyplassen og booket tur for oss til Halong bay. Perfekt beliggenhet! Rene og flotte rom, god frokost.
review.comment_negative: Har ingen ting å utsette på stedet!

review.comment_positive: The staff was so helpful and kind, really us enjoy our stay!

The staff in this hotel are fantastic. Location is very central, breakfast was very tasty, the room was very clean, nice bathroom and comfortable bed. Would highly recommend to anyone planning a trip to Hanoi.
convenient location. Staff are very polite and service is exceptional. Kudos to Jerry & team

Everything looked very nice on the photos. But the room itself was smaller than the photo. But also most shockingly the deluxe room didn't have any window. At first it felt scary. But the staff were super nice and helpful. And the location is good.
review.comment_negative: No window. No restaurant

review.comment_positive: The accommodation at the Hanoi Emerald Waters Valley Hotel was in a word perfect. The location of the hotel is brilliant, you are close to everywhere. There are many restaurants, cafes and ATMs in the area. The hotel staff is excellent, attentive enough, but not intrusive. They speak English without problems. The whole hotel team is willing to help in any situation, whether to recommend interesting places or to arrange a trip. From Hanoi we regularly went on excursions to the surrounding area and during our absence, they willingly took care of our large luggage. When we were leaving for Sapa and the train left at 10 pm, we could even take a shower in the hotel, even though we had long since checked out. The breakfast was unique, a mix of Vietnamese and western food, even during several days you could taste new and new tastes. Thank you to the whole hotel team for making our stay in Hanoi perfect thanks to them.

La struttura in pieno centro e molto ben tenuta. 
Il buffet della colazione e' completo ed oltre le aspettative.
Le camere sono spaziose e la pulizia e' ottima.

Personale molto gentile e disponibile, ottimo inglese.
qualita' prezzo molto elevata.
Posizione centralissima.
review.comment_negative:
Unico dato negativo e' che ho soggiornato in una camera interna della struttura priva di finestre e da cui non si aveva ben percezione del clima esterno.
SI sono offerti di cambiare stanza e di offrirmi una con finestra.

review.comment_positive:
the service was great!!!! very clean and nice room. 
I recommend!

Pulizia delle camere

Ovviamente ci sono camere con balcone e con finestre. La mancanza di una finestra dovrebbe essere messa in evidenza nella descrizione per permettere di scegliere la camera con cognizione di causa

The hotel was actually located(opposite the road) to its sister hotel with a similar name.
review.comment_negative: There was a portable shower which took up the full shower area in the bathroom (which we thought was really weird). It made the toilet feel a little smaller than what it is.

review.rating: Very central and the hotel looked after our luggage whilst we went on a Halong Bay cruise.

The hotel is also conveniently located in the heart of the Old Quarter so it was very easy to walk around to some of the attractions. I would love to stay here again when I come back to Hanoi. Highly recommend!
前台美女非常热情，服务周到，喜欢这个酒店，非常推荐，硬件设施齐全，更重要的是给我的极致热情服务

review.rating: nice hotel in an excellent location

I liked the location and the friendliness of the staff
daily complimentary bottled water 
very good wifi
very good and diverse breakfast (although it's served in the "sister-hotel" across the street)
review.comment_negative:
it's necessary to cross a busy road in order to get breakfast

review.comment_positive: The staff were very nice and attentive. The breakfast was also great.
Net hotel, ruime kamer en een fijne locatie
review.comment_negative: De kamers waren wel wat gehorig, er was veel geluid

review.rating: This Hotel is worth it. Book it now or you'll regret it.
review.comment_positive:
This place is highly rated by everyone, so we gave it a go. and lemme tell you, it did not disappoint. 
The location was spot on! It's not too loud despite being in the center of everything. The area have restaurants and shopping places. 
The room is a little bit small, but it packs a punch. It has a good bed, good lighting and it's quiet! 
The room came with Breakfast Buffet and it's super yum! 
And most of all, the people that works here are just superb. Jerry the Manager who made sure we were comfortable all throughout our stay. Kim, the lady who checked us in, always helping us navigate the city. Emma and Jay from the Buffet always so pleasant with our refillable Iced Coffees and Pho and Egg orders! And everyone else who I failed to catch the names, that works in the hotel, they are all so lovely! 
Other than a marvelous hotel, the people who works here, gave a World Class Service! 
We look forward to coming back in this hotel.
review.comment_negative:
This is so minor and I am just nit picking here, this might be because of the Architectural hotel styles of Vietnam. 
The room is a little small and there are no Windows with views. We have a window in our room but It faces another wall.

review.rating: A stay that etches in our memory for a long time..
review.comment_positive: There are endless things which we liked about this hotel and stay, we might litteraly run out of space if I list them all here 😊.  To begin with the staff , who are heavenly angels,. we have never come across this sort of top notch hospitality in my extensive travel history (every step they go out of their way to make you feel comfortable and provide you information and comfort more then we ask for) . Felt really sad to bid them Good bye. Room was Cosy, had all the facilities, bed was as comfortable as it could get. The breakfast which comes with the room tarrif would shame a 5 star international chain (I am not exaggerating)  it had all one would want along  with vietnamese delights all around kept us grazing every morning trying out all that was on offer. Believe it or not, all this attention, care luxury etc came for a very reasonable tarrif which we had to pay. I would blindly opt this hotel if we ever  visit Hanoi again as we would be doing ourselves a great favor in our opinion.
review.comment_negative: Absolutely nothing

review.comment_positive:
We had a really nice stay at Emerald! The room was spotless clean, with a large bathroom. The sink is located outside the bathroom, and the room has no window, but we didn’t mind, as it allowed us to have nice and quiet sleep. The bed was also very confortable. 
Onto the breakfast, it was amazing! With plenty of fresh options everyday, we were looking forward to it each morning! 
Finally, the staff is honestly the best we’ve encountered during our stay in Vietnam. They are all incredibly kind, helpful, welcoming and enthusiastic. Another special shout-out to Jerry! He really deserves all the kinds words already mentioned by others.
review.comment_negative: The only thing is that the room is not super soundproof through the door, we could clearly hear the other clients in the hallway.

review.rating: The staff is just so friendly and always ready to help out. Would definitely go back when I'm in Hanoi
review.comment_positive: The property is very quiet even though it is almost in the middle of Old Quarter
review.comment_negative: Nothing not to like.

review.comment_positive: the staff are exceptional
review.comment_negative: great location

review.comment_positive:
Semplicemente meraviglioso!
Struttura nuova e accogliente. Camere pulitissime e davvero belle. Letto comodissimo.
L'hotel è a due passi da tutto, in una bella via.
Lo staff è superlativo, di una gentilezza e disponibilità ineguagliabili, in particolare Justin che ci ha dato molti consigli tra cui una sartoria ottima.
Colazione ricca e con ingredienti di qualità.
Everything, from staff to location.

review.rating: Absolutely fantastic stay, would definitely recommend

review.rating: Enjoyed two nights of good sleep

review.comment_positive: This hotel is a hidden gem in Hanoi! The location is perfect, right in the center of the city. The rooms are amazing, and the breakfast is delicious. But what truly sets this place apart are the staff. Grace and her team are the loveliest hosts you could ask for. They go above and beyond to make you feel welcome and comfortable, just like you're at home. I would absolutely recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Hanoi.
review.comment_negative: Nothing that I can think off, everything was perfect,

review.comment_positive: Vriendelijk en attent
Tạm được, không quá tệ cho nhóm bạn.

Ubytovanie v Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley bolo jednym slovom dokonale. Poloha hotela je genialna, mate blizko uplne vsade. V okoli je vela restauracii, kaviarni aj bankomatov. Personal hotela je vynikajuci, dostatocne pozorny, ale nevtierany. Hovoria bez problemov anglicky. Cely team hotela je ochotny pomoct v kazdej situacii, ci uz odporucit zaujimave miesta alebo zabezpecit vylet. Z Hanoja sme pravidelne odchadzali na vylety do okolia a pocas nasej nepritomnosti nam ochotne postrazili velku batozinu. Ked sme odchadzali do Sapa a vlak nam isiel o desiatej vecer, mohli sme sa v hoteli aj osprchovat, i ked uz sme mali davno po check oute. Ranajky boli jedinecne, mix vietnamskych aj zapadnych jedal, aj pocas viacerych dni ste mohli ochutnavat stale nove a nove chute. Dakujem celemu teamu hotela, ze nas pobyt v Hanoji bol aj vdaka nim perfektny.

El trato del personal es excelente, son increíblemente amables. Jeff nos ayudo mucho con las dudas de nuestros tickets de bus y estuvo muy atento a nuestras necesidades.
La habitación estaba muy limpia y era cómoda y amplia. Lo mejor fue que era muy tranquila y silenciosa para poder descansar. 
Ubicación muy buena cerca de los puntos de interés del Old Quarter y desayuno muy muy completo.

review.rating: Best value for money I’ve ever stayed at
review.comment_positive:
Best value for money at a hotel I’ve ever stayed at.

The staff were exceptional. Friendly, attentive and caring. They go over and above. 

The breakfast was also pleasant and had many options.
review.comment_negative: Whilst the room didn’t have a window, we didn’t stay in the room that much as it was a city break however the decor was still nice.

review.rating: One of the best hotel you can find:-)
review.comment_positive: I highly recommend this hotel! Its fantastic location, superb breakfast, and our room on the 7th floor were all highlights of our stay. The shower was fantastic, and the bed was incredibly comfortable. The staff, including Jerry, Grace, and other amazing team members, were exceptionally supportive, helpful, and kind - truly the best staff we've ever encountered. They made our stay even more enjoyable by assisting us with booking everything, from tours to spa appointments and laundry services. We are certain that we will return in the future to experience this outstanding hospitality again.
review.comment_negative: Everything is perfect

review.comment_positive:
Gentilezza e disponibilità personale, camera pulita e sempre in ordine. Colazione varia ed abbondante.
Posizione centralissima perfetta per visitare Hanoi e come partenza per i tours.

We enjoyed our stay, perfect location! The staff go above and beyond there so kind and polite. They couldn't do anything more for you! 

Thank you

The property is located in the Old Quarter, very close to the lake and Ngoc Son Temple, the area has a lot of restaurants, bars and nice cafes close. The staff very friendly and helpful, always there to help us with useful information and a pleasure to talk to. The hotel is clean and quiet despite being located in the Old Quarter, which is very convenient.

The staff were excellent, it's the best,friendliest service I've experienced in Vietnam. The location is great as it's close enough to a lot of the attractions but peaceful and quiet at night. They upgraded our room without us even asking!

Excellent service from the staff. Professional, friendly, proactive and helpful. Jerry the manager is very responsive. Front line Tracy is excellent, very helpful.
Hotel is new, quiet and clean.

Although it is just a small boutique hotel but on
overall it is an excellent hotel to consider when plan to stay at old quarter area.

review.comment_positive: Very good value for money. Very good location, the room was very comfortable although it didn't have an external window (however we were informed about this before booking), the room was clean, the staff was very friendly, breakfast was very good with many options

review.rating: Tolle Unterkunft für einen Städtetrip in Hanoi
review.comment_positive:
Der Service war hervorragend! Kim hat uns direkt sehr herzlich in Empfang genommen und sich viel Zeit genommen, uns gute Tipps für Hanoi zu geben. Es war persönlich und die Gastgeber waren sehr aufmerksam, kannten unsere Namen und haben uns bei den Ausflügen, die wir nicht über das Hotel gebucht hatten, bei der Organisation geholfen und waren nicht aufdringlich.
Die Unterkunft war sehr modern und das Frühstück war umfangreich, frisch und lecker. Man konnte zwischen verschiedenen Eierspeisen wählen, die in kurzer Zeit frisch für einen zubereitet wurden. Exzellenter Service auch hier!
Die Lage war ebenfalls richtig gut - direkt in der Altstadt, aber in einer eher ruhigeren Straße davon, sodass man direkt vor der Tür von Bussen für Touren eingesammelt werden konnte.
Für den Weg zum Flughafen hat uns Kim einen privaten Fahrer organisiert, dies hat wunderbar geklappt und die Fahrt war sogar günstiger und komfortabler als Grab.
Wir waren insgesamt 5 Nächte in der Unterkunft.
review.comment_negative: Gar nichts.

review.comment_positive: Personal Super Freundlich und zuvorkommend. Immer hilfsbereit. Gute Beratung bei Aktivitäten.  Gutes Frühstück
review.comment_negative: Die Bilder zeigen nicht das eigendliche Hotel. Der Eingang  befindet sich hinter einem langen Gang. Die Dusche ist schon ziemlich verbraucht.  Zum  Frühstück muss man über die Straße in das Schwester Hotel.  Zimmerservice sehr lange Wartezeit. Beim Blick aus dem fenster( zimmer 301) sieht man nur eone Hauswand und 2 fenster..

review.comment_positive: Such friendly staff, made you feel very welcome - a very nice, clean hotel in a great location - enjoyed my stay here very much

The staff always smile sincerely and greeted us whenever they see us. Thank you Tracy and Jack (my apology if I remembered his name wrongly). He checked us in together with Tracy and help me with my luggage. Also Dave who checked us out :)
