review.rating: Great stay in historic city centre, ideal for couples
review.comment_positive: Great location, comfortable rooms, qualitative breakfast, but above all amazing staff! The reception staff has been one of the friendliest staff I've ever come across. They gave us a lot of tips and recommendations and were always very chatty and attentive. Huge thanks to them again for making us feel welcomed and appreciated.

Mooie schone en nette kamers, op een perfecte locatie in de stad. Het personeel is uiterst vriendelijk! Bij aankomst (vroeg in de ochtend) kregen we meteen een ontbijtje aangeboden en was onze hotelkamer eerder klaar. Verder maakt het personeel gezellig een praatje met je, kunnen ze je van alles vertellen over de stad. Ze zijn heel behulpzaam en hebben ons geholpen met het vervoer voor onze verdere doorreis. Al met al zeker een dikke aanrader!

Possibly one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in! Kim and Jerry are the absolute best and will take care of you! We were even greeted with refreshing watermelon juice. I have never experienced a better level of customer service at a hotel. I booked this hotel as I had to give several workshops online and not only ensured I had a quiet room, but when I had a friend join me last minute, they even upgraded me for free to a family room with a nice big window. The set up is perfect for working and enough light if you have online meetings or trainings. They coordinated my airport transfer, laundry, booked an amazing massage for me at their spa and the buffet breakfast was incredible. No question went unanswered and if one of the employees did not know, they immediately found out. I truly felt at home and very pampered by the care and consideration that they showed me. I highly recommend it to anyone to stay there and will for sure stay again if I am ever in Hanoi. Thank you for everything and all the kindness you showed me.
review.comment_negative: There wasn't anything I didn't like

review.comment_positive:
This is the place for a great stay in Hanoi.
Super friendly staff that spoke excellent English and acknowledged you when you were in the room, whether you stopped and asked something or just passed by.

Breakfast was great too.

We will be back for sure.

Bester Service auf unserer Weltreise bisher! Wir kamen mehrmals in das Hotel auf unserer Reise zurück und wurden jedes Mal sehr herzlich empfangen, uns wurde mit diversen Anliegen geholfen und wir haben uns immer willkommen und zuHause gefühlt! Herausragendes Personal! Besser geht es nicht :)

review.rating: Strongly recommended to book if you wanna explore Hanois old quarter. Execsllent location, and in walking distance to mo

review.rating: Excellent stay with great customer service and hospitality that makes you feel at home
review.comment_positive: Excellent service and hospitality (Kudos to staff, Jerry and Kim for making our stay there very much welcome and at home). Location is good and easy accessibility to many tourist attractions.
review.comment_negative: Facilities including room and hotel areas are chic and acceptable, similar to a boutique type hotel. But don't except 4-5 star luxury type of facilities.

review.comment_positive: The best part is Grace and Justin.. make us feel like home. Will definitely recommend friends and relatives to this hotel in hanoi.

For us the Hotel was simply perfect. Starting from the rooms, which are clean with a very comfortable bed and good looking interior, to the breakfast with a variety of different foods and the exceptional service and friendliness of the whole staff. Especially Justin was very helpful and we had great conversations. We even cancelled another Hotel when we got to Hanoi for the second time because we enjoyed our stay here so much. The Hotel is located almost in the city center with lots of restaurants close by, but it was still very quiet in the rooms. The value for the money is really good, I honestly don't think you will get anything better for the price in Hanoi. Big recommendation for everyone.
review.comment_negative: Everything was great.

review.comment_positive: El alojamiento estaba bien cuidado y limpio, desayuno incluido muy bueno pero lo mejor de todo es el personal, te tratan siempre muy bien, especial mención a Dave el mejor recepcionista del mundo. Siempre ayudando, aconsejando con una sonrisa y se notaba que le gusta su trabajo!!! Este es un sitio donde te puedes sentir en casa y siempre bienvenido!!!

Great location super breakfast.Grace, Gerry were very helpful in arranging transport and trips for us everything very punctual and the cruise with MGloria delightful. All the staff were very friendly. Highly reccommend this hotel. Thank you it was a good start to our trip.

Staff were very welcoming and accommodating, helping organize transport from the airport as well as checking me in early. They do go the extra mile here and its a nice bonus. Room was nice and modern, decent sized and with a clean bathroom. There was no outside window, but it meant the room was quiet at night. Breakfast was great, amazing coffee and eggs prepared to your liking.

The staff were amazing and helpful! The staff helped book transfers and tours. Good location close to everything. Clean comfy bedrooms,  styled very nicely. Lovely breakfast in their sister hotel across the road. They even allowed us to use showers and rest room before our late night flight as we had already checked out.

review.comment_positive: Loved the service! Kindest people ever

Bữa sáng vừa đủ, vừa miệng, không gian thoáng.
Phòng ở cực sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh, rộng rãi 
Phục vụ chất lượng tốt. Đáng giá 5 sao
Sẽ quay lại khi ở HN
review.comment_negative: Hài lòng

review.rating: perfect hotel in the old quarter
review.comment_positive:
location is perfect in the old quarter yet the hotel is in a quiet spot
service is top notch!
breakfast is varied 
room was very comfy
review.comment_negative: you pay the tranquility with complete lack of view from the windows, but well worth it

review.comment_positive: 飯店位置、交通、早餐都很棒。飯店的接待人員非常非常讚。非常貼心的照顧客人。值得推薦

review.rating: Couldnt ask for anything more in a hotel.
review.comment_positive: Excellent service by all of the staff. Nothing was too much trouble. Breakfast was excellent. Such a wide variety to choose from. Location is great. Just a few minutes along from the lake.
review.comment_negative: If i had to be picky the bathroom door was a bit tricky to close.

review.comment_positive:
clean and quiet rooms although it is located in the centre of the old quarter. the location is perfect!

in addition, Jerry helped us with booking tours (Sapa, Halong Bay, streetfood tour) and transportation to Ninh Binh. you can always reach him and helps you with everything. he also gives good tips for exploring Hanoi. this is really an addition to your stay

review.rating: Great service clean and aesthetic hotel! Friendly staff.
review.comment_positive: We booked a one night stay with the hotel and was contacted via WhatsApp by the staff, David! We had troubles booking a cruise to halong bay but David was very helpful to secure an affordable and great cruise! Upon arrival, David and other staff was great at recommending places to visit and things to eat! Really enjoyed our stay although it was only for a day.
review.comment_negative: The aircon seems to have some issues and was a little hot in the room.

review.rating: I would definitely stay here each and every time in Hanoi. great service, clean and for the price.
review.comment_positive: the communication and helpfulness of the staff was amazing! the hotel is very well maintained and clean.  the food was great as well.
review.comment_negative: nothing not to like at all. the only issue was finding it the first time because i couldn’t see the sign, but after that it was easy.

review.rating: wonderful short stay in the Old Town centre
review.comment_positive: clean spacious room with comfy bed, amazing front desk staff to help us organise transport to cat ba, yummy breakfast.
Very good hotel, the staff is amazing!

Vi hade en jättebra hotellvistelse, bra läge och fina rum. Personalen var enastående, serviceinriktade  hjälpsamma och tillmötesgående. Det var en varierad och god frukostbuffé. Vi kan varmt rekommendera detta boendet och jag hoppas att vi en dag kan resa tillbaka och bo där igen. Ett stort tack till alla som jobbar på Hanoi emerald waters hotel valley.

The staff! Everyone knew us and were beyond nice. Justin at the front desk was so eager to help us plan activities and share his knowledge of the area. Grace at the front desk made check in and check out very accommodating and smooth. Would highly recommend this location.

sạch sẽ và thoáng mát
nhân viên dễ thương và nhiệt tình

Hospitality of Jerry, Grace and Ellie are fantastic. Ellie even spoke very well Chinese. They attended to all our needs with a smile and care. Location was great for food, shopping and sight seeing. Value for money...
review.comment_negative: Nothing particularly bad that we didn't like. Perhaps an area of improvement is to have a shower screen to prevent toilet bowl area to be wet when taking a shower.

review.comment_positive:
The hospitality is out of this world.Felt like home
Jerry ,tracy and dave and the entire staff are gems.
love them,helped us out with everything we could ask for.
Great location, staff couldn't of been more helpful. Upgraded us to a bigger room that was available. Breakfast was good.
Excelente ubicación, amabilidad de los trabajadores y nos han ayudado y recomendado muy buenas excursiones.
vị trí thuận tiện gần hồ gươm
review.comment_negative: giá hơi cao 1 tẹo

review.comment_positive:
Amazing location right by the old town and the lake, putting you within walking distance of pretty much all the attractions.

The staff were extremely accommodating and went out of their way to assist me with tours, transfers, and recommendations.

Lo mejor sin duda se este hotel ha sido el personal (Kim en nuestro caso) pero los incluyo a todos en esta mención, son inmejorables. En todo momento te ayudan si lo necesitas, se preocupan por ti y porque disfrutes de tu estancia en Hanoi.
En nuestro caso nos ayudaron con alguna excursión que hicimos y además nos organizaron el crucero por la bahía de Ha Long (con los mejores precios)
El hotel está muy bien ubicado, muy limpio y las habitaciones cómodas.
Sin duda repetiría si vuelvo a Hanoi.
review.comment_negative: Si tengo que decir algo que desmerece al hotel es la entrada, tiene un edificio delante y entras como por un pasillo, pero hasta eso se han preocupado de decorarlo y hacerlo un poco más agradable

review.comment_positive: clean, quiet, charming best breakfast

Hospitality par excellence. The room was neat & clean. Mr Jerry, the Manager and his staff were exceptionally good and cooperative. I recommend contacting Mr Jerry before arriving.Vietnam Sim card is very very cheap and handy and tour booke through the hotel are convenient.
review.comment_negative: The area is crowded but close to the lake and water Puppet show. However, the same is the case with all nearby hotels.Breakfast had limited for Indian Vegetarian

review.rating: Staff was exceptionally helpful! Especially Jerry! shout out to him! very helpful with everything, polite and profession
review.comment_positive:
excellent location and staff. 
diverse breakfast with excellent service.
The staff were amazing. Jerry, Grace and all of them were so proactive and set the gold standard for hotel staff everywhere. The tin was decent sized and clean
review.comment_negative: The entrance is a little dingy and the hotel feels a little claustrophobic... The room didn't have a window

review.comment_positive: Really helpful and committed staff!! Good breakfast with multiple options (Vietnamese/western breakfast), clean room. Perfect hotel to visite Hanoi.
review.comment_negative: the hotel has thin walls

review.comment_positive: The staff were super helpful (Jerry, Anna and David), I asked many questions and their energy of helping and responding never disappointed. The staff will help you with your needs to the best ability. David arranged a very well priced transfer to the airport for me with little notice. The hotel location is very well situated for exploring Hanoi. Breakfast was also good.
review.comment_negative:
The entrance of the hotel is not easily spotted for the first time. 
Room size felt smaller than what was listed.

review.comment_positive: beautiful rooms in a great location! super friendly, accommodating and helpful staff (shoutout to Jerry!) my colleagues and I had a great stay at the hotel. staff were very responsive and receptive to our needs. they packed us a breakfast to go during a day when we set out early, and were speedy at arranging all our needs for our stay, including getting a car and driver for a field trip

review.rating: Value for money and very conveniently located!
review.comment_positive:
For the price we paid:
1) Breakfast quality was great!
2) Very conveniently located, less than 5 mins walk to Hoan Kiem lake. And it was also directly opposite to Charming Travel - Dragonfly Cruise office where I booked the Ha Long Bay day trip from (Klook)! Super convenient when the bus dropped us off at their office.
3) Staffs were very polite and helpful! They could speak rly good English. Zero hurdle in communication. They were very prompt in their response when I wanted to book their airport pick up service (through booking.com chat function) and limousine transport to Tam Coc (through the recep).
review.comment_negative: None.

review.rating: Perfect accommodation in a great location, with the kindest staff!
review.comment_positive: The staff could not be kinder here! We only stayed one night between travel and they treated us like we were staying a week. Our room had been upgraded, they recommended restaurants and a great quiet spot on Train Street for seeing the train. Room was so clean, comfy and so quiet! And the breakfast in the morning was delicious and varied. Brilliant accommodation in Hanoi, couldn’t recommend more! Thank you Justin & Grace
Gần trung tâm. Nhân viên nhiệt tình trong hỗ trợ khách lưu trú. Các thiết bị cũng như dịch vụ trong phòng tốt. Giường êm và gối nằm rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The hotel staff was extraordinarily helpful, kind and knowledgeable about anything we expected from that hotel
review.comment_positive: extremely good
review.comment_negative: it would be wrong to mention anything that could have been blamed

review.rating: Un séjour exceptionnel dans cet hôtel. Nous n'aurions pas pu trouver mieux.
review.comment_positive:
Un personnel au top ! Les hôtesses et le responsable de l'hôtel, toujours souriants, étaient d'une gentillesse extrême. Nous avons réservé 3 fois cet hôtel, à chaque retour à Hanoï. Nous sommes allés les voir je ne sais combien de fois pour résoudre nos problèmes de location voitures pour nous rendre sur nos divers points de visite. Ils nous ont aussi conseillé sur les bons points de restauration à Hanoï.
Un très bon point aussi pour les petits déjeuners qui était un moment priviligié pour nous, buffet avec un très grand choix, pour tous les goûts.
Cet hôtel est très bien situé, très proche du vieux quartier. Nous avons pu tout faire à pieds.
Le personnel de cet hôtel est, au fil des jours,  devenu proche de nous, au point d'avoir créé entre nous un lien très amical,que nous garderons dans notre coeur. Cathy, Michel, Mathilde et Lola
review.comment_negative: Rien de nos a déplu. Tout était parfait.

review.comment_positive: 服務很好！早餐很好吃！房間很舒適！會想再回訪

review.rating: Fantastic stay, some of the best hotel staff I’ve ever experienced
review.comment_positive: The staff were absolutely exceptional, from check in to checkout I could not have asked for a better experience. Great value for your money, fantastic large breakfast spread. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Centrally located in Hanoi’s Old quarter it’s a perfect place to explore the city with many great restaurants just steps away.
review.comment_negative: Only complaint we had was the view from the room was looking at a concrete wall, far from the end of the world and definitely not a big concern.

review.comment_positive: nhân viên rất nhiệt tình và thân thiện. Mr Jerry đã giúp mọi việc thoải mái và dễ dàng hơn
Le personnel / l'emplacement
review.comment_negative: la fenêtre qui donne sur un mur

review.comment_positive: Good location and very helpful staff. Very clean.
Gentilezza e professionalità. Colazione buonissima e camera spaziosa. Posizione davvero ottima

review.rating: relaxing stay in the middle of old town
review.comment_positive:
nice location in the middle of the old town - night market not far away, as well as important sightseeing stops.
The room was clean, the bed comfortable.
The staff was super nice and helpful, always trying to make you feel welcomed and up for a little chat :) 
Breakfast was in another building of the hotel across the road - super delicious with a lot of variety.
sạch sẽ nhân viên phục vụ chu đáo
review.comment_negative: không có

review.comment_positive: La amabilidad de la gente y la ubicación.
review.comment_negative:
La entrada del Valley, decepciona un poco, pero no afecta a la estancia. 
La habitación Deluxe parecía más grande en las fotos pero estuvimos cómodos

review.comment_positive: Fabulous hotel, staff made us feel very welcome and they were ready to help with any queries. Great location Hoan Kiem lake. Nice room, comfy beds. Would definitely recommend.
review.comment_negative: Loved everything!

review.comment_positive:
Our days at the Emerald Waters hotel were perfect, from the warm welcome on the first day to the perfect organization of our excursion to Sapa. 
The room were quiet and clean, the breakfast varied and plentiful, and the services available were really good. We took our sim cards to the hotel, used the laundry service and asked for airport transfers, everything was always done perfectly! I really recommend this hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter to everyone. 
A special thanks to Kim whose kindness really made us feel at home, thanks also to all the staff always with a smile :)

The location is excellent, and the staff were wonderful. They knew every guest by name, and went out of their way to help. I needed medical assistance and a member of the team came with me to translate, which I appreciated so much. The rooms were nice and spacious.
review.comment_negative: There was no window in my room, and the corridors were quite loud. No street noise though, which is good.

review.comment_positive: Много приятен хотел на удобно място. От хотела ни направиха програма и посетихме всички забележителности, които бяхме набелязали. Голяба благодарност на Grace за нейното съдействие.

Na onze eerste geweldige ervaring zijn we weer naar het Emerald hotel gegaan. We dachten dat het niet beter kon,maar toch hebben ze ons verbaasd. Ze stonden allemaal klaar toen we binnen kwamen om ons te begroeten 🤩. Ook nog een upgrade gekregen van de kamer, echt geweldig.

Nogmaals bedankt en tot de volgende keer!
Perfect Location and Kindness. Nice breakfast.

extremely good service by all the hotel staff and super clean hotel. good breakfast with a decent variety of western and local food. Jerry was very kind to sit with us on our first day and give many good recommendations for day trips and a map of hanoi. Good shower facilities and clean room. The hotel staff even helped to liaise with our tour company because of the language barrier
review.comment_negative: nothing. everything was beyond expectations

review.comment_positive: Bữa sáng đơn giản, không nhiều món nhưng cũng tạm.
giá hợp lý, phòng rộng, sạch sẽ. nhân viên ok hướng dẫn đỗ xe nhiệt tình. có hỗ trợ đem đồ tận phòng.
review.comment_negative: tiếc là không để ý. phải đi vào bên trong tí. chứ khách sạn nằm ở mặt tiền thì hoàn hảo. nhưng đi tí thôi không sao. vào bên trong vẫn ok. được cái lối vào chụp hình khá đẹp

review.comment_positive: The friendliness of hotel staff and location
review.comment_negative: The room did not have a vieuw , but we knew that

review.comment_positive: Localização e acomodações confortáveis.
review.comment_negative: Quartos sem janela.

review.rating: great room , facilities and location. Staff was amazing
review.comment_positive: property had everything we need , great location, very good breakfast and clean and comfortable room! The highlight was the staff who were very kind and always wanted to help!! many thanks to Dave and Ellie from the staff of the hotel that helped us in our staying in Hanoi!!

The hotel was very well located and the room was a good size. The staff were some of the kindest we met across our whole trip. 

The breakfast buffet was nice, but it is located in the sister hotel across the road, which is slightly inconvenient when in a hurry.
review.comment_negative:
The bathroom was very small. 

The beds were hard, but this was common across all of the hotels we stayed at in Vietnam.

review.comment_positive: The location was great and the service impeccable. Jerry and Dave were very helpful and I would return here when I visit Hanoi again

review.rating: Excellent, quiet hotel in downtown Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Centrally located in a quiet alley, it was absolutely silent at night. Our triple room was large, very well equipped. The staff was super kind and helpful. Breakfast choice and quality was good. I wish we stayed longer!
review.comment_negative: The aircon in our room was not working properly.

review.comment_positive: Le personnel de l’hôtel est incroyable, très attentionné et serviable. L’hôtel est joli, propre et très bien situé. Expérience fantastique !
The staff was very nice

review.rating: really nice room with good location and air conditioning
review.comment_positive: really convenient location, close to Hoan Kiem Lake
review.comment_negative: the breakfast was in their sister hotel across the street which was a bit inconvenient. Didn’t have a mini fridge.

review.comment_positive: Posizione e gentilezza dello staff

review.rating: We enjoyed our stay very much. Thank you for your hospitality!:)
review.comment_positive: Service was excellent. We were warmly welcomed by the staff of the hotel. They gave us recommendations on places to go and visit. On my last day, the staff saw me buying a packet of beef jerky to take home, and he bought me another packet!
review.comment_negative: The shower did not have shower curtains so when we took a shower the water would splash out to make the rest of the bathroom floor slippery.

review.rating: 하노이 도심에 머문 호텔 중 최고였어요
review.comment_positive:
도심이라 위치가 좋고 
도로에서 아주 조금 들어가 있어서 차량 소음이 없어 평화로웠습니다.
직원들이 매우 친절하고 편안했고 방 청소도 바닥까지 매일 깔끔했어요 best hotel and wanna come again
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.comment_positive: ที่ตั้ง ดี พนักงานต้อนรับดี

review.rating: mọi thứ đều rất rất ok
review.comment_positive: phòng đẹp
review.comment_negative: trong ngõ

review.comment_positive:
Jerry and the team were AMAZING! so helpful, they looked after us with booking a trip to Ha long bay, airport transfers, kind with a late checkout when my wife took a fall, and so friendly every time we saw them. 
breakfast was delicious too. 
Keep up the good work, your make Emerald water Hotel amazing.
review.comment_negative: nothing.

review.comment_positive: The staff was really nice, the location perfect and the room pretty spacious (the bed was HUGE) 😊

C’était un établissement très accueillant et chaleureux.
Le personnel aux petits soins pour ces clients.
Probablement l’un des meilleurs rapport qualité prix d’Hanoï.
Nous y retournerons

Het hotel was mooi, verzorgd en netjes. De kamers waren schoon, ruim en de bedden lagen heerlijk. Ook werden de kamers elke dag schoongemaakt. Het personeel was ontzettend vriendelijk en helpen je echt met alles! Ze hebben voor ons de taxi's, dagtrip en verdere vervoer geregeld. We zijn zelfs nog een tweede keer teruggeweest, omdat het hotel zo goed beviel. Het ontbijt is erg uitgebreid en verzorgd. De locatie is ideaal. Alle leuke dingen in Old Quarter zijn op loopafstand. Het hotel is verder rustig gelegen, dus je ervaart weinig geluiden van buitenaf. Een echte aanrader!
review.comment_negative: Niks

review.rating: Very comfortable hotel in excellent location
review.comment_positive: Great breakfast, friendly and helpful staff, very comfortable and really well located. Would not hesitate to recommend!
lovely staff, nice location, nice rooms because the building is pretty new
review.comment_negative: no Netflix on TV, no great view because the building is behind another building

review.comment_positive: Everything was great !!

review.rating: wir hatten einen sehr tollen Aufenthalt, sehr nettes und hilfsbereites Personal. Sonderwünsche (z. B. Genurtstagstorte u
review.comment_positive: Sehr gute Lage, super Personal, Zimmer ruhig und schön
Het hotel is heel centraal gelegen in de oude wijk. Het personeel is super vriendelijk. Geen enkele vraag is hen te veel. Ontbijt is heel uitgebreid, vers en lekker. Ook hier is de bediening top.
review.comment_negative: We hadden een kamer zonder venster. Het was wel heerlijk stil omdat we op de 6de verdieping aan de achterkant van de straat sliepen.

review.comment_positive: reception was very pleasant and helpful.

review.rating: A nice hotel in the heart of the city, which you will always remember
review.comment_positive: The location is great, very close to Hoan Kiem Lake. It's a buzzing zone, with a lot of people coming and going, and where you can have your Bahn My in tables at the street, without any problem. The hotel is very comfortable. The room we got was well-decorated and the bathroom well-equipped. The breakfast was very abundant and the food was tasty. The staff was very helpful, always with a smile, they made everything smooth.
review.comment_negative: The only thing we didn't like was the view from the room, which was a wall, very close to the window... but if I had to sacrifice something in a hotel, maybe it would be that.

review.rating: Great little gem, with fantastic staff and close to everything in old town.
review.comment_positive:
Absolutely great stay - the best thing of course is the staff, the staff and the manager were treating us like royalty and helped us organise everything that we wanted. Thank you again so much for everything !!

The room itself was also great, comfortable and most of all, very silent, given the great location which is literally 3 min from hoan kiem and inside old town. I can only highly recommend this cosy and nice little hotel (and the breakfast was excellent, too!)
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive: Khách sạn ở mức tạm ổn, không có gì quá nổi trội.
Hotel is situated in a good location. A lot of places that were on our itinerary were either a short walk or short ride away. Staff were extremely welcoming and friendly.
review.comment_negative: The toilet does not have a divider/door that separates the shower from the rest of the toilet. So, toilet floor will be wet after a shower. Will be great if there is a holder in the shower to put our toiletries.

review.rating: Ich habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt und komme definitiv wieder!
review.comment_positive:
Noch nie habe mich in einem Hotel so wohl und willkommen gefühlt. Das Team ist außergewöhnlich nett, hilfsbereit und zuvorkommend. 
Immer ehrlich und interessiert, mit guten Tipps für Restaurants, Märkte und Unternehmungen.
Justin, Grace und alle anderen sind mir im Laufe der Zeit sehr ans Herz gewachsen.
Ich habe jetzt Familie in Hanoi 😄

Das Hotel ist ein Juwel und die Lage einfach perfekt. Ich habe jede Nacht sehr gut geschlafen und es hat einfach an nichts gemangelt. 
Ich hatte eigentlich nicht vor zu frühstücken, aber das Frühstück ist ein wirkliches Highlight. 
Es blieb kein Wunsch offen. Das Buffet ist reichhaltig, wird immer wieder frisch bestückt und auf Wunsch werden Eierspeisen und Suppen frisch zubereitet. 

Ich freue mich auf meinen nächsten Besuch, das Essen und die Menschen Vietnams.
review.comment_negative: Mein Zimmer hatte nur ein sehr kleines Fenster ohne Ausblick. Das ist aber der Lage geschuldet und verschmerzbar.

review.comment_positive:
Amazing Amazing Staff! They went out of their way to help even for small small things. I really wish them good luck in life!
Great location! - Happening streets, cafe's , restaurants, lake - everything is at walkable distance.
review.comment_negative: Nothing as such. The warmth with how staff treats and helps you makes any cons not so important.

review.comment_positive: Địa điểm gần & thuận tiện đi lại. Có nhiều quán ăn, Café xung quanh, đi dạo các phố xung quanh rất thuận tiện
review.comment_negative: Hài lòng với mọi thứ ở đây.

review.comment_positive: Centrally located. Very kind and helpful staff. They helped us with a lot of things including arranging travel to Halong Bay!
Ruime en schone kamers. Fijne locatie in oude centrum Hanoi. Zeer vriendelijk personeel waarvoor niets teveel gevraagd is.

review.rating: I and 16 members of our family from Thailand recently had the pleasure of staying at the Emerald Water Hotel and I coul
review.comment_positive: 5/5 service
review.comment_negative: none

review.comment_positive: 櫃檯服務人員非常棒，詳細講解內容，服務熱誠非常好

review.rating: If I go back to Hanoi I will definitely come here
review.comment_positive: the excellent location but above all the kindness of the staff, especially the receptionist Kim, always with a smile ,ready to give us valuable advice

colazione eccellente.
staff impeccabile e super cordiale. 
posizione top !!

review.rating: Customer service and more service and great location.
review.comment_positive: Customer service was second to none and location was great. This hotel has to have the friendliest most sincere staff I have ever encountered. As a last gesture they paid for my car to the airport. I cannot recommend this hotel high enough. Will see them next year.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast and spa across the street and I unfortunately broke my leg before the trip. While this could have  been a deal killer it was not because the staff would have carried me up and down the stairs if they had to. They also helped me cross the street and walked my wife to the hair salon down the street.

review.rating: Great little hidden gem with great service all around
review.comment_positive:
Very attentive and friendly staff who go the extra mile to help you plan your stay to make it as comfortable as possible. 
If it is preparing a day trip, a late-night request due to unforeseen circumstances  or other requests this hotel tackles it with agility, warmness, and professionalism 

Other perks:
-Rooms and facility is brand new and in pristine condition due to it being new
-Well-rounded breakfast buffet with a considerable choice of different food and beverages.
review.comment_negative: Since I like sleeping in I would have enjoyed it if the breakfast would be extended until 10 am instead of 9.30 am. However, this is a minor inconvenience.

review.rating: Lovely stay, so thankful to the staff for a great experience!
review.comment_positive: The staff were great and so friendly! The breakfast was good which they escorted us to at the sister restaurant across the road! The room was good value for money
review.comment_negative: Nothing!

review.comment_positive: Nhân viên lễ tân thân thiện
The Bed is amazing! Nice interior Design..

Cosy little hotel with excellent location and super friendly staff. The room was nicely decorated and clean and quiet. Would definitely stay again just for the service, the nicest and warmest welcome ever!
素晴らしいホスピタリティで皆さん親切。部屋は良くコーディネートされていて快適、水周りも良く湯量も十分。道路に面しておらず静かです。街の中心部なので観光にも移動にも便利。朝食は道を渡った系列ホテルで食べますがメニューは豊富で美味しいです。チェックアウト後も荷物を預かって貰え、夜行バスの時間まで安心です。
review.comment_negative: 道路に面してはいないので展望は無い。

review.rating: Jerry and his team have made the whole stay at Hanoi super welcoming and comfortable. They were extremely helpful and ga
review.comment_positive: The staff at the hotel was welcoming and extremely helpful and the buffet breakfast spread was sumptuous.
review.comment_negative: A little bit difficult to locate if you are first time there.

review.comment_positive: very nice and helpful stuff, clean room, great location, everything was perfect
10 stars to the reception girls ! Always smiling and clear Hanoi intro.
review.comment_negative: the entrance is easy to miss

review.comment_positive: Staff...rooms and breakfast
review.comment_negative: Nothing to dislike everything was perfect

review.comment_positive: Dịch vụ ở mức khá. Lễ tân làm việc cũng được.

Everyone from staff was exceptionally kind, helpful and genuinely interested to make our stay comfortable and fun. Special compliments to the amazing Kim with whom we interacted the most and she went above and beyond to make sure we are having a memorable honeymoon trip. Our stay felt like being at home and surrounded with friends. 
Super location - central but not crazy busy. Nice rooms.
review.comment_negative: N/a

review.comment_positive: Hanoi ist zu laut
review.comment_negative: Hanoi ist viel zu laut!

review.rating: probably the best value for money/location/food/room in Hanoi
review.comment_positive:
We have visited quite many hotels in Vietnam and, in general, worldwide. This one was one of the best experiences that will remain in our memory for a long time.

We really want to thank all the staff members, especially mr. Jerry. He together with the colleagues have made our stay extremely pleasant, the best level of customer service! We will definitely come back to this hotel if we decide to ever come back to Hanoi.

Another huge bonus was breakfast, despite the fact that the restaurant is situated in the hotel across the road - the food has always been best we could find in Vietnam.

Thanks a lot to everyone for the attention, the best quality of service and positive vibe, have a wonderful New Year!
review.comment_negative:
this is more of a local “feature”, the room has windows with no view, but probably you can ask for a room
with balcony, overall it wasn’t a problem for us

review.rating: 下次再來河內會願意回訪
review.comment_positive: 房間很舒適！很用心桌上跟廁所都會放鮮花💐很有儀式感！大廳櫃檯的服務員都很親切！住的很舒服！早餐很豐盛，住了5天也不會覺得膩！也很好吃😋
Clean, helpful staff, good breakfast at the sister hotel
review.comment_negative: Windows seemed to always look onto a wall

review.comment_positive:
Lo mejor sin lugar a dudas es el personal, especialmente Grace que estuvo pendiente en todo momento de que nuestra estancia fuese inmejorable. 
Nunca me habían tratado tan bien en un hotel :).
review.comment_negative: Lo único que no nos convenció fue la falta de ventana, la habitación disponía solamente de un pequeño tragaluz. Si vas a ir al hotel solamente a dormir, te recomiendo este hotel sin ninguna duda: la ubicación es perfecta y el personal es encantador.

review.comment_positive:
Soon after I booked this hotel, they responded with my emails promptly and kindly. They arranged taxis for me and prepared breakfast to take out very early morning. 
The welcome drink was very refreshing for me after a long journey. 
The lady at the reception was very kind enough to show me all the way to Water Puppet Show, ATM and a restaurant.

우선 모든 직원분들이 너무너무 친절하셨습니다.
제가 새벽비행기라고하니 오전에 체크아웃 후 밤에  공항가기전에 샤워할수 있게 배려해주셔서(수건도 제공해 주심) 밤뱅기타기전에 샤워하고 편하게 갔습니다. 제가 따로 예약한 택시를 탈때까지 기사분께 잘데려다 달라고 베트남어로 말씀하시며 끝까지 챙겨주셨어요!.방도 깔끔하고 조식도 좋았습니다.
다음번에 또 하노이에 가게된다면 다시 머물고 싶어용!
review.comment_negative:
제가머문 방은 창문이 없었습니다.
창문이 없는것 치곤 공기도 쾌적하고 나쁜 점은 없었으나 예민하신분들은  답답하게 느껴지실수도 있습니다! ( 대다수 올드쿼터 지역 숙소가 창문이 없는 곳이 많아서 ...)

review.comment_positive: The service of the attendant, Grace really impressed me. She always smile and try to help.  Helping us take our luggage into the car and kindly said goodbye to us.

-Hotel in zentraler Lage/ ca. 5 Minuten zu Fuß vom Hoan Kiem Lake entfernt
-die Zimmer sind vollumfänglich ausgestattet und man bekommt den Straßenverkehr nicht mit 
-Frühstück bietet sowohl lokale als auch westliche Produkte
Größter Pluspunkt:
-die Mitarbeiter! Wir wurden vor Ort zunächst über die Sehenswürdigkeiten und die besten Restaurants/ Streetfoodspots gebrieft. Weiterhin wurden uns gute Ausflüge (NinhBinh/ Halong Bay) angeboten. Das Preis/Leistungsverhältnis war ausgezeichnet. Im Internet konnte ich die Reisen (mit dem Komfort) nicht günstiger buchen. 
Weiterhin konnten wir unser schweres Gepäck für die zweitägige Halong Bay Reise im Hotel sicher abstellen. 
Am Abreisetag wurde uns zu einem sehr erschwinglichen Preis ein Shuttle zum Flughafen organisiert. Auch dieser war deutlich günstiger als man ihn als Tourist im Internet bzw. Transportserviceapps hätte buchen können.

Tout.
Le personnel était adorable.
Toujours là pour rendre votre séjour au top.
Merci à Grace qui a été d'une incroyable gentillesse et d'une aide précieuse. 🫶
Merci pour tout
review.comment_negative: Rien

review.comment_positive: nv thân thiện phòng đẹp ạ 😊

friendly and helpful staff with good customer service 
nice and spacious room and good location
review.comment_negative: nothing I did not know before the booking, a window would have been nice but for the price I think this is fine. having the shower and the toilet in same space can be a bit messy.

review.comment_positive: Everything :) especially the staff! Jerry and Kim treat you like family! The beds were  VERY comfortable!!
review.comment_negative: Not a major problem but would be nice to have a partition between shower and WC

review.comment_positive: The hotel was very clean. It was finished construction before the pandemic so it’s just opened. Right in the corner of the Old Quarter and near all the attractions in Hanoi. The staff there, especially Huy Dao (Jerry) was super friendly and supportive even before our stay there!
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.comment_positive:
家族旅行で行きました。部屋も水回りもとてもきれいで、水圧も問題なく、すごく快適に過ごせました。エアコンの効きも良かったです。ふとんもフカフカで、疲れているのもあったかもしれませんが爆睡出来ました。
毎日1人ずつ水1本が無料で支給され、チェックイン時に受付では周囲のお店のオススメや、ナイトマーケットの開催場所・時間を教えてくれたりととても親切で感動しました！
あと、朝ごはんがめちゃくちゃ美味しかったです。笑
ビュッフェスタイルで、3日泊まりましたが毎日少しずつ違うメニューがあったり、フォーも無料で注文出来たりと飽きることなく美味しく頂けました。（毎日次の日の朝ごはんを楽しみにしながら寝てました）泊まることがあれば、朝ごはんの時にベトナム式アイスコーヒー（濃いめのコーヒーと、下にコンデンスミルクの層ができてるインスタ映えなカフェでした笑）が美味しかったので、ぜひ頼んでみてください、、、！

最終日のチェックアウト後も、ホテルの受付の方がいつでも戻ってきたい時に戻ってきていいよ〜荷物も置いといていいし、ラウンジで休んでくれてもいいし、暑かったらシャワーもあるからね！と元気いっぱいに送り出してくれました。空港に向かう前にラウンジに戻ると、シャワー浴びていくでしょ？空港のピックアップは何時？と本当に至れり尽くせりで、何よりもスタッフの方々の対応が素晴らしすぎました。最高のおもてなしでした。次ハノイに行く時は是非また利用させて頂きたいです。本当に楽しい旅になりました、ありがとうございました！
review.comment_negative: ありません。120点！

review.rating: Everyone here is polite and nice. The service is 5 star! I would definately choose here if I come back to Hanoi again.
review.comment_positive: The heart warming reception and service.Especially Justin in the front desk, really passionate and heartwarming,made us feel like home right away.
review.comment_negative: None

review.comment_positive: khách sạn mới, sạch

review.rating: The hotel is close to Hoan Kiem Lake where you can take some exercise or just enjoy the views. it is right in the centre
review.comment_positive:
The staff at the hotel were amazing. Nothing was too much trouble for them.
Ms Kim and Ms Grace at the front desk were so warm and welcoming. I would definitely stay here again.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
I have couple of day of business in Hanoi, and this is best location. It’s in a small alley but it’s ok, you got more than what you paid
Just couple of step, you arrive to the Hanoi Old Quarter and reach to everywhere
Will definately comeback

Wir hatten mit unserem 4-jährigen Sohn einen super Aufenthalt im Hanoi Emerald Water Hotel. Besonders hervorzuheben ist die spitzen Lage um die Old Town zu erkunden und das Personal, welches sehr aufmerksam uns hilfsbereit war (z.B. Empfehlungen für Cafés und Restaurants, oder bei der Buchung von Transfers und Ausflügen). Auch das Frühstück war sehr lecker und es gab viel Auswahl.

The staff really made our stay. They were SO helpful, even helping us make an itinerary, and really met our every need! We booked last minute after reading some poor reviews of our previously booked hotel and are so glad we changed!
the staff especially jerry . they gave my son a birthday cake and came up to the room to celebrate. Jerry arranged all the transport and our tour to Halong Bay perfectly.
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.comment_positive: die Ruhe im Zentrum der Stadt, der Komfort, das Frühstück und schon wieder das sehr freundliche und professionelle Personal

친절했던 직원들
맛있는 조식
좋은 위치
깨끗한 객실과 
체크아웃 후에도 짐을 맏아주고 씻을 수 있는 시설을 제공해주는 점 모두 좋았습니다.

review.rating: Very accommodating staffs and pleasant stay
review.comment_positive: Grace and her team were exceptional and friendly. They were very fluent so communication wasn’t an issue. They constantly provided us with recommendations of where to go in Hanoi as well as helping us with communication barriers with the locals.

review.rating: Fantastic place for your stay in Hanoi !
review.comment_positive: The personnel was so amazingly kind! They helped us with really everything! Jerry and his team made our holiday complete. The location of the hotel is great. Hotel in general is very good, comfortabel rooms and very hygienic. We highly recommend this hotel
review.comment_negative: None

review.rating: overall, it was a great stay!
review.comment_positive: Jerry and Kim are such great hosts. They went all out to ensure that we had a comfortable stay in the hotel.
review.comment_negative: Lack of windows.

review.comment_positive: I had an absolutely amazing stay. Grace and Justin and everyone on the team took care of all of my needs quickly. Staff had recommendations for anything I needed and would book any massages or taxi rides as soon as I requested. Grace helped me book all of my tours before I arrived and had everything organized every day, I barely had to do any more of my own planning which was so nice. Very convenient location surrounded by multiple businesses and walking distance to attractions in the Old Quarter. The room was spacious and cleaned everyday when I got back from sightseeing. I travel frequently and this has been one of the most memorable stays I’ve ever had thanks to the kindness and hospitality of the staff, they truly go above and beyond. Next time I am in Hanoi I will stay here again!
review.comment_negative: N/A

review.comment_positive:
정말 저렴한 가격에 비해 조식도 맛있고 깔끔하게 잘 나오고 방도 청결하고 비품이 잘 구비되어 있었습니다.
(예를 들면 수건, 드라이기(바람 잘나옴), 바디워시, 샴푸(린스 없음), 실내화, 옷걸이, 냉장고(시원한지 모르겠음), 금고)

좀 일찍 갔는데 웰컴티 주시고 체크 인 하기 전까지 짐 맡겨둘수 있었습니다. 퇴실 날도 시간이 많이 남았었는데 짐 맡겨두고 안쪽 로비에서 휴식을 취할 수 있었습니다.

물이나 수건이나 추가로 필요한게 생겼을때 말씀 드리면 바로 더 주시고 에어컨도 시원하게 잘 나와서 편하게 잘 수 있었습니다.

방 정리는 원할때만 해주셔서 문고리에 걸어두는게 있어서 좋았습니다.

단점을 굳이 하나 꼽자면 창문이 있지만 밖이 안보이는거? 거의 없다고 생각하시면 됩니다(2인방 사용기준)
그런데 그것도 저는 없는게 오히려 더 마음편하게 머물수 있었던거 같아요. 방도 조용했고

 비 오는지 안오는지는 확인 할 수 없었지만 조식 먹으러 길건너 반대쪽 건물에 갈때는 왔다갔다 우산도 직접 씌워주시고

직원분께서 주변 맛집이나 환전 같이 필요한 부분들도 세심하게 설명해주셨습니다.

만점을 드린 이유중에 직원분들의 친절함이 가장 큰 것 같습니다.

공항에 왔다갔다 할때는 픽업 서비스를 추가요금 내고 신청해서 했는데 훨씬 편하고 저렴하여 좋았습니다.

수영은 원래 안해서 수영장 없는게 괜찮았지만 수영이 목적이라면 적합하지 않습니다.

그런데 성수기 였음에도 정말 가격에 비해 퀄리티가 좋아서 저는 하노이에 다시 간다면 이곳으로 갈거같이요.

덕분에 잘 쉬다갑니다. 감사합니다❣️

Absolutely wonderful stay here, the most hospitable hotel we've been to after 4+ months of travelling. Justin and his wife Grace (front desk staff) were absolutely wonderful and we made great friends with them. The location is perfect, walking distance to most things to see within the old town and French quarter. 
Internet was great, we had zoom calls to take for work and there was no problems at all. Breakfast was delicious!

Incredible staff, really friendly and here to make your trip the best experience possible ! ❤️ location was also perfect
review.comment_negative: humidity was the main inconvenience, and the sound isolation of the room

review.comment_positive: The hotel is a hidden gem thru a beautifully painted alley way. We are so grateful to Grace and her team for helping us with travel arrangements, booking extensions, and thoughtfulness in their service and follow-up. Rooms are very clean, new. Breakfast was across the street at sister hotel and had the basics like good pho and fresh made eggs.
review.comment_negative: There are no windows with view and that’s probably a good thing to keep away all the noise even in a central location.

review.rating: Quiet hotel in the center of Hanoi Old Quarter, reasonable price and exceptional staffs
review.comment_positive: The hotel is very clean, the room was well-designed so you'll find everything you need inside. The staff is what made the hotel exceptional, they put in extra efforts to make sure your stay is comfortable and to satisfy all your needs. Should you need anything, you only have to tell them, they will do everything to help you. My family arrived much earlier than the check-in hour, the staffs invited us to go have breakfast (at a discounted price) while they prepare the rooms asap so we can receive our rooms 5 hours in advance, to rest after a long flight. They propose us lots of options for tours in Hanoi and other cities in Vietnam, at a reasonable price. The staffs are all very polite and try their bests to help us. All in all I'd recommend this hotel to anyone who want to stay in the center of Hanoi, but prefer a quiet place to sleep at night. The breakfast are also good, you'll get authentic Vietnamese dishes like Pho Ga, Pho Bo, Banh Cuon, freshly made by the chef. Personally I love all the Vietnamese dishes and the Vietnamese coffee (Ca Phe Sua Da), but you also have european options like pastries (croissants, pain au chocolat, pain aux raisins), bread butter & jam. Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
Jerry is a superstar. 
Well before we arrived, Jerry communicated with us and allowed us to drop our luggage off and have breakfast before check in (we arrived in Hanoi at 5.30am). He even offered us a shower! 
The breakfast was the best we've had... Vietnamese,Cantonese and European. 
Fresh salads, veg and fruits, delicious Pho and good coffee. 
Alex assisted me at the pharmacy when I needed certain medication. 
Jerry assisted with booking a great day trip out to Ninh Binh. 
My partner is very tall so we were offered a bigger bed. 
Super Star staff.
review.comment_negative: The only thing was the room had no window BUT it did mean we had excellent sleeps with no external light or noise.... So. Not all bad in the end!

review.comment_positive: 도착전날부터 Customer service Manager Justin분이 웰컴톡을  보내주시고  룸업그레이드해주셨고 모든 직원분들이 매우 친절하셨다. 비행시간이 늦으면 샤워하고 갈 수 있다고 안내해주시고 물도 챙겨주시는 등 체크아웃이후에도 호텔을 떠날때까지 매우 친절하셔서 고마웠음 . 다만 변기가 고정이 안되어 움직임이 느껴져서 좀 불편했고 호텔입구를 놓치기 쉬운 점이 다소 아쉬웠다.
La cordialità e la disponibilità di Jerry e del suo staff, ci hanno aiutato ad organizzare il nostro soggiorno con vari tour.

review.rating: It's a great hotel. I would definitely choose to stay one more time.
review.comment_positive: The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. They helped me find a parking space. And I was given a welcome drink which I didn't get from a 5-star hotel.
review.comment_negative: The hand-held shower head cannot be turned on. But the other two are working fine. I am not sure if it's because I don't know how to use it or because it's broken. I didn't call the front desk to take a look because I came back late and wanted to rest soon. If it's not broken, maybe giving us an instruction sign would be great.

review.comment_positive: Grace and her team are absolutely fantastic....the best customer service and hospitality I have experienced in Vietnam...

Un grand merci à Jerry et à sa collaboratrice pour l’accueil et l’aide qu’ils nous ont apporté tout au long du séjour ! Ils sont vraiment adorables et très serviables. 
Les chambres sont biens. 
Très bon petit déjeuner avec des fruits frais. 
Rapport qualité/prix imbattable. 
Super séjour !
Personnel très sympathique, serviable et plein de bon conseil
Fantastic staff
Velmi milý a ochotný personál. Bohaté snídaně (ač bylo nutné přejít na snídani do hotelu přes ulici). Pokoje čisté a moderní. Lokalita skvělá.

Echt hele lieve mensen die je overal mee willen helpen. Een schone kamer die voldeed aan alle verwachtingen. Hele goede locatie in de stad en het ontbijt is heel uitgebreid en lekker. Massage die je aan de overkant kunt doen is heerlijk en aan te raden.
review.comment_negative: Niets.

review.rating: Emerald Waters Hotel Valley - super place
review.comment_positive: Everything about the hotel was just what we wanted
review.comment_negative: Not applicable

review.comment_positive:
Location is amazing. Only 3 mins walk from the lake and directly within the old quarter. 

All staff were very friendly. They helped with the booking of my Sapa bus and also offered to help with booking tours. 

I was allowed to take a shower before taking the night bus which was very kind.
review.comment_negative: We arrived at 3pm and our rooms were not ready and we had to wait to get into our rooms. Would have appreciated if they had offered us another room as the hotel didn't seem fully booked.

review.rating: good, clean hotel located very near Hoan Kiem
review.comment_positive: comfortable bed, clean quiet room, good location, friendly and helpful staff
review.comment_negative: the hose for the bidet burst in the night and started to flood the bathroom, which we turned off and couldn’t get repaired before we left

review.comment_positive: The staff was quite helpful. We had an issue at the time of check in - but the manager Jerry and the front desk lead Grace were very supportive. They didn't just sort out the issue but went out of their way to make us feel valued. It's a cozy quaint place for a couple / small family. Perfect for walking down to multiple sightseeing places in Hanoi - Hoan Kiem lake, walking street (if you are luckily here on a Sunday), Opera House, etc.

Small boutique hotel in a great location. The rooms are a good size and well maintained. Breakfast was included at another hotel and provided good variety. The staff were exceptional, especially Grace and Justin who took such great care of us. We were upgraded to a suite on our last night which was a lovely surprise. This hotel delivers so much more than its cost and we would highly recommend
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive:
Property is centrally located and walkable to the water puppet show and other markets around , 
Staff Kim was very helpful and really cared for the guest
review.comment_negative: When I first arrived at the hotel , the entrance to the property is very narrow , but once you are inside it’s amazing

review.rating: Perfect hotel om te verblijven in Hanoi
review.comment_positive: Het personeel is super vriendelijk! De kamers zijn heel proper.
review.comment_negative: Alles was tiptop!

review.rating: The perfect stay in the Capital.
review.comment_positive: This was our second stay at this hotel because we loved the last so much. If you are reading this review trying to decide on a nice hotel, we couldn’t recommend this one enough. The hotel is immaculate with nice rooms. They have all of the little touches needed and extras to aid your travels (such as scales for your suitcases ect). The breakfast is brilliant, with a mix of different foods (They have bacon friends!). But the main appeal really is the staff. We couldn’t really pick any out because they are all fantastic, we were greeted on our return with “welcome home” and that’s just how it felt. We came to this hotel to see the sites but felt like we left with new friends. A true gem on a great location. Don’t change a thing guys, this is about our 15th hotel in Asia and I said it before, but I’ll say it again, this is undoubtedly the best place we have stayed in Asia without question. The truth is, their prices should be higher. Just book your stay. You won’t regret it. Thank you all so much for your hard work and we hope to see you all again soon!

review.rating: 性价比极高的四星酒店

review.rating: An amazing stay in Hanoi made perfect by the staff!
review.comment_positive: Hanoi Emerald Waters was the perfect place to stay in Hanoi. It’s really close to the centre of town, has spotless rooms/facilities and a great breakfast. But the best part of our stay was the amazing hospitality shown by Grace and Justin - they truly made our stay and we wouldn’t stay anywhere else if we came back to Hanoi. From the start of our stay until the end, they were so accommodating and friendly and helped to make our trip so special. We’d recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Hanoi and would love to come back in the future!

review.comment_negative: Out of rooms so had to move;).

review.comment_positive:
I have travelled the world. This is one of the most unforgottable hotels in my life. Every hotel staff was super friendly, always greeted me with smile and took care of me with sincere  attitude. The location is perfect to explore Hanoi. Breakfast is omg... for the price I paid, I cannot complain any single thing. I was wondering why this hotel was highly evaluated before check-in and now I joined a fan club of this hotel. 

If you want to experience the best hospitality, excellent breakfast, wonderful location and even affordable price, this is for you! (They even offered us to have a free shower after checkout.)

Last but not least, I especially thank Tracy who helped us get a taxi to the airport in the last minute. If I come back to this hotel, it will be because of her!!

review.comment_positive: absolutely kind and lovely staff - Jerry, Dave & Jack. they went beyond and made our stay in Hanoi so wonderful! Jerry was really helpful in recommending & arranging our cruise tour to Ha Long Bay and allowed us to stay & wash up in the lobby when our night bus from Sapa arrived at 4am. Room was clean & very comfortable! Really enjoyed our stay in this hotel.

review.rating: Incredible staff, ideally located. Every penny worth it.
review.comment_positive:
I recently had the pleasure of spending my honeymoon at the exquisite Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley, and I must say that it exceeded all our expectations. From the moment we arrived until the day of our departure, the hotel staff went above and beyond to ensure our stay was nothing short of extraordinary.

Impeccable Service:
The hospitality and warmth displayed by the hotel staff were truly remarkable. Despite our early arrival, the staff graciously accommodated us by allowing an early check-in at 9 AM instead of the usual 3 PM. To further compensate for the inconvenience of waiting, they kindly provided us with a complimentary and delectable breakfast. This thoughtful gesture immediately made us feel valued as guests.

Assistance and Responsiveness:
During our stay, we decided to book a cruise through the hotel. The staff efficiently handled the arrangements, and we were thoroughly impressed with the experience. Notably, their availability and attentiveness were commendable. On one occasion, when our transportation from the cruise was delayed, the manager personally ensured we were safely returned to the hotel. This level of dedication and prompt assistance greatly enhanced our overall impression of the hotel.

Ideal Location:
Hanoi Emerald Waters Hotel Valley boasts a prime location, making it an ideal choice for exploring the city. Situated close to the main city area, we found it convenient to visit various attractions on foot. Whether it was strolling through the Old Quarter, discovering local markets, or enjoying the vibrant nightlife, everything was easily accessible from the hotel. This central location undoubtedly added value to our stay and saved us valuable commuting time.

Exquisite Rooms:
The spacious and immaculate rooms at the hotel were a haven of comfort. The elegant decor and tasteful furnishings exuded a sense of luxury, perfectly complemented by modern amenities. The attention to detail in maintaining cleanliness was impeccable. It was evide
review.comment_negative: Nothing to dislike. The rooms are smaller in size and don't offer any views but I hardly cared. I only needed hotels to rest, views are anyway overrated in my opinion.

review.rating: Room is clean. Location is great. Staffs are very helpful. The is nothing to complain about!
review.comment_positive:
1. The location of the hotel is right in the old quarter which is one of the most popular areas to visit in Hanoi, so there is no need to get a cab.  
2. The rooms are ones of the cleanest hotels I have ever stayed. And it is so quiet that you won’t be able to hear the horn sounds from motorbikes or cars outside the hotel.
3. One of the major reasons I speak highly of this hotel is that the service and helps from the staffs are impeccable.  Jerry, Grace, and one of the female staffs who I forgot the name (If you see this, I’m sorry I forgot your name!) are the reasons why I write this review. They are very helpful, and they genuinely care about you. I was advised to exchange currency across the street, and the agency across the hotel scammed me. After I came back to the hotel, I told Grace about it, and she asked me to follow her to the agency and helped me get everything right! 
4. They can get you cheaper tours and taxis than your own ways. 
In a word, there is no doubt I will stay in Emeraldwaters Hotel Valley whenever I decide to spend a night in Hanoi! 
If you are the owner of this hotel, get this, your staffs are the reasons why your hotels are so good. Make sure they don’t leave your hotel, or it’s going to be your loss!
review.comment_negative: There is none!

review.comment_positive: Sehr freundliche Mitarbeiter, die wirklich immer gut gelaunt und zuvorkommend waren. Wir haben selten so guten Service erlebt.
Hotel is located in old quarters, short walking distance to most attractions. Very helpfull and friendly staff.

The staff were the most friendly, kind and attentive, especially Justin who really went above and beyond to make us feel welcomed. They even arranged us breakfast since we had an early flight. The hotel is located in the heart of the old town, making it easy to explore it. The room was spacious and clean and the breakfast was delicious.

review.comment_positive:
Staff are amazing.  Very friendly, helpful and went the extra mile.  Ms. Kim and Mr. Jerry went above and beyond.  Their recommendations for sightseeing and activities while in town were spot on.  

The location is nice with a setback from the main road.  Our room was extremely quiet for some rest after the business of the city.  The old quarter is a vibrant place to be in Hanoi and we would definitely recommend staying here.  

We're going back to stay there again because we liked it so much.
